address: 188/1, 6th Main Road, Opposite AXON Hospital, Defence Colony, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
["Now a days we are bored of cream cakes which are full of sugary compounds, in that scenario flaspo spongy cakes have more cake and less cream. They have varieties of fruit flavoured mini Spong cakes and fruit jars, assorted spongy cakes. The cakes as soft as sponge, but really Delicious .
I tried carrot and baby coffee flaspo cakes which were full of flavours and way too soft, even the banana sponge cake was really authentic, like homemade mom's cake. The double layered spongy cake with one layer of cream and choco chips as toppings was cute and Delicious.
..I also got to try some of their fruit jars like lemon jar cake with layers of cake and vanilla butter cream with pineapple jam which was a delight..
...loved the concept of these healthy spongy cakes with no cream, which actually spoils the mood.. Make your special occassions merrier with these spongy cakes from flaspo..", "Flaspo, stands for flavoured sponge cakes. And Boy.! they do complete justice to the name. They have very nice sponge cakes up their sleeve.
I like such speciality outlets, they don't claim to make everything, but whatever they make, they make it rightüòÉ.
In today's world filled with umpteen number of pastry options, decent sponge cakes are a welcome change. They serve about 7 flavours, we tried four of them.
Coffee and banana are our favourites, other two were equally good. It is just the matter of personal choice. They offer the mini versions for a quick dessert order and also have full sized cakes.
We got this delivered to our place.
Taste: 4/5
VFM: 3.5/5
Packaging: 3.5/5 ( it came in a neatly packed in right sized boxes and the cakes were intact, though i feel they can use a little more eco-friendly plain cardboard boxes since they would be doing a lot of deliveries)", 'Life is too short to say no to cakes.
Absolutely true üòâ
Yesterday, I had an opportunity to experience flavoured sponge cakes from Flaspo.
They have their own fruit flavoured cakes as their signature items. I tried out Banana, Carrot, Lemon and Coffee flavours.
I liked all of these, but pick of them would be Coffee and Banana. They were having a special attraction with regard to aroma and taste.
It was a pleasant experience and I am sure that they can delight more customers!', "To be honest, I was a little doubtful about the taste this unique concept was going to bring with it, but after trying it, I'm AMAZED.
Flaspo offers a great variety of sponge cakes (less cream) that are infused with flavor with the help of fruits, coffee etc.
The products are SO FRESH that even when I got them delivered at my place, I could easily enjoy these delicacies for 2-3 days straight without a stale essence playing with my taste buds- FULL MARKS FOR THAT.

As these cakes have less/no cream, I find them to be perfect with a hot cup of coffee to enjoy the pleasant weather of Bengaluru. They are soft, they are delicious and they are easily accessible in the comfort zone of your house. What more could one ask for?
Good work there, Flaspo! üåà", "It was my birthday recently and my friends ordered a cake from Flaspo. So the idea is that these are sponge cakes, low on cream. I wouldn't lie but I was pretty skeptical about the taste when I heard the description.\xa0

Although when I tried it, I loved it to the core. It has just the right amount of cream to make the cake moist and still not have it smothered all over. It tastes amazing and they have quite a few flavours to try from.\xa0

Also, it was amzing how they had a printed edible sugar layer on the cake for the wishes (of sorts) which adds to the look of it.\xa0

Definitely going to order more cakes from here in future.\xa0

BTW the one we ordered was a Lamington Cake.", '#NewinTown  Flaspo cakes recently opened their stores in and serves amazing sponge cakes and jar cakes. 

Who doesn‚Äôt like cake without excessive cream? And that‚Äôs what their thought process is, they serve variety of flavoured sponge cakes with no or minimal cream so that you can eat more n more without intake of much calories. 
I tried their coffee baby flaspo, banana and carrot cake and lemon cake jar. The cakes were soft and fluffy, amazing flavours. Lemon jar cake was super delightful.', "Super soft and spongy cakes that are an absolute delight ! Loved the carrot sponge cake and the banana sponge cake! Couldn't stop once I started ! üòÑ The cake jars were okayish but they were fresh! The sponge cakes are a definite must have!", 'Some good cakes here guys!! I tried the carrot cake and banana cake. They were really fresh and tasted good. It had a very baked at home sort of a taste which was nice. I also tried some jar cakes and they were yummy. Something that children would really enjoy having. Good taste and great service.', "Here to one of the place where you can absolutely take a pit stop and order or even order from this place for the baby cakes and some lovely Spong cakes!

I'm in so love with these cakes since they do not have excess cream and it gives some original natural flavours and refresh the mouth with the flavors you choose.

Do try them it's great for gifting someone or pampering your sweet tooth or to the loved ones.", 'Flaspo cake is new in town and they are already doing amazing. I love the taste of their cakes. Spongy and fluffy. The cream is also excellent quality. Small size portions are just perfect for everyone. Also, they have egg and eggless varieties for all their cake, which makes life easier for vegetarians. The heart shape sandwich cake is my favorite
                                                keepitstylishdayita.com']

address: 1051/B, TMN Street, 3rd Main, Kempamma Devi Road, New Thippasandra, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available,
reviews:
["It's always important to have Chinese food at proper authentic or atleast once who claim as their primary kind. Basil Spice was a life saver for me with this tasty manchow soup. It was real and perfect not fake desi Chinese which is great at price bracket of 150rs per head category.

Please go ahead for Chinese food
It's amazing"]

address: NA
more_info: Breakfast, Delivery Only,
reviews:
['Got food delivered from this place. Their menu was interesting and had varieties of dosa. We tried the peri peri chicken dosa and onion chilli cheese dosa. The chicken dosa was a lil dry and could be a little better but the onion chilli cheese dosa was good. It comes with 3 types of chutney and the packing was good.
Food- 3.5
Packing-4.6
Price-3.5', 'Got food delivered from this place. Their menu was interesting and had varieties of dosa. We tried the peri peri chicken dosa and onion chilli cheese dosa. The chicken dosa was a lil dry and could be a little better but the onion chilli cheese dosa was good. It comes with 3 types of chutney and the packing was good.
Food- 3.5
Packing-4.6
Price-3.5', 'Got the food ordered which was well packed. The peri peri chicken dosa was a little too dry. Could have been much better .They provide a variety of chutnies.
Food - 3.5
Packaging - 4.5
Price - 3.8', "On rainy days, i do prefer to have something cheesy and spicy food which is served hot. As am looking for the dishes in zomato, the dishes at this restaurant sounded interesting. Finally ordered spinach & corn cheese dosa. Must say, its one of the best dosa ever i had. Its so cheesy and till the end of the bite, i enjoyed the real taste of spinach and corn which is mixed with cheese. Interesting part is they serve with 4 different types of chutneys and all blends so good with these dosa's. Peanut chutney, Mint chutney, ginger chutney & tomato chutney. #must try for veg lovers. Recommended for all age groups.", 'It was a rainy Wednesday afternoon and I was in the mood for something spicy; when I stumbled upon these select dishes. It was the first time I had seen dosa balls and immediately knew I had to try it. Bangalore Dosa Co. nailed it! Definitely a must try for light eats and sugar cravings :D', 'Ordered from this place for the first time. The packaging was pretty good. The dosa was cooked well. The paneer pakodas were good, however I feel it did require little more flavor. Maybe little more masala.

The 4 different chutneys that came along with the dosa were also equally good. Hoping to try out other dishes from this place.', 'I ordered a Chicken Keema Open Dosa and Chicken Bubble Dosa from this place. First off, the packaging was really good, covered in a hard cardboard box and was delivered piping hot!

The chicken Keema open dosa had a thick base filled with Keema and was topped with the same, the taste was really amazing! The chicken bubble dosa had actual bubbles popping up the dosa which was also nicely filled with soft chicken crumbs and it tasted really good.

2 dosas are quite enough for 3 people, do try out this place and tell me how you liked it.üòã']

address: 2985, 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Wifi, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['A very good and pocket friendly plate', 'If you want to experiment with Hungarian food, this is definitely one place to try. The flavour combinations are interesting and so so delicious.
The Olive Oregano Kartoos Kurtoosh is a must try, so is the mug cake.', "Pure bliss . These words describe this place and the justice done to this Hungarian cuisine in Bangalore !!
The place is super accessible and is small with a limited seating .
The ambience is simple and classic.
The food grabs all your attention here üíï I tried the Kurtosh , Langos , Sweet chimney cakes , fries and the Kartoos Kurtosh !! Unbelievably I'd rate everything a good 4/5 for its brilliant taste and quality . The place is hygienic and clean as well !! The staff is super friendly , they hello you choose accordingly and take you through the menu for the first timers !! Brilliant place to try Hungarian Street food for the first time in Bangalore. Just loved this place !!", 'Hungarian cuisine! Kudos to bring it to Bangalore!
Tried Kurtosh, kartoos Kurtosh, langos, sweet fill, chimney rings!
Must try: Langos and chimney rings!
The ice cream on top of red velvet tasted amazing but not the cone! You can add the ice cream with chimney rings and make your mouth more watery!
Service was amazing and he clearly explains each and every dish!
Good worküíØ']

address: 594, 6th Cross, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Self Service,
reviews:
['Classic Masala Omelette & Sabudana Khichdi with Dahi.

All of it was yummy. Artisan bread that came along with the Omelette turned out to be buttered Olive bread & Omlette with Olive bread is my favorite combination. Had fun devouring it. Sabudana Khichdi was pretty decent as well. Only thing is - they substituted boiled Potato with Potato Chivda. I found it weird first, but it gave certain tanginess to the Khichdi. So, no complaints there. Dahi was missing from the order though, so no perfect 5 for you.

Other things I tried: Methi Paratha with Alu Chokha (Raita was missing in this order) and Chicken Cutlet with Pav.']

address: 3, Cambridge Layout, Opposite Frank Anthony Public School, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available,
reviews: ["In banglore also you can get taste of Maharashtra's famous place Karjat, where Vadapav sales are more than 1 liter water bottles. Getting same taste with delicious, crispy and tangy taste of Vadapav & samosa pav. Outlet is neat & clean with friendly staff."]

address: 1650, 10th Main Road, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["It's a fast food corner in jeevan bheema nagar. The taste and prices are good. But it's all about the ambience. It's not very hygienic. There is no seating arrangements", '', 'One of the best pocket friendly food places with many options. Highly recommend it if you wanna grab a quick bite . Fast prep and Zomato delivers quite fast', "3.5

I visited spicy corner today after almost a 4year gap and it's still the same!
I've only always tried their Chinese menu and I've not been disappointed.
Honestly, all the chillies and manchurians, whether paneer or gobi, tastes the same with minimal varation. Their noodles and fried rice options are also good, definitely light on the pocket and value for money. The only thing I'd say is that the people who were working here were staring and laughing loudly in our directiok and made me very uncomfortable, but take away is a great option.", 'Food here is just tasty (only Chinese) but there are no proper seating arrangements. Eating here peacefully is not at all possible. Hygiene is also a problem here.
But trying here is a must', 'This is a small place in Jeevanbhima Nagar, serving only veg delicacies at pocket friendly prices!
The Schezwan noodles and aloo pyaz paratha here is spicy and delicious, a must have! The aloo chilly was soggy and not that great but overall a great place for some spicy lip smacking and budget friendly food :)', 'I was Feeling to have some good Starters. While passing Away from Jeevan Bhima Nagar I saw the more youths standing infront of spicy corner and having the food.Suddenly I stop and went there I randomly picked to have mixed Manchurian.The quantity & quality of the food was very good for a minimal cost.Now all the time whenever I pass through that area I use to have different starters.I also took many of my friends to have over there.i really love the food.thank you spicy corner', "Spicy corner isn't spicy. Fast food center with low prices and almost zero taste. The panner Manchurian was not cooked at all. The rice was of lower quality.", 'Was looking to relish some good chinese food, while scrolling came across Spicy Corner. I‚Äôve heard their items are usually spicy, so made a request to have the items delivered to us with minimal spicy level.

I was quiet surprised looking at the quantity and quality of the food delivered for a very nominal cost.

Mushroom Fried Rice
Mushrooms were generously added, this was my favorite, I liked the taste and it‚Äôs quiet filling for two medium eaters.

Fried Rice With Manchuri Mix
It was like a combo of sorte and it was good too, again quiet generously they‚Äôd added manchuri‚Äôs in the fried rice, other places they don‚Äôt usually add so much since it‚Äôs an add on.

Baby Corn Manchurian
It was perfect, perfect to my liking. Not spicy, dry and it wasn‚Äôt saucy at all.', "Veri good cooking üëåüëåüëå.
,It is best place for Chinese's food,in jeevan bhima nagar,gobi manchurian,and paneer is best ,it is very old resturent üëç"]

address: 1650, 10th Main, Near BSNL Office, 80 Feet Road, Jeevan Bhima Nagar Main Road, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['The crab masala is so good it‚Äôs definitely a must try here.
Erachi fry is ok. Appam are so soft and fluffy and idyappam is also good.Its a nice place to kerala food', "This is one of my favorite spots for lunch, especially if am craving for some nice Kerala food. It's pocket friendly and you will not complain about the portion sizes. I always prefer the Kerala Veg Meals along with their Malabar Chicken Fry. The meals are really good. You can choose either white rice or the Kerala red rice. This is served with 2 veg Gracie's, sambar, rasam, buttermilk(my absolute love), pickle, papad and payasam. The Malabar Chicken Fry is well spiced and cripsy, served with cripsy onion (yum with rice and sambar).
Other must tried are
Kerala Parotta with any curry
Chicken Biryani
Puttu with beef curry
Pothichoru"]

address: 1083, 5th Cross, 12th Main Road, 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Mocktails', 'Hazelnut Frappe', 'Green Apple Mojito', 'Bbq Chicken', 'Death By Chocolate', 'Basil Crush', 'Vanilla Ice Cream']
reviews:
["Budapest Bake

The hungarian chimney cone concept is been talk of the town for past few months in Bangalore.. Visited Budapest Bake for my first experince with Chimney Cones.. small cute place with vibrant lightings & interesting walls catches our attention.

They have sweet & savoury cones along with few shakes & mocktails to go with.

Carne Mexicana : This savoury cone is my favourite ..cajun spiced grilled chicken, mayonaise, onion, chilly..PERIOD.
Loved this version very much.. The cone which is more like a bread is very soft & went well

Death By Chocolate : Being a chocolate fan, This is one of the must try here.. Loaded with chocolate & more chocolate, this one dish is enough to satisfy anyone's chocolate cravings.

Mango Milkshake : Though off season, but this is pretty decent.. mango shake is thick & nice on flavour.", 'This is a Asthetically Beautiful Cafe serving hot and delicious Chimney Cones and Chimney Cakes along with some great mocktails, shakes and softy. The flavors are really interesting and the staffs are all ready and to serve you. The tiramisu ice cream and pretzels cone are must try while the chilly chicken and schezwan paneer and corn and spinach cones are recommended. Do pay a visit and try these Hungarian Delish.', 'Very nice place... Uniquely designed interiors... Basicslly it is a place for chimney cones of both desserts & savoury... They are also serving mojitos, mocktails, smoothies, softies & diff. Types of cold coffee... I had ordered many things... Like bbq chicken, carne Mexicana, spicy italiana, spinach n corn, cheesy mushroom, mac n cheese, chilly chicken chimney cones... All were\xa0 too yummy n delicious... Among them... Carne Mexicana, cheesy mushroom, paneer chilly schezwan.. I loved the most... In drinks.. Guava mary, green apple.. Both were superb... Must try their dbc, nutella vanilla, & tiramisu in dessert section... U will definitely love them all... Must visit guyzzz... üëç', 'Visited this place with a few friends last evening. Got to try out their Chimney Cakes and the Savoury and Dessert Chimney Cones. Loved their Chilli Chicken and BBQ Chicken Cones. The Hot and Saucy Chicken Pieces were very well marinated and delectable. The mocktails and shakes were also very tasty.', 'This is a small place in Indiranagar that serves Chimney Cones like a few other new places in Bangalore. 

Food:
The good thing here is that the cones were soft n fluffy types. I personally liked all the non veg ones. The first few savoury cones that came were a lil too salty but we notified them and this was rectified when we got our second set of cones. 
BBQ and Chilli chicken cones were damn good. They stuffed it with a lot of sauces and meat. 

Drinks:
The watermelon was much better than the Mandarin mojito. Their smoothies were not really smoothies, but, really strong flavoured shakes. The kiwilitchi, strawberry etc were really good. 

Too small a place was the negative point here and when u don‚Äôt have sufficient seating for the number of ppl, the floors can get messy.', 'Have been hearing about Chimney Cake ever since Budapest Bake Inn opened. We ordered two variants of Chimney cake - sugar coated, red velvet.

This is more like baked soft pastry that opens like a swirl (and less cake like texture). We loved it absolutely.', 'First the ambiance is so so cool 
I could pay to just hang out there .. 
the food was alright was not so happy with the cone was not at the best quality the fillings were amazing.
The chocolate ice cream dint taste like chocolate ice cream. Could be improved', 'We went here on a Sunday noon and boy ! It‚Äôs just a cute little place for a small group to have their peaceful time ! The owner was very friendly and the music took us back to our childhood ! 

Foood was amazing ! 
We ordered not once but twice !
Vegetarians shall not be disappointed, I have tried both chicken n veg there and yummmm is the word

I‚Äôd go there when I need some peaceful fun time !']

more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['', '', "There are a lot of flies in this outlet. Was all over the donuts when I went there. It was appalling.. better try some other place or perhaps a different branch. It's a shame, as their donuts are actually good ( have tried in other branches)", 'I had ordered ‚ÄúBites‚Äù but I received ‚ÄúSignature Bites‚Äù. In the first photo, below the price it is mentioned as ‚Äú24 bite sized donuts‚Äù, but I received only 18. It is now close to 30 mins since I complained, restaurant yet to respond to my complaint.', 'My love for donuts never fade away. These mini donuts are crazy they are just a bite size and delicious. They have very good taste and so melting. They have different flavours and choices to choose.', 'I wanted to have something sweet very badly and head over mod kormangla. The prices were quite affordable. They serve hot beverages as well which is awesome. We had long eclairs and red velvet donuts with cappuccino. They were too sweet for me but overall good flavoured donuts. And they have many varities of flavour.', 'If you want to eat the freshest and yummiest donuts ever, this is the place...these are the best donuts I‚Äôve had in Bangalore. They are freshly prepared and there are a lot of options to choose from..I had a donut coffee combo and took another donut on the go...loved it to the core!! I have been disappointed with many other donut places which are raved about..but this place is actually good..', 'Variety of drooling donuts üíûüíûüíû.
If your are "mad over donuts" then you must visit this place. There are variety of donuts which are freshly baked (your can see them baking it and dressing it).
The red velvet which I tried was awesome, soft and properly cooked.
Order coffee to enjoy the best combo üíû', 'This place is awesome,,I just love that softness of their donuts, and the sweetness of the staff out there is just so welcoming,,,#highly recommended', 'Good donuts in a good price with superb taste. Specially if you try their mango donuts. Full of taste to be drown into.
Maggi gelato is awesome but mango cream takes it in a whole different level

Only issue is that these are a bit too overwhelming. Else everything is perfect']

address: #14, 2nd Floor, 10th Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews: ['In busy weekdays, at work place feels like having something spicy and north indian cuisine and found this place in zomato and ordered North Indian Gala meal with Chole.\n\nIts decent and homely food. The quantity is so good that 2 people can eat happily. They served with rice, roti, chole curry, cauliflower fry and sweet(gulab jamun).', "Good meals indeed. It's taste is very homely and very filling! The meals are too good and more than enough for one person. We tried the homely chicken meals and the chicken curry was really good. The curry was nice and thick and spiced well. I loved the phulkas as they were soft and not dry like usual places."]

address: G-02, Ground Floor, Smart Avenue, 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews:
["I'm not a fan of Chinese cousin although bad cold makes be try some of it from time to time in the last few days. Thought of trying The Redbox and went ahead with Chicken Wheat Noodles + Wok tossed chili chicken combo. After discount, I paid 196 which seemed fair for a combo but when the delivery came, it looked very small of a portion size and frankly didn't impress me at all. The box was half empty with tiny chunks of chicken without much or any thought given into it.

This is a major turnoff when it comes to experimenting with new place cause you never know what or how much you're going to get served. It's hard to tell from only one experience, but I don't think it's going to matter much cause they didn't have much on offer on the menu as well.", 'The food was packed well but the taste was bad. The chilli garlic chicken tasted like it was dipped in tomato and sugar syrup. And the noodles were just boiled thrown in some meat and packed. No flavour whatsoever.', 'Love the food here. Delicious and authentic to its name. 

The noodles and the rice both are a delight and cooked to perfection.

I had there sides in chilie chicken and it had a good amount of spice and acidity to it. 

You can order it home too and served in a cute little box', 'We ordered Garlic burnt rice and chilli chicken and chicken lollypop.
Garlic burnt rice was very blunt.. Chilli chicken was okay.. Chicken lollypop was tangy..
Food was okay not that great.. Could be better.', 'I liked the theme üëçüèª
Not so heavy noodles üçù I felt okay after the meal which not the usual case of any fried items for me.

Their combos are not preferable always. It‚Äôs fixed already. So I have to pay unnecessarily for the food that I don‚Äôt want. Needs improvement in the menu.

Portion could have been more for the price.', 'Curious about this brand!

Gave it a try!

*Veg Spring Roll (3/5)

Was very bland and had no taste.
The vegetables filling was cooked well and was just ok

*Veg Rice combo (4/5)

The taste was good and so was the quantity.
Accompanied with paneer and potato chilli added more taste to this combo.
The paneer sauce and the potato chilli was delicious.
Blueberry dessert was good.', 'Ordered their nonveg Singapore noodles with black pepper chicken combo. Value for money. Black pepper chicken was not spicy and noodles was ok. Quantity wise its best bet for money.']

address: 2212, HAL 3rd Stage, 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Keto Options, Wifi, Table booking recommended, LGBTQIA Friendly, Pet Friendly, Gluten Free Options,
reviews:
['A cosy place serving fresh and healthy food. The super bowls are a must try however the wraps while they are filling lacks the flavour and is a bit dry. Service is a great and value for money for sure.', "Flax has lovely outdoor seating, and gorgeous indoor seating.. So much so that you'll be spoilt for choice.. Its a place I'd recommend you choose to go to, when you want to have a long chat with someone close to you. Service is non-intrusive, yet impecable. Food is full of good health, yet good for your taste buds.
We tried Falafel with papaya and beetroot hummus, beans on the side; and egg white and smoked fish on a bed of greens and multigrain pasta - both turned out to be great.
Overall, a fantastic Sunday afternoon spent at Flax :)", 'FLAX is a healthy food based cafe in indiranagar. It has a very good ambience and the interiors are very aesthetically done. It is a nice place to spend time either with friends are for solo work.

The food price is on the higher side, but the taste does not match up to the price. The thai chicken brown is bland of not for the sauce which they give with it. The bowl portion is sufficient for one person though.. The beetroot espresso did not have a tinge of beetroot :-). The funniest part was the berry ice cream. They actually gave it in a sealed cup just like we get in ARUN ice cream. Though the cup looked bigger, half of it was empty !!!

The best part about the cafe is its service. It is fast and they are always to take care of your needs.

On the whole, the cafe was high on looks and low on taste today. I would go with a 3 out of 5 for this cafe. I hope my experience was an one off case.', 'The variety of salads and healthy food is impressive! The best part is that one can customise their own salad according to preference! Tried Korebi Coffee for the first time and totally loved it! The chicken Wrap was delicious as well! The only thing that can be changed are the dips served alongside!', "The food was great, ingredients are garden fresh and the staff was very hospitable, only suggestion, when I order in the quantity of the salad dressing is less. When i have it there it's perfect. Else it's a 5 on 5.", 'Need an escape from busy, cluttered life ?
You definitely need to visit this cafe located on 80ft road, Indiranagar. Well spaced, landscaped and designed this cafe will steal your heart from the very entrance till the last bite of healthy good that they have to offer. I was totally charmed by the warmth and simplicity of this place. Going to visit them soon again.', 'The health-giving concept restaurants are nothing new in Namma Bengaluru as many nosheries  are already well acquainted with the same fashion and has a common agenda of healthy lifestyle that sets the trend among today‚Äôs generation since it usually symbolises full strength plus vigor as well as freedom from signs of disease. Each place have their own charms that visitors repeatedly wanna to visit and here one more rookie and buzz-worthy eatery named FLAX opens its door in Indira Nagar 100 feet Road  for healthy living folks.Apart from Mumbai and Pune, this is the first branch of South-India and luckily on Dusshera morning we visited this fine and dandy place.
                                                ...Read full post on abhinieats.com', 'Whoever thinks healthy cannot be tasty ‚Äì definitely needs to pay this place a visit.

Wow, this place is going to be one of my go-to places for a while now. Absolutely loved it.

Opened very very recently. The vibes, the d√©cor, the ambiance ‚Äì is all so pretty, peaceful, warm, ans so welcoming. Although some of the quotes on wall didn‚Äôt make any sense to us. :P

Staff was very courteous. Most of their service was super prompt and quick.

What we ordered ‚Äì

1.	Ageless Smoothie (Very refreshing ‚Äì very filling)

2.	Nutri-Boost Smoothie (Like a vegan Banana shake)

3.	Falafel Bowl (Mind blowing-ly amazing ‚Äì everything on the plate blew my mind ‚Äì EVERYTHING! Felt like I eating a rainbow']

reviews:
['Visited this place for a dinner and had a great time. Ambiance of the place is very good. Tried masala chaap and paneer kulcha. Service is pretty average here. Coming to taste it was my first time tasting chaap and I absolutely loved it and the kulcha is also pretty good. But the food is very heavy and felt a bit too stuffed... Good as an experiment, but nothing to repeat soon.', 'If you like Delhi soya chaap varieties, this place is a must visit for you. They have multiple variety of soya chaap and kulche which are served with chole and chatni. The taste, the flavor and the look all were tempting and satisfying.
They also have proper ala c√°rte meals with options of different gravies and breads.

Cons - 20-25 seating only and No parking. Parking will be in road if you get space.']

address: 118, Koramangala Industrial Area, Koramangala 7th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Full Bar Available, Nightlife, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Rooftop, Smoking Area, Wifi,
reviews:
['I am staying alone in Bangalore so wanted a good place where I can sit and ready my book and have good food. Here I went to Kormangala social. The ambience was awesome , specially the greenery there caught me for next 4 hours in the same couch. Loved the staff they did not disturb me at all took my ordered placed it on. The table and just left me alone so that I can enjoy my me time. I love the desert to the core that was names Ramesh and Suresh awesome taste the dey fruits on ye topping were just fried right. Must try is the Andhra mutton biryani for all the meat lovers there specially the mutton pieces were succulent and melting in my mouth the flavour of tangy tomato was in depth there. All
Together a good place enjoy with both families , friends , alone and with your loved ones', 'How can a place be so nice always? We have been to Social so many times and every time we came back highly satisfied. The dishes and the drinks have been consistent in taste. This time we ordered deep fried Chicken sausages ( different in shape from the regular sausages, but they looked like French fries ), Ghee roast chicken, Baida Roti with keema chicken, highly loaded chicken nachos. And we loved all of it. Too delicious. In cocktails we had acharioska, vodka in Shimla Mirch. They were unique style Indianised cocktails. Loved them too. Service was good too. And the prices are quite reasonable. The best part about this place is their menu.  Also we liked the rooftop seating arrangement here.', 'Sophia, Dina and Tina special thanks to you guys for enhancing our experience.', "The food was so delicious, I couldn't just keep drooling!
The prices were cheap too.
Good job if you get a place there, it's always full, even after booking a table first!
A must go place!", 'One of the happening place in koramangala. My all time favorite hangout place. Love the music over here more than anything else. Fancy crowd. Amazing ambience and sitting arrangements.', 'The place is worth going to for the ambience, there is both roof top as well as indoor seating available. The food is very well presented and the taste is a 3.5-4 on 5 which is pretty decent. May come across as slightly overpriced sometimes.', 'It‚Äôs a restaurant with a very nice ambience. 
The service is pretty good as well. 
I have been here twice and their food is not of the typical style. It‚Äôs more fusion based. 

Some of the items in the menu are very tasty. They have a very unique menu with a wide selection to choose from. 

I don‚Äôt like their sandwich options though which come stacked in a skewer because the bread was mostly dry and once it gets cold it isn‚Äôt nice at all.', 'This is probably Bengaluru‚Äôs finest places to be ,you are served on colloquial plates we got to taste a wide range of dishes every dish on our table was nailed to perfection the Multani mushroom,chilli panner and jalape√±o cheese nads stood out we were a bit dissatisfied with the mezze platter to finish it off I opted for a Swarnagiri cafe in pour over style the coffe was authentic and Rich in aroma 
the staff were kind and quick too with their service 
Looking at the 3 most important aspects of food:
Ambience-5/5
Presentation -5/5
Taste-5/5
The restaurant has an amazing ambience and is totally worth every penny of yours', 'This was my first visit to this social. And it kept up to my expectations completely.
Must visit with your friends or family. Great service , great cocktails... The butter garlic dumplings were super tasty and the cocktails are my fav ... South Pacific rim is the one in the funky glass. And then a beer cocktail.
Beautiful lush green ambience inside plus they got a big rooftop.
I will come back for sure . Thanks']

address: 1st Stage, 100 feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Table booking not available, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Burgers', 'Pasta', 'Crunchy Veg Burger', 'Peri Peri Fries', 'Fried Cheese', 'Tex Mex Burger', 'Peri Peri Chicken']
reviews:
["So I heard a lot of praises for this place and guess what it is maintaining its status of being a high rated restaurant. Had to wait for 10 mins because of the crowd but their service was very attentive and everything went smoothly. So I ordered a peri Peri chicken burger it's served with chips here making it a perfect combination. Then Bolognese Spaghetti and ceaser salad to start with. In the main course I had California chicken steak. Towards the end we had cheesecakes. All the items were fresh tasted very well and service was fast too. The prices are very affordable if you compare it with some mainstream cafe.
Taste: 5/5
Service and Ambience: 5/5
VFM: 5/5", 'Great place for amazing yet affordable american food with an indian touch. The butter chicken burger, tandoori chicken burger, the fish and chips and the Irish coffee all worth drooling over. Must visit if you are in the vicinity.', "When it comes satisfaction, Truffles have done this recently when I placed an order for close to 300 burger combos which included cortege cheese and tandoori chicken burger for my entire team at work. The delivery was remarkable and since I was told about this joint by many to go for, didn't have any hurdles in coordinating with them. Polite and professional with great service is what I got from them. Though it was a bulk order, the quality wasn't compromised on a single element and that proves to me as a customer that they have that dedication.

I'm sure to go with them whenever I have the possibility and individually, I'm impressed. The food was fresh and hot and the mojito was simply chilled and refreshing. Great job guy!!", "Thursdays we didn't thought it would be crowded, but it was. Think about how good they are! Ambiance is good with varied type of seating but we never got to choose as it's mostly occupied. They have AC & Non AC seatings too. Service is quick & neat - we never had to wait for placing the order, food also arrived quick. We ordered two burger (truffle roaster & crisp cross) truffles roaster was the better choice. Starters were cheese chicken fries & normal fries both will be recommended. Deserts are must. Pocket friendly, we tried XL burgers which was too much for me hence got rest of the stuff parcel, if you have big appetite then only order XL burgers.", 'Superb food, superb service, nice ambience, good portion size, great value for money, you guys are simply rock, cheers to your chef, service and entire team. Keep it up,', "Has to be one of the best food places. The steak here is the best. I've tried the cheesecake here and it was yum too. The seating here is a bit limited though.", "Craving for some impeccable burgers, some scrumptious pasta, amazing appetizers and some lovely dessert to finish off your meal and drool over - head over to truffles. Though the place might be bit crowded, it's worth the wait for a really happy belly.
I had ordered some chicken soup, rolls, hot dog, crispy corn stick for appetizers. Some amazing peri peri chicken burger for my main. Red velvet cupcake to finish my wholesome meal with.
Cannot complain about the price either as it's worth paying for every bite.
Cheer truffles!", 'A must visit place in bangalore.
Their dessert needs a special mention and so does their steak . A pleasant place to hang out with friends.Better for a non veg person than a veg person.', 'I couldn‚Äôt expect anything better, when i ordered chicken peri peri burger , chicken kebabs , friazzo biscutii and coke (standard drink) . I loved the taste of food and potato fries with burger, were obviously cherry on the top. Also specifically the quality of chicken in the burger was mouth melting. I am looking forward to visit this place again']

address: 104, B Block, 1st Floor, HAL Airport Exit Road, Konena Agrahara, Blue Dark Connection Point, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only,  Serves Halal  ¬†,
reviews:
['Namaste !
We ordered behrouz biryani recently and we absolutely loved it !! The moment we tooked the order the entire place was filled with aroma ! The packaging too was perfect and fancy

We ordered
Paneer subz biryani and falafel .
The falafel were the usual ones , spot on , fried well ! They were crunchy and tasted really good .
Then we tried the biryani which was filled with aroma and lots of indian spices . It was absolutely delicious serve with some raita . The paneer too was good , just a bit overpowering the flavours were but it was amazing
Also to end the dish they gave us gulab jamoon which was a nice way to end the meal !

Food packaging - 4.5/5
Food - 4/5
Service - 4/5', 'FOOD REVIEW III

Behrouz has always been one of my favourite place to have biriyani from. This time I ordered Gosht biriyani with chicken kebabs.
The food was hot when delivered and the aroma of the biriyani filled the house.
The aroma literally made me have my dinner earlier that usual but to my surprise the biriyani failed to impress me. In a previous instance I had biriyani from here and it absolutely made me fall in love but this time it was different. Quantity wise really good. Personally didnt like the taste. Felt like the gravy was too much put even though the meat was tender.
The murg koobidehs were not remarkable either. Somehow they lacked the taste. To me they were bland. No chutney was given with the kebabs which I really found strange.

Overall not that great an experience.', "I had ordered Lazeez Bhuna Murg Biryani and Murg Kefta.
The Murg Kefta was well cooked and tastes really good will the mint chutney provided. You can squeeze lemon if it suits your tastebuds.
The Biryani is certainly a meal for 2 after having the starter. It is cooked with great care and probably the best Biryani I've ordered at home.", 'Got this delivered as a part of food review program and Behrouz manages to be one place that nullifies the concept that veg biryani is a myth. the paneer biryani tastes just so good. The appetizer and the choco lava cake that came with it just added to the happiness.', 'Got this delivery from Behrouz Biryani at Old Airport Road. Absolutely loved the place. I got two items which were both absolute lit!
1. Zaikedaar Paneer Biryani
which comes with mint raita and a Gulab jamun.
Biryani is one of the best, I‚Äôve ever had. It comes in a great packaging with good quantity which is enough for one person. Mint Raita goes extremely well with the Biryani. Highly recommended for vegetarian people.

2. Falafal-e-Khaas
A very delicious and perfect ‚Äúsides‚Äù one can have with a Biryani. It comes with a lemon and a Chatni which makes it more delicious.', "Ordered Chicken Biryani recently from Behrouz. My second time trying their food, it has surely lowered in standards.

The biryani wasn't the best. It had a weird perfume flavour to it which wasn't appealing. However, chicken was well cooked.

Veg Falafel was not great. Tasted quite stale.

Delivery was delayed by a bit but overall, wasn't the best experience.", '‚ñ∂Ô∏èOrdered the dum ghosht biryani and the chicken koobideh from the outlet

The delivery was on timeüëçüèº
The temperature of the food was optimal üëå
The delivery was packaged well with cutlery providedüòç

Coming to the taste, having tried Behrouz earlier, they are consistent and renowned for the flavor of the biryani. This was no exception

The meat was succulent and well spiced. The portions were reasonable

Looking forward to ordering again!']

address: 15, Zatakia Centre, 100 Feet Road, Defence Colony, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
["Ordered the ferrero rocher cake on dunzo.
It was heavy on the stomach yet light on the soul. The cake was delicious and toothsome.
Will definitely order again to satisfy my sweet tooth and to please my eyes with its beautiful and elegant packaging. I'll let the pictures do the rest of the talking.", "I ordered a cheesecake from this place for my friend's birthday and I must say, it was so yum. Caramel baked Cheesecake is a truly brilliant choice and all caramel lovers should try it out. I am definitely going to try out the other flavours soon.", 'Delivery review- nicely packed and seem less delivery by Dunzo, cakes were fresh and rich in taste. Chocolate fudge brownie was my favourite, and I would love to taste more from them. Prices are little on higher side but can‚Äôt complain much too as they are far superior in quality compared to any other bakery around Indira Nagar.', 'Taste - 5/5, Value for money - 4/5
Stumbled upon Amintiri on insta and took a risk of following my taste buds!
I ordered a Ferrero rocher cake and enjoyed it to the core. It was delicious, fresh and unique. Not the usual sponge cake which gets moist after a day, this one lasted for more than 2 days without any change in taste. The delivery was seamless through dunzo and the packaging is also very sturdy yet classy.
Would definitely try other cakes from here and recommend Amintiri to all cake lovers.', "After extensive research and reading reviews, I bought the Belgian Dark Chocolate Truffle for a friend's birthday. His favourite is dark chocolate and this cake totally justified the flavour and taste. It was rich and looked just right. Most luxury bakeries don't have 500g cakes and I thought of trying Amintiri since they do, I am extremely happy and satisfied for the price! Definitely looking forward to trying the other flavours! üéÇüíó"]

address: 1A, Church Street, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Beer, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['The hot chicken burger was perfectly soft inside and crispy outside.', 'The place has dim lights which give a cozy feel and overall a good ambiance. 

Food :- 

Peri Peri Chicken Burger (combo) had the burger, fries and coke in it. The burger was super delicious, though the chicken was a tad sweet than spicy.  
P.S. burger at this place don‚Äôt have tikka but boneless chicken pieces in between the bread bun. 

BBQ pizza : Thin crust, crispy and a good amount of chicken. Had a rich taste. 

Recommended : yes ‚úÖ (love the place)', "I had visited this place once. Had ordered their caramel and Snickers shake. Was disappointed with the service and the quality of food. However, only good was that I had Zomato gold and had 1+1 on drink. So for 150 me and my hubby both had our drinks. Their second plus was the quantity was really good but as the taste wasn't great I was not able to finish my shake

Overall my rating
Presentation 4/5
Quality 3/5
Quantity 5/5
Service 3/5
Value for money 3/5", 'This place is exactly below easy tiger where I keep going often. We hit this place on a Sunday afternoon for beer and chicken. Not very crowded. It has the same menu as easy tiger and this place only serves beer and no other alcoholic beverages. The deals are good and so is the food.', "A quiet and chill place just below Easy Tiger. It's not too crowded and comfortable for families as well. Seating isn't much and can get full on a busy weekend. Had the Peri Peri Chicken Strips and the Chicken Crispy with Mango Dip. Wasn't that great but good enough for bar food.", "Dull and cosy ambience but disappointing food. Penne pasta looked spicy red but was simply sweet. Inspite of two corrections, it tasted the quite the same. The main course said spicy rice with peri peri grilled veggies, however what we received was tasteless and didn't do justice to its name. Wouldn't recommend this place to anyone.", "Very good place for burgers if you are disappointed eating MCD burgers.
Combos here are very satisfying and worth for money.
The ambiance, Staff, Service was very much good.
Overall it's a nice place to chill and enjoy delicious food!!", "A lovely place and I have a huge gut feeling that I am going to frequent this place from now on! That's how much I loved the food! We had Peri Peri chicken strips and BBQ chicken pizza.. both awesome! The chicken was cooked to perfection in both the starter and the pizza( which had the perfect amount of cheese and crust btw! üòä) The best part of the meal was how easy it was on the pocket!!üòú Perfect lunch I would say..üòä PS- the pizza was whole.. but it looked so tempting we dug in before the click üôà

Edit.. went here again.. loved the corn pops and shroom pizza as well!!", 'This place has amazing Burgers. It‚Äôs very delicious and value for money. We ordered Chicken Peri Peri Burger and Chicken Lasagna both were absolutely fantastic. Must visit and try it.']

address: Level 4, EVA Mall, 60, Ashok Nagar, B.B.M.P East, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi, LGBTQIA Friendly, Smoking Area, Live Entertainment, Nightlife, Live Music, Rooftop, Table booking recommended, Vegan Options,
reviews:
["This place has got an amazing ambiance with rooftop seating. It can get really crowded on weekends. With all Shakespeare quotes written on the walls , it's got an old world charm.

Food wise, not very impressive. Chestnut and baby corn starter was good to start with. However, the shaksbeirre fries was bland and was lacking flavour. Mezze platter and panner stuffed starter are served in small portions of and the food here will cost a bomb. Margherita pizza was a good main course. Pasta Arrabiata was disappointing. The cocktails and beers are amazing.

All in all, it's a good place to chill with your gang when you are loaded on your pocket.", 'I was amazed to see such a spacious micro brewery in the heart of Brigade Road. Has a very British looking interiors. If the weather is right, I highly recommend the top floor terrace. 

Ambience aside it is the Best BrewI tried in Bangalore. They have some unique flavours and the Brew is simply perfect. I loved all the flavours I tried and my personal favourite was the Lychee flavoured one which was almost red in Colour.

The food was delicious, They have a variety of veg options too. 

Must Try : Lychee Flavored Brew and As you Spike it', 'Went to ShakesBierre for lunch with a friend. The place has an amazing ambience with a large seating space. They also have a rooftop area which usually opens after 6 pm. The service is excellent with really courteous staff. The food comes very fast after you order, in terms of overall service, this is one of the best places I have been to in banglore. We had a Mac and Cheese, which was really tasty and creamy, then a chicken starter, Honey Basil Chicken Wings, which was excellent. We also ordered Mutton Pepper Fry which was also a delightful dish. They have a fantastic food menu, which can be counted amongst the best Menus in banglore. They also have a good drinks menu, we had a ShakesMary and a Pearl Jam, both of which were good. Overall an amazing dining experience at ShakesBierre', 'Jus like any of Shakespeare plays the Place is just beautiful and with huge open spaces and good seating!!! It gives a proper themed brewery feel!!! Astonishing it wasn‚Äôt crowded we were shown to our place immediately!! Staff were professional and courteous!!! The BEER here sings notes in your mouth !!! Absolutely delicious could say my new favourites its an absolute burst of flavours!!! Food though we did not order much were tasty and medium priced !!! Will visit this place for the beer and the music was the ones we all grew up with so it‚Äôs real-time absolute delight to visit this place with friends to relive memories!!!!fantabulous', "Always been wanting to go to Shakesbierre since they started their beers so recently made the trek to the brewery. They had 5 beers on tap but my favorite was Ale Othello which is an Indian Pale Ale, one of the best in town! I also enjoyed the Herb Saison which was named As you spike it!

Coming to starters, their signature dishes are Shakesbierre chips, cripsy Chaat and Podi Idly. Other good starters were Beer infused Squid, Prawn Koliwada, Sambal Prawns and Tawa Lamb Chomps.

Try their oven roasted thin crust pizzas which are delectable. Both vegetarians and non vegetarians have a lot of choice here.

For dessert, Baked blueberry cheesecake is heavenly and so is Creme brulee. It's an ideal place to take your date and also your friends for an affordable and luxury meal.", 'Amazing ambiance, good music, good food and awesome drinks. What else do you need to celebrate your day.

Visited ShakesBierre with bae to celebrate my birthday and I must say it was an amazing one.

For drinks, I had Heart of Gold and Come What May. Both the drinks were Vodka Base. Heart of Gold was more of sweet with Fruity taste. Come What May was Tangy and Spice. Loved both.

Food was French Fries, Dahi Kebab and Tandoori Platter. Yes, we only had starters and we were full üò¨

The fries were soft from inside and Crunchy outside, served with dip which was good.

Dahi Kebab was okayish, could have been better.

Tandoori Platter was amazing, it had seafood, chicken and mutton. The Squids were very spicy. The fish was succulent. Lamb and Chicken was good.

A must Visit place.', 'It was my day 1 at a new office and wanted to go out with the team. We had not made the reservation and when checked the place was empty. We asked the hostess lady if we could get a table at the roof top. She denied. Later we went for a smoke after 2 hours and the roof top was still empty and when asked again she denied giving that place. Also one more thing which let us down was when we moved for smoke they cleared our table entirely. 

The beer was good and the food also tasted good but I guess some training needs to be given to the staff on how to handle the guests.']

address: 39/7-1, 7th Main ESI Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["I had ordered lunch from Kerala Mess. I wanted to try the appam and errachi fry. I was quite happy with the taste and the portions. The appams were big and fluffy while the meat was tender along with the gravy.Overall this place serves decent food and the pricing isn't too expensive.", '', 'Order Ayala masala. Got Ayala fry instead. You should definitely see how it was packed. The easy we buy raw fish. Simply in a polythene cover. So unhygienic.', 'Worst food ever had
No taste. Not recommended. Pay more and buy from any good quality restaurants. If you have food from these kind of restaurants it may cause to many health problems.', 'Good tasty Malabar style food. Earchi, Chicken , Crab roasts are specialities. puttu, appam ,nice pattiri all taste like homely. Biriyani is good too. Can make it better on Outlook and hygiene.', 'Beef is good. You have to come early for lunch if you wanna eat fish. Prawn fry is good too. Breakfast - I have had dosa and puttu and both are ok. Veg meals - did not like the side dishes. Good place to go and have a normal Kerala meal. Nothing jazzy. Pretty cheap. Cleanish.', 'Simple, pocket friendly food.

Quick service, polite staff, can do better on the hygiene though. Not complaining!

Will I visit the place again? Maybe!', 'If you are in search of yummy Kerala delicacies, this is the place to visit.Authentic Kerala food at affordable price. If you are visiting this place for the first time, try chapathi and chicken masala.', "Here is a real pocket friendly option for all those mallu food lovers. Unlimited meals for 60 Rs is a catch. The ambience as such is just like that of a busy cafeteria. So those of you who are looking to sit back and relax, this might not be the right place. The best part about the restaurant is that it serves quality food. I've been a regular here till 2013. Now I do visit once in a while. Stomach safe malayali food to be precise", 'This is a tiny one room place. Go-eat-leave. Not a place for relaxed eating. This used to be my regular Lunch place for many years till 2013. They used to maintain the same quality and the food never harmed the stomach. I do go once in a while now. Unlimited meals for approx 60 RS is worth anytime. They also have many Kerala non veg@ side dishes along with meals.']

address: 17, HAL 3rd Stage, Kodihalli, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore

reviews:
['Ordered egg roll which was 80rs, paid him through cash of 200rs since I only had that note. Instead he cancelled my order as he didn‚Äôt have change to return. Never seen such cheap behaviour from a person who is running a hotel.', 'This place serves an insane amount of Biryani at very reasonable prices. Decent taste with the salan as an accompaniment ramping up the spice quotient. Quick delivery and satiaties hunger on any day.', "I had to stay there for a day so i ordered one kadhai chicken and two butter naans , as per the price the portion size of chicken was good but butter naan were too small to fill the appetite , it wasn't sufficient for two of us , 3 star for the taste , could have given if the butter naans were good enough atleast for one ..", 'Great bunch of guys!

Proper Indian food, caution to the weak-stomached, good amount of Masalas in their dishes.

Do try their starters, lip-smacking good üòã

Cheers!', "Not working restaurant contact number and also food is not good. Delivery boy is not good he doesn't know correct way to handle the customers.", "Thandoori chicken is soo good and I would recommend their biryani too .. they are subtle in flavours unlike the other ones available around.

NB : Their grilled chicken is soo horrible. Too much oily and very poor in taste and spices. Please don't try that ever .. !!", "A Pocket-friendly place and food quality are also good. I ordered grilled Chicken from Zomato. Personally, I don't like grilled chicken that much, so for me, it was ok-ok.
                                                foodavengersblog.blogspot.com", 'Nice place to hangout ..... price is also reasonable.... taste is also good....a must try is chicken noodles and tandoori my all time favorite', 'First order through zomato and worst experience, really pathetic quality of chicken. The chicken was sticking and hard. Zomato please remove the restaurant from your list', 'sr.. food was worst.. i think chicken was smelling badly.. please try to deliver good food. i thrown the whole plate of chicken becouse of testless and bad smelling chicken']

address: 66/1, Bagmane Tech Park, CV Raman Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews: ["First of all the order that I received was not at all fresh (cold and tasted bad). There was no lettuce,cucumber and olives in it. Not many sauces that I selected. And I'm not sure whether it was mutton. Bad experience for the first time order.", 'Its a shame subway tasted so dry. The sauces are supposed to ooze out while eating. While this one required ketchup (i had only that in my kitchen. Isnt thats the very point of subway) And what the hell happened to lettuce and capsicum? Too bad, nvr gonna order again.', 'Cute little place in the tech park. Was happy to avail 1+1 offer. Very nicely prepared. Inspite of being a small outlet ,, All the variety of breads and sauses were available. Had a good time. We had it in the restaurant, so no problems faced. Cheers guys ..keepup the show', '', 'Ordered 3 footlong subs with specifications clearly mentioned. What got delivered is with all...yes all of the specifications violated.\n\nVery poor service.', 'I ordered sandwich with egg cheese nd chicken slice I have received the sandwich without eggs ...Aswell also I ordered salad with double meat I received the package with half of quantity in it .. whereas I m regular subway eater I m aware of it how it suppose to be ...do I get my answer for this .', 'The order was nothing that i customized for', "I ordered 4 subs from subway cv raman nagar. There were very less veggies stuffed in the subs and the types of breads ordered were delivered incorrect. They delivered plain wheat and white breads instead of garlic roasted and parmesan bread. I'm very disappointed.", 'Not a delivery-friendly venue. Cancels your order almost everytime. And if you are lucky enough to get your delivery then, be prepared to eat cold food.', 'There was no proper sauce and vegetables in sub,we ordered certain topup but nothing was there. there is lot of different when we order online n offline. Please improve it']

address: 204, 5th Main, 7th Cross, 1st Stage, Off 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Wifi, Serves Jain Food, Rooftop,
reviews:
['Had been to Imli for.dinner last night. The ambiance was good. The crowd was decent family crowd. The service was good and fast. We ordered methi paratha, onion paratha, phulkas, paneer butter masala, kadi Pelosi, paneer tikka and shikanji.
The paratha were quite big. The methi paratha was not what we expected. It hardly had methi in it. Onion paratha was tasty. Paneer butter masala was good but kadi pakodi was not so great. The pakodis were raw in the center. Paneer tikka was yummy and we loved it. The phulkas were served hot. Shikanji was refreshing.
What we did not like was there were lots if mosquitoes biting us. We complained to the staff and they kept the mosquito coil which was hardly effective.
Since it is a rooftop restaurant they should keep some sprays for mosquitoes.
Overall the good was good.. just like how we cook at home.. less oily.', 'Nice little place and loved the ambience. However the amount of tea they provide is a little too much for a normal person,they should add a cutting chai option probably.
Dahi samosa was fabulous and Sabudana Vada was served perfectly hot and crispy. Filter coffee was good too.
Prices are however a little steep in lieu with quantity.
Pro tip: Ask for imli chutney in case its not included with your food.']

address: 29, Castle Street, Ashok Nagar, Bridge Road, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Seating Not Available, Vegetarian Only,
reviews: ['This is a casual dining restaurant located near to my office so i often visit this place for breakfast. there is no sitting arrangement so you need to stand and eat just like most of the *Sagar restaurants in Banaglore. Open Dosa, Onion Dosa, Masala Dosa, Karabath are good here. sometime they make Sevgibath which is good too. Dosas are always good here but Karabath is very inconsistent in taste and sometimes oily.', '', "as food was not good we couldn't eat and dint used fresh vegetables and salt was not there in the food. Very bad food got delivered today looking for the refund.", 'Reasonable price and quick, hygiene food. Friendly staff. I like roti, dal fry and paneer butter masala. Mango milk shake is Very nice. I recommending this restaurant to my friends and family.', 'Set dosa and poori sagu super. Coconut chetny is really very good. Coffee is also desent. I am recommending this restaurant to my friends and family', 'Pongal and bisi bele bath are good taste hear. Coffee is really amazing . They have to consantret on raitha should be little bit thick. Oral is good.', 'Poori sagu and idly vada samber super. Masala dosa is excellent. Juice also desent. I like quick service. I recommend this restaurant to my friends and family.', 'Very good taste and quality also juice good everything is fine pepar masale dose and set is good taste. address: Srinivasan Towers, ESI Hospital Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Free Parking, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Outdoor Seating, Free Wifi,
reviews:
["Very fast service, courteous staff and amazing food.
Taste & plating are both top-notch. I'm really glad we chose to wait 15 mins for a table rather than going elsewhere. Definitely going to visit again üòä", 'I went here during the Navratri season to try their Navratri special menu. The ambiance was warm, with cozy seating and perfect in terms of hygiene. One thing that caught my attention was the air purifying plant kept on all the tables. Coming to food, we tried almost all the delicacies available for fast. Everything was just so perfect and well presented. Desserts and salad were my fav pick. Overall recommended.', "Small place tucked in Indiranagar that serves some deliciously different Vegetarian Indian food!

It's the place you would want to go with your family, parents or anyone who loves good food. Recommended dishes:

- Corn cake
- orange and kaafir lime
- bangkok stir fry (this is a must - the surprise element is the ingredient)
- pan fried momos
- rajma ghee khichdi

Overall gread food and amazing service!", 'one amazing vegetarian place to relish the Asian cuisine !', "This is a warm cozy restaurant run by a lovely family who are always around looking after everyone's comfort. It was a Wednesday and yet the place was surprisingly crowded, which shows that is place is becoming popular fast, and rightly so. We ordered:

Raw mango beverage - 4.5/5
Paneer shikanji - 5/5 (must, must try! The paneer is literally melt in your mouth, the best I've had in Bangalore)
Thai corn cake- 4.5/5 (different and yum!)
Khow suey - 4/5 (not the best I've had but good enough)

Cannot wait to try their rajma chawal the next time I visit.

Highly recommend this restaurant!", 'The place serves some amazing veg food with fusion
Ambience is nice and simple
Rates are affordable for the quantity they serve
I loved the shikanji paneer and coffee caramel 
The mock tails are different and refreshing
Loved the fact they use micro greens in all their dishes which they grow in house
Must visit place', 'I had a different experience at street storyss, the place is cute and has a lovely ambiance and the food is experimental so if you like new things you can check out this place. They have given their own unique modern twist to Indian dishes and the results are absolutely delicious. I loved the rajma ghee kichdi and the kokum masala. My absolute favourites from the menu.']

reviews: ['Paneer fried rice was not at all cooked well. I kind of felt weird inside stomach after eating.', 'Ordered chicken hariyali gravy. ['Best place for milkshake lovers !!

Overall very much worth for money !!', "This is by far the best Red Velvet cake I have tasted in a Sundae. The Sundae that goes by the name 'Red Riding Hood' had me intrigued and I said to myself that I think I should just see what's that. It's like any other Red Velvet cake sundae, but a better one. reviews:
['Me and my friend had gone this evening to this place. Fir me it was my 2 nd time today, as last time i had gone so review i had forgot to put. Anyway, today i ordered Elaicho tea, and other was ginger tea. Ambience was good as it is in Indiranaar so one can expect good vibes. Both tea were good. Would love to visit there soon.', "We visited Tata cha today and ordered the following

Nimbu Da (lemon) , Chatpata Churan (tangy) - both of these are black teas and we found this just average

Exotic pan choco bites - we also tried Paan flavoured chocolate that's packaged in cute boxes. This was decent.

The ambience of this cafe is really cute. And during the weekends this place is jam packed.", "Friendly environment and nice to spend time and do your work. I had the filter kappi(don't hate) as m not a big chai person. But I do love my Iced teas and was surprised that the variety was so less. If only they could have the classic lemon iced tea or something, that would be great. Iced green tea? That's an acquired taste.
Tried their poha as well and that was good. Well spiced and flavorful.", "Tata Cha is one of my favorite places to cath-up with friends. They have a variety of beverages (both hot and cold). I love the chilli guava (it's a guava crusher with chilli). They have a good huge menu with our favorite snacks available from various states of India. A few things which I tried are matar kulcha, Mumbai Vada Pao, Bun Maskafied, Poha Misal and Parsan and loved them all.", "I love the ambience and the location of the place..But i guess the it's a little overrated!

Tata Cha the name itself gives a authentic feels.
But the prices definitely doesn't!

The chicken Khichdi is a must try at this place!"]

They stick to their name and have a good range of items. The foods are fresh and tasty and im so glad they use less oil in their food. The onky dissapointment is that the food looks very different in the pictures than it actually is', '', "I'm extremely diet conscious and healthie is one of my go tos for ordering. reviews:
['Went there in a hurry enroute to movies on a Saturday morning. Was surprised to see the place open. Apparently they are open from 8 am - 11 pm on Mon to Sat.
