reviews:
['Must try the baklava, very nice crisp, perfect sugar level,perfect size , value for money. Great job team the baklava company , hats of to the production team specially', 'Staff : ok. Tried his best to serve.

Ambience : ok. Seems like this is part of another bakery.

Food : Joy knew no bounds when i found out that my favorite dish is reachable. Of course heartbroken once i tasted it. Not at all same as the one i had in Germany or turkey.
I hoped having the name of the place after the sweet "baklava" they may be having some best baklavas. But nah. Almost all were dry and some of them were way too dry.

Price : Reasonable to try.

Recommendation : It is sad that i could not find many places which sell baklava here im bangalore. So whatever is available had to be taken. But yeah I don't think i will be able to try this place again.', 'Went there yesterday and ordered three different baklavas and one cream kunafa. The baklavas were great, but I did not particularly enjoy the kunafa. I had the cream kunafa and it honestly tasted just like sugar. There was not enough quantity of cream in it. I was expecting a more elaborate taste, but it tasted just like sugar. Mediocre experience.']

reviews:
['Brownie with Blueberry and Cream - Brownie is soft, chocolaty and made of good quality ingredients. The cream and blueberries are fresh. However the whole desert is very sweet.

üó£Ô∏èüó£Ô∏èRecommendations to the restaurantüó£Ô∏èüó£Ô∏è

1. Use natural ingredients
2. Reduce sweetness
3. Keep sugar free/wheat based natural options', "If you love brownies, and are willing to shed a bomb to have a basic brownie with vanilla ice cream - the all time classic, brownie heaven could be your place.
I was here at around 10 in the night, they'd switched of the ACs and the place got really hot. Thankfully my ice cream didn't melt haha!
I ordered inthe Brownie throne which was a nice warm slice of brownie topped with chocolate wafers and vanilla ice cream.
Also ordered a brownie that was topped with a bar of dairy milk. The brownies served hot alongside cold vanilla ice cream, is the perfect forever combination and you'd wanna come back here for these!
However I feel they're pretty overpriced!", "Yummmmmmmm. That sums it up. One of the best brownies I've ever had. It was sumptuous. Service was pretty good and ambience is pretty too, has cafe type setting. I had nutty Brownie with vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce. It tasted really good.
Ambience: 4.5/5
Food: 5/5
Service: 5/5
Value for money: 4.5/5"]

address: 322, Shalini Complex, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Went there thrice. Rasmalai, kala jamun and moti choor laddus are the best there can be. Better than kanti‚Äôs. Mysore pak was also good. Rasgulla was average and sweetness was on higher side. Yet to try their chats.', "It's a place gone downhill. It used to have really good pani puri and other chat. Now it's a sad reminder of what it used to be with a poor tasting aaloo mix with no distinctive taste, a very mild and off tasting theeka paani. 50 bucks for 6 puris - hmm, definitely not worth it.\xa0
The Sunday chole, again, is a bit hyped, and feels too much on the spicy/oily side. Not coming back in a hurry!", 'Clean outlet, decent chat items. Bhel was really good. Pani Puri was too too spicy to be able to enjoy. Had kalakand to ease ourselves which was really tasty and fresh', "Went here for having their most sought after chole bhature.
It's tough to get good North Indian food Bangalore, this place breathes a smell of relief to the North Indian food lovers. Coming to the taste of Bhature, it's top notch. Best eaten when it's hot.
The taste of chole was good, wouldn't say excellent though. But, the masala flavours gave a good zing to the tongue.
In the end, a sumptuous breakfast.

Tips/Pointers for the foodies/diners:

-Pre order, else you wouldn't be able to get a plate.
-They only serve on Sunday's
-Good North Indian food is a bit expensive in Bangalore, be ready to pay 130 per plate.

Feedback for the restaurant:

-Please be a bit generous in giving refills of Chole or Aloo Sabji for the people. The server was making a sad face when we asked for refills, politeness/generosity will be much appreciated.

#Bangalore#NorthIndianFood#Sunday", 'Very good and fast delivery', 'A perfect way to start a lazy Sunday brunch. Head to Karthik Mithai for a scrumptious plate of Bhatura, served with chole and a serving of delicious aloo Mirchi. Make sure you book the servings earlier cause it is limited serving up to 200 plates.', 'Samosa Ragda, Dahi Samosa, Pani Puri and Dahi Puri - check. Great taste all of these. Particularly the samosa chat.

Gulab jamun and rasgulla too were devoured with gusto.

Very clean place and prices are surprisingly reasonable.', "The best place to have chole bhature in Bangalore. Just be mindful, it has to be ordered one day before and it's available on Sunday for breakfast."]

reviews:
['', 'Basically we went here only to try the momos and sadly there were only two options, veg and chicken! The spinach, corn etc ones are no longer here which is quite sad.
The chicken momos, definitely plump, juicy, delicious! We felt that there was egg in the filling because the taste was more egg-y than chicken-y but tasted good overall. We also tried the jaljeera and that was good too! Definitely a good place to visit.

Food: 4/5
Ambience: 3.5/5
Value for money: 4/5', 'You can have a taste of THE WORST momos here...had the veg momos which were just awful in taste.The momos were just dipped in oil and the veggies inside also had a very dominant oil taste. ever had tangy momos chutney ? Well you will be lucky to get tangy momos chutney hereüòíüòí...chicken shawarma was also average...
Roadside momos are way better than these pathetic momos.', "Their momo's are super. We had them several times and just end up wanting more. Next time want to the bhel style which looked great on the menu photo. Keep it up guys.", "Chotta dhukaan bada dhamaka... what amazing food. Me and my colleague went after office we were super hungry... we tried herbed egg sandwich, chicken and cheese momos and chicken roll shawarma. OMG what amazing food. Best place to hangout and eat.
#Specially BHel Momos are very unique ! 
Had this type of taste for the first time.', 'Very small cute place on the same lane as metro station/cafe coffee day/chung‚Äôs...about 200 mtr walk from the station.

We had a Classic Chicken Shawarma, Tea n Coffee. 
Not a big fan of the tea n coffee, but do go for the shawarmas n the ice tea. 
Can try out this place...', 'Incredibly tasty shawarma. We also had momos, sandwich and hot chocolate which was great but shawarma is a must try.

reviews:
["Drove across town when I heard about this place. 2nd floor, lift available. Nice spacious n airy seating area. Staff is friendly. The plates are of a poor quality n light plastic. Could be better.
Chose the following for lunch...
Solkadi...don't miss. Very good, right spice.
Pomfret fry...good. Masala on it, okok.
Mutton ghee roast...a let down. Boiled mutton put in a masala but no taste, there was ghee though in it.
Chapatis...2 per plate. Ok.
Omelette.. eggs can't go wrong. Ok.
Sannas...very good, steaming hot. Soft. Well fermented.
In today's day n age, they gave us onion n lime. Tks.
They also gave a spiced curry for free as a side.
Didn't order any dessert.
Fingerbowl is given on the table.
1200 approx.
Food quality could be better."]

cuisines: Healthy Food, Chinese, South Indian, Beverages
address: 756, Shri Krishna Temple Road, Near HDFC Bank, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Wifi,
reviews: ['Dhyana is a lovely little cafe. Everything about this place is thoughtful, and absolutely lives up to its name. The menu is varied, simple and innovative. Needless to say, most of the food on the menu are healthy. We loved the Buddha bowl, and the protein dosa. The paneer roll was average, so was the dessert. All in all, if you want to have some lone time sipping tea, or enjoy time with friends over wonderful conversations, and enjoy clean eating, Dhyaana is definitely a good place to go.']

more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Noodle', 'Hakka Noodles', 'Kung Pao Chicken', 'Egg Fried Rice', 'Lime Soda', 'Veg Manchow Soup', 'Shanghai Fried Rice']
reviews: ['All the food is just excellent, when you eat Indian chinese food you tend to see too much oil in the food. Here its just perfect, not much oil and great taste.\nIts a fav place for visit wheneve we are in Indranagar.', 'Looking for a great Indian-Chinese meal in Indiranagar and whereabouts? Look no further than Bangalore Mandarin! Neat little place on Indiranagar Double Road, it will bound to make you satiating for more.The restaurant is decently decorated, nothing fancy. The menu is super elaborate and gives you a wide variety of options to choose from for every course. Do try their hot and sour variety of soups with wantons. Chicken spring rolls are an absolute crowd pleaser. I forget the name of the chicken starter we had, but it was chicken strips with some chilli flakes and it was out of this world (probably Hunan chicken). A must have. The servings and portion sizes are sumptuous and very generous.\xa0Multiple visits to Bangalore Mandarin are warranted for an exquisite Indo-Chinese culinary experience.', 'A good option for those Chinense cravings kinda day. Lovely ambience and decor, smooth service too. Soup, noodles, rice or appetizers all of it were great to taste and quantity was good too.']

address: 621/B, G-05, Ground Floor, 12th Main, Hal Second Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi,
reviews:
['The Cup Chronicles Cafe is a concept cafe for business or college crowd to hangout for long and people who like to work from a place. Concept also have sketch pens to decorate your own cup which is duly presented on the wall.
The recommended dishes are :
üî∏Kulhad Chai
üî∏Cheese Balls
üî∏The Mexican pizza

You can hangout as long as you want here with free wifi and make your work from somewhere fun. The food is pocket friendly priced.
                                                foodndestinations.com', 'Came across this place in TGF Indiranagar exploration videos. Small place which focusses more on people who are going to spend a long time in that cafe. There are things one can do to pass time, like games. What is most interesting is, they can provide you with sketch pens and paper cups to draw over them and you can keep them for display. The ambience is pretty good. Coming to food, it is really expensive and the quantity too is very less, but taste is awesome. So one has the tradeoffs as well as the pros. Suited as per need.']

address: 218, Near BDA Complex, Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: City View, Indoor Seating, Kid Friendly, Vegan Options, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Gluten Free Options,
reviews:
['Grilled corn is something i crave for this chilled weather in Bangalore, This place serves grilled corn with loads of cheese and flavours. Roasted zucchini and corn served with tortillas and chopped zucchini and corn burrito bowl was really good but was a little spicy. Service is not that great. They took a lot of time to serve food.', "Visited this place for lunch with my office colleagues. The place wasn't too crowded when we got there so that's a plus. We found a table we liked quickly. The ambience is decent, could be better. Coming to the food, we ordered mushroom Nachos, Tacos with beans and mushroom and caramelized onions, Burrito, and some drinks. The food was really good! The salsa and and the peanut dips were amazing, as was the guacamole. But the star of the show has to be Churros. I've had Churros at quite a places and liked some. But their preparation outdid everything I'd tasted earlier. The Churros were crisp from outside, soft inside, coated in sugar and drizzled with cinnamon. And they're served with chocolate dip! Best preparation I've had. I'd give it 5 starts but the ambience was slightly not upto what I expected. Nevertheless, the food and service and staff is brilliant. Definitely recommend! Would visit again soon and stuff myself with Churros üòÉ", "Well, heard about this Mexican place from a friend of mine.
This little place is a gem. Nice location and easy to find.
This restaurant serves only Mexican food, and good Mexican food.
Loved the ambience of this place and so the service. Quick service and very responsive.
Tried out their, Beef grilled Taco's and Grilled Chicken Taco's.
Grilled chicken tacos was good, but grilled beef taco was something amazing, I just loved it. So juicy and creamy, and the beef was very well cooked.
We ordered a drink made out of Tamarind, oh I tell you , it's very sour (obviously, Tamarind). I couldn't finish it. üòÖ
Prices are very much reasonable.
Overall experience was really good and a decent place to have Mexican food.
Chinita Real Mexican Food", 'Decent place on top of a garage. Ambience is all wooden and lively. Light Mexican music in the background. Food is great. Tried the tosatadas, the enchilada and the hot chocolate.
4 star because the whole area is split in two and inside, ambience is wierd.', 'Great place for a quick and filling bite. Tried two of their burritos, which were made well, would love to go back again for more. Very minimal yet decent ambiance, and helpful service staff.']

reviews: ["Good Meal Options. Authentic North Indian taste. The highlight of this place is it's dehati chicken. Hope this place will maintain the quality and quantity with a good services here in Bangalore.", 'Ordered Dal Chawal Pressure Cooker Chicken Combo and aloo samosa.Food was excellent in taste especially their chicken.\nChicken curry was tasty, chicken was well cooked and soft. The chicken taste was completely homely and loved every bite of it. The Philly‚Äôs were also soft and were home style. Delivery was also on time.']

Dishes

Ambience: 4.0', "We dropped in just to have a couple of drinks on a Sunday night and fell in love with the ambience of the place..it's a small cute place with sassy interiors and perfect lightings. more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', '', 'Delicious east Indian food. Brings the flavor of Odisha and West Bengal to you. Pocket-friendly and you get a good number of items to choose from.', "Request you to all customers please don't refer this hotel else you will get food poisoning what I felt today .I paid 330 rupees for rice, egg curry with dal,bhalta. It looks so spicy and tasty but quality of food like waste and using rotten egg in curry .", 'Desi odia food is the main part the place belongs to.. the mutton curry and chiken curry will melt your mouth with yummy taste. Pakhala will also give you the feel of odisha. Desert are less in to menu but rasgulla is the best in taste here', 'Compare to other posh restaurants in Indira nagar, Little Orissa is a hidden gem. If you are from Orissa then this is a must visit place for you. This small restaurant can accommodate about 20 people. We recently visited this place to have Summer Special Pakhala and loved it.\xa0

Do check out their Mutton kasa, Badi chura, baiguni, Pohola macha, sorisa besara and chena poda as well. Dead cheap price, high quality and lovely service.Will visit soon. :)', 'Awesome place for odia people. They cook food very ethentic way. I was there on last week. I went there for only Summer special PAKHALA.

That was great like home. Badi chura, Saga bhaja, Baigani, Chatu (Mushrooms) Ambula Besara. My friend Vyshak ordered Mutton kasha, Pohola macha (Fish) Sorisa besara and Chena poda.

Saga bhaja was not good but other things are very tasty. Price is little high. Service also good.

Food- 5/ 5

Ambiance- 5/ 2

Service- 5/ 4

Cost - 5/ 3', 'I have been to this place quite a number of times. Feeling lazy ? Broke ? Craving for home food ? Close your eyes and head to this place. It‚Äôs easy to miss out this place because topographically it‚Äôs in between one of the many houses in indiranagar. A small place with a even smaller kitchen which serves home cooked food. Their food is simple, their service is quick and they are super cheap. I personally love their handi mansa ( mutton cooked in earthern pot ), machha besara. They do have an elaborate menu but they can always customise dishes based on your demands and needs. A decent place to help you during your month end crisis üòÅ', 'Craving for oriya food, then this is the place. Mutton curry tasted like homemade with rice. A must visit place for people from odisha. Planning again sometime next week.', 'The place is in a very narrow street of Indiranagar. We had fish curry, chicken kassa, egg chicken tadka, rice and rotis. The preparation was authentic Odia and the food was delicious with the right spices mix. We enjoyed a cottage cheese delicacy chenna podo as well.']

Very much annoyed.', 'I ordered chicken biryani from this restaurant. It was smelling too odd I was unable to eat. I just disposed it. Please give us a quality food we pay u money your not giving us free na so. Hope u understand of our money value. If I hurted u sorry k.', 'I paid nearly 300 bucks have the privilege of eating this chicken tikka oil with an incredibly generous half piece of naan.Horrible experience.Dont make the same mistake of having anything delivered from here.', 'Great great great food and hospitality.
Food was just fabulous.
Table host just made the day great experience.
Highly recommended.
Must try.']

restaurant_name: The Fatty Bao - Asian Gastro Bar
address: 610, 3rd Floor, 12th Main, Off 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wine, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['This place has been in my bookmarks for a while now. I finally got to visit this place on a busy Saturday, it was actually crowded. It attracts a lot of crowd so it‚Äôs better to book a table. I absolutely loved the food. The spinach and chicken dumplings were delicious and the ramen was perfect for the weather. It is a little expensive but worth every penny. Had a great experience here at fatty bao.', "Their teriyaki glazed chicken bao is to die for ! Beautifully cooked soft chicken stuffed in a bao, with the perfect amount of sauce and like this sweet after taste. Also, their wild mushroom and truffle oil dimsums are lovely! Truffle oil, I assume has a peculiar taste but it didnt bother me at all, I still loved the taste ! They have the nicest staff and a great ambience ! It's lovely for a cozy quiet dinner :) highly recommend!", "This place certainly lives up to the hype. There was an issue with our reservation but the manager was super helpful and cleared it up. The place is very busy so reservations are a must if you don't want to wait for a long time.
The food is very good, the service is prompt and their recommendations certainly turned out right. I also liked that the ambience is cosy and was great for long conversations without loud music blaring through the speakers.
We tried the bao, sushi, ramens and noodles. They were all fantastic. Had no space for dessert but was persuaded by our server to try their signature dish and I am glad we didn't miss it.
Awesome lunching experience.", 'We visited on a weekday. The staff was courteous and showed us to our seats. We ordered bao, sushi, dimsums, KFC. We ordered two baos, duck bao and pulled pork bao of which the duck one was my favorite. Ordered salmon sushi, you can order a 4 pieces plate or 8 pieces plate. It was served with wasabi and soy sauce. It was yum. We also ordered a dimsum and Korean fried chicken which was kinda spicy. Overall it was extremely satisfying and I will definitely go back for the bao', "Nice place. Difficult to get reservations on a Sunday evening.
We just felt like having some Asian food, came across this place. Heard a lot about before and it didn't dissapoint.

We ordered a some Sangria, they serve only wine. Although I would love them to serve some beer as well.

We ordered bao, a veg dish, the famous pork belly and sushi. Each one was well made and delicious.

The table arrangements probably could be a bit better.
And beer could certainly improve the overall experience :)", 'Finally got one more olive restaurant off the list. Good food , crisp service , nothing much to complain about other than its Too far for frequent visits though....

Rainbow roll ,
Crab and prawn Bao
Spicy salmon roll
Spicy chicken and celery gyoza
Edamame, chilli , garlic dimsum
Jasmine tea
Brie tempura
Japanese cheesecake
Warm apricot pudding

Value for money and hdfc card holders get a 15% discount as well....
                                                thegastronomix.net', "My favourite Asian restaurant in Bangalore ! Have been here quite a few times, finally writing a review. I love their open rooftop seating with the high chairs. The ambience inside is beautiful as well. My favourite thing to order is their dimsums, I love their chestnut dimsum(it's my favourite). For mains I like ordering their bowls which are very filling, the laksa being my favourite.
The service is prompt and the staff is very polite and helpful with respect to the menu. (They know what and how dishes taste like,so they guide you while taking the order keeping your preference in mind).
I will definitely go back here to try more items from their menu to write a detailed review.", "https://goo.gl/maps/EWwqR1oRXb8JDAh47

A lovely Asean joint, well cooked, great taste and superb service - go there with a pre reservation - thoroughly satisfied , don't miss Sushi n Ramen there", 'Best Japanese cuisine I ever had .
We tried too many dishes out there.
The prawns and chilly Bao were the best ones.
Sushi was well made. I tried oysters for the first time and I would definitely recommend to try oysters here.
In dessert we had fatty hill which had chocolate mousse with peppermint in the middle of the pyramid and the pyramid was made of crunchy chocolate chips served with ice cream.

The staff was very helpful and they made sure we devour all the dishes nicely. The service was quick. As the place is quite famous, recommend advance booking here. We had to wait for an hour to get inside but the wait was worth it.

Very satisfied with the experience.']

cuisines: South Indian, Fast Food, Chinese, North Indian, Street Food

address: 468, 9th Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Churros', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Chocolate Banana', 'Double Chocolate Shake', 'Chicken Wings', 'Empanadas', 'Caramel Dip']
reviews:
['Lovely place serving some great churros in the heart of Indiranagar.
You get to try churros with a sauce of your choice - dark chocolate sauce, or white sauce.
You also can customize and go either with plain churros in a pack of 3 or more, or loaded churros with Nutella, banana or more.
Perfect for date nights, or outings with your gang.
Must visit.', "A small young cafe for churros, a Spanish Street food hero snack. We tried chocolate, caramel, and peanut butter churros. Delicious. Must try. Churros are very different snack from traditional desserts. We also tried here rice esplanada, loaded nachos and caramel and hazelnut cold coffee. Evrything's just good and worth trying.
Sure give a visit here and try churros. Available on every leading home delivery apps.", 'It‚Äôs a small cafe in Indranagar serves amazing churros.. must try their Spanish omelette tortillas it‚Äôs really amazing and very fluffy.. never had anything like that before.. really loved it.. their churros was well made and tested delicious.. they also have good variety of milkshakes - tried choco mocha it‚Äôs really good.. a good experience.. nice service .. a must try place üëåüèªüëçüèª', 'GOBBLE UP CHURROS is a cute small place located in Indiranagar. There are not much places that serves Churros, a spanish dish. Ambiance is okay but the service is quick. I had a pleasant experience there because the dishes had quite exquisite flavours. I loved the chicken wings, they were juicy with the balanced spicy and sweet touch. Churro pops was nice. The presentation was really nice as they decorated it really well.
The food i ordered :
Churro pops
Regular strips
Dark chocolate gems churros
Hazlenut churro sundae

I would rate it :

Ambiance: 3/5
Food: 4.5/5
Presentation: 4.5/5
Taste: 4.5 /5
GO/NO-GO : GO

Great work team!', 'We went here late night to get dessert. Our order was a Salted Caramel Churro Sundae, and it was such a nightmare. The peanuts tastes and smelt so old, and the salted caramel was so runny. It was not a nice experience at all, the person handling at the counter does not know how to take complaints.']

address: 493, 13th Cross, 2nd Stage, Behind BDA Complex, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'I paid 275 for a butter dosa ana tea. They only delivered dosa. Never answered by call there after. This is pure cheating!', 'I visited this place last sunday for breakfast after seeing a long queue in MTR. But we were not disappointed. We ordered mango podi dosa, chilly cheese dosa, open masala dosa, idli vada and paddu.
I liked the mango masala dosa and open masala dosa. Everything was extra oily that was the only downside.', '', 'Good place for a quick bite..all the items on the menu are good.
Dont foget to try the avalakai dosa and coffee.
Its a self service joint...', "Amongst all their outlets ,the avlakki dosa is the most consistent and fluffy here .It's a great pairing with the onion chutney that they serve", 'Loved the avalakki dosa,savige bath(though was not hot, loved it) ,idli sambar. Masala dosa was okayish. Filter coffee is a must have for all coffee lovers.However,it was given in a glass (like a chai)rather than the authentic way of serving the coffee. Kesari bath- ITS JUST WOW!Overall loved the place. Just for the masala dosa,I have reduced 1 star.', "This is a small but place visited by the locals or by the people who work in the vicinity. They have a very limited menu but the taste is very authentic l than most popular south indian places in Bangalore.I wish they didn't close their place as early as 8 pm :(", "Love South Indian and want it to be pocket friendly too? Then this is the place to eat!
What to try :
1. The podi idli : The idli covered in ghee and podi is just blissful. An absolute favorite

2. The masala dosa : It's good. Not the best I have had though

3. Filter coffee : who said filter coffee was just a Tamil thing. The filter kaapi here was a killer !

4. The Kesar bath : a chunk of kesari. It's of the right consistency, filled with ghee, but a lovely dessert to end it. (Best for 2 )
.
.
A South Indian breakfast spot which is a must try in Banglore !

Thefoodfella rating : 3.8/5 
                                                thefoodfella.wordpress.com", 'The idli and chutney are to die for. Soul food. Nice. Varieties of pudi can be experimented with. Coffee here is goood. Can walk out with a cup of coffee and light a smoke. Good combination']

address: 57, 3rd Floor, Phoenix Building, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'We went on a Saturday night and the restaurant did not have almost half of the items mentioned on its menu. So much so I had to tell the waiter to tell me what he has so that I could order accordingly. Also the price seemed high considering the ambience', 'Authentic Chinese food, absolutely delicious. Staff is very kind. A must-visit for all foodies!', 'Finally a ‚ÄúReal‚Äù Chinese restaurant in Bangalore. It‚Äôs the only place in this part of the country to get authentic Sichuan food! And it‚Äôs SOO Good!', "Authentic Chinese experience. The food, the chef, the ambience. It's not the typical indianized Chinese food that we typically get.

The pork and beef are ambitious, the vegetable succulent. Overall it's a gastronomic experience reserved for an adventurous palate.

The desserts are something that aren't known for in Chinese cuisine

I love the food here, and would definitely visit again", 'The only real authentic Chinese food in town with a real Chinese chef, reasonable price for large portion of dishes. The only issue is that the waiters need more training on servicing.']

address: 158, Near Sai Baba Temple Road, 1st Main, Koramangala 7th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Smoking Area, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Very poor quality and service. And the behaviour of the staff was very harsh..', 'Getting to have decent Kolkata biryani is a task in itself. Lazeez is a sore disappointment. So after checking out the reviews we went to Aalishan.
Ordered chicken tandoori and chicken biryani for me and hubstar had mutton biryani.
The tandoori was juicy and soft. The biryani was great. Aloo cooked to perfection. Portion size too is a lot for one person.
Definitely going back here again whenever the craving for Kolkata style biryani kicks in.
                                                slurpbite.wordpress.com']

address: 410, 7th Cross, Domlur Layout, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['I ordered for faluda but they gave me fruit salad so disappointed and i ordered for chocolate ice cream and it was melted really disappointing i heard good reviews about this restaurant but never thought i will get disappointed pls refund my amount or deliver me a right order', "Not accepting delivery now... Why.. I think they should be conscious about it.. They should improve their business... Wht z this I mean plss don't play with customers..", 'worst drink that I ever seen also the packing and the plastic glass was not yet clean', "One day I visited to Under The Tree, at the time I was too hungry and thirsty. I ordered Chocolate milk shake and Sandwich, and it was really fabulous. And the atmosphere also very Good and service also ambience. And I am recommending my friends to visit this place. Don't miss it.", 'Order a fruit salad with ice cream it had a big amul venilla scoops and big ball fillad with fresh fruits and honey at chocolate sauces simply loved it...', 'good try for cafe snacks', 'Got a cake for my friends birthday. Looked pretty decent and taste wise it was average too but then we found hair in the cake. So disgusting. Never going to this place!!', "Food - 3.0
Ambiance - 2.5
Service - 4.0
Value for money - 3.0

I felt that the seating area was very unhygienic. It just felt sticky everywhere on the table and the chairs were somewhat wet. So I don't recommend this place for like a group hangout.

They make some puffs, cutlets and such bakery items as well as some cakes and pastries. They also have a juice bar with some variations. It's a good place if you're really hungry and want to have a quick snack or something. Nothing too great. Their cakes look very lifeless though.

I had a chicken puff at just 20 rupeess which was good price wise but the taste was just sub par. I complimented this with a mint lime soda which was refreshing. All in all I spent just 50 rupeess.

address: 122B, 2nd Floor, KHB Colony, 1st A Cross Road, Koramangala 5th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Board Games, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Wifi, Live Music,
reviews:
['It is more like a place to hangout or chill, especially for students as it is close to JNC on the most busiest Street of kormangala.

They have books and games for leisure, so you can have fun while eating or if you plan to laze around for awhile.

The prawns were delicious and steaks to my surprise was quite tasty.

Reasonable yet tasty food', 'Nice place to hangout with friends. Price is reasonable.Taste is also good. They accept zomato gold as well. Liked the place. Chicken steak with barbeq sauce was too yummy..', 'Excellent food and ambiance. Waiter are also very courteous. They did not take much time to prepare the food. You can spend a very good time with good books here. I have loved the steak, fish and chips,lemon butter fish.

In dessert caramel pudding and fried ice cream both were really tasty. Overall i spent a good time here.', 'Lovely and cozy ambience with bunch of games to have lively experience with someone special. Great music üëå.
Dishes
Ratatouille ( grilled vegetables in cheese and pasta sauce üòã. Give it a try )
Paprika penne pasta ( they put very less sauce so we asked to cook it with more sauce. Not good taste need to improve )

Drinks
Black current granita ( crushed ice with black current flavour. Not so good )
Passion fruit mojito ( tasted like virgin mojito.)', 'So we had a late night movie to catch at Forum Mall and plan was to chill late evening at some cafe and that‚Äôs how we landed here. Zomato Gold was another incentive of going to this place. Went there with zero expectations and the place turned out really well. Mocktails and Smoothie were refreshing, fish fingers were nice, fried prawns were a disappointment. Ambience is really nice, entry to this place seems little shady but the cafe is really beautiful.', 'York St is very easy to locate, but is probably one of the quieter places in Koramangala. Loved the food, ambience and service. The gravy in the cottage cheese steak was absolutely amazing. The prices are affordable and the portions justify the prices. Added bonus if you have Gold. All in all, a wonderful place, would definitely visit again.', 'York St. is the perfect place for your economy lunches and dinners. The menu is both compact and balanced and the variety of options available makes its a must visit place.

Our orders :-

üëâ Loaded Nachos - Cheese and Mexican beans to go with salsa. Loaded nachos one of my all time favorites and I was very happy with the one offered here.
üëâ Pasta Marinara - Sauce was on point and the penne tasted really good
üëâ The steak and beef burgers along with the chicken starters were also very good.

Thank you, Team York St.', 'A calm and beautiful cafe on a very busy road. Pleasing interiors. Great service. Mocktails were refreshing and even the food quantity and quality is good enough.', "Loved the fisherman's bake which had a great creamy cheesy flavour. Unfortunately didn't really like the highly recommended Beef Stronganoff - we felt it had way too much of rice and less meat. The ambience and the place was pretty chill and good service too..

Zomato Gold surely helped :D
Will surely revisit to try other dishes.", "A very beautiful well organized cafe which serves Continental dishes. We had Fisherman's choice as starter which was quite decent in taste, triple decker chicken which is a must try, Fisherman's bake which was disappointing in quantity wise. Ambience is good."]

address: 136, Ground Floor, 1st Cross, 5th Block, Jyoti Niwas College Road, Koramangala 5th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Wifi, Buffet, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['A must visit place if you love Chinese food. They have a great menu which caters to every type of taste buds.

I visited them for their sea food festival and I was very overwhelmed by the new additions.

My favorites were:

Grilled fish cakes - Soft fish cakes which melt in your mouth.

Fish with orange and black beans - Great flavour and goes well with the fried rice.

Fried Bombay duck - Perfect fried batter fish.

Chocolate dome with warm chocolate sauce - Crazy Dessert to finish proceedings.

The whole meal paired with red wine will be a night to remember.', 'Went during the curry festival and tried following dishes

ü•¢Thai clay pot chicken.
ü•¢Thai jungle curry with lotus stem
ü•¢Caramelised tofu in clay pot.
ü•¢Indonesian vegetables with cottage cheese.
ü•¢Thai Yellow curry

All the dishes were very well prepared and quite tasty.', "Asia Kitchen is one of the best for pan-asian delicacies in the neighborhood. Each time I visit Asia Kitchen, I appreciate the consistency. Seafood and Wine Festival kick-started at Asia Kitchen earlier this week and I knew I need to visit it soon.

Chef Manzil and team has done a great job as always. It is impossible to pick a favorite. I loved the flavour of the fishcake. Prawn dimsums also taste perfect. Bombay duck melt-in-the-mouth. I would recommend the fish in Orange sauce too. Crab was also well prepared. I'm definitely heading back for more.", 'A great place to visit if you love chinese food. Once you enter, you will get those chinese vibes. The menu is great, lots of option. (They give you tablet as menu). Even drinks are available. As complimentary they give you masala gola. The food is awesome and you definitely have to try the dumplings. They will melt in the mouth. The only cons i found is that, they use a bit more oil to cook.', "It was a much awaited visit to Asia Kitchen. We arrived late, thanks to the traffic but staff was courteous, made us feel comfortable.
Rest all was just average. The starters , main course and deserts.
Few things worth mentioning was the fish starter and main course and the chicken dim sum.
Overall it's not worth the travel of 25+ km in Bangalore traffic for this food, lots of better option nearby.", '.
üç≤Crazy about Asian style curries; head to Asia Kitchen by Mainland China where you can savour on curries inspired by the places in Southeast Asia like China, Japan, Indonesia,BurmaThai n Malaysia in their ongoing curry Festival .
.
üç≤On my table
üçΩÔ∏èIndonesian vegetables with cottage cheese.
üçΩÔ∏èCaramelised tofu in clay pot.
üçΩÔ∏èSouth Vietnamese fish curry with dil
leaves.
üçΩÔ∏èThai jungle curry with lotus stem.
üçΩÔ∏èThai Yellow curry.
üçΩÔ∏èThai clay pot chicken.
üçΩÔ∏èLamb shank rendang curry.
.
üç≤The scrumptious flavours, bright colors, exotic ingredients of these warming Asian curries will definitely delight your palate.
The Chef added a zing to the dishes with authentic spices , curry paste n ingredients , procured from some southeast nations and curated the menu keeping Indian taste in mind.
.
üç≤For anyone who love Southeast Asian flavours, must give this a try. .
                                                bytetrails.com', 'Many time I went there for lunch or dinner. The food quality never disappointed me. Mainly I ordered most of the time burnt garlic noodles, chilli fish, burnt garlic chicken. Smoked chicken was delicious. I liked the complimentary sorts and the presentation. The staff were very courteous. I recommend this place who love Pan Asian cousin.', 'Amazing buffet and mocktails. The starters lacked variety, but the quality of food made up for it. The main course was amazing, the fish curry was delectable and the crab curry was amazing too. Will definitely visit this place again and again.']

address: 4121, LR Arcade, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Valet Parking Available, Live Music, Table reservation required, Smoking Area, Buffet, Nightlife, Craft Beer, Outdoor Seating, Rooftop, Wifi,
reviews:
['Disappointed with the food variety and taste.', 'For those passionate about gourmet dishes plus drinks, and fancy having it under the starry sky, The Star Lounge at Big Pitcher is a perfect spot to hit. The venue is nestled at the top floor of the Big Pitcher‚Äôs 5 storeyed building ; a club, microbrewery, discotheque being housed on other levels. \xa0But if it‚Äôs the Bangalore‚Äôs beautiful weather you seek to soak up while enjoying the good food, then definitely move \xa0all the way up to the Star Lounge.
                                                ...Read full post on bytetrails.com', 'We went there last evening for some quick drinks and bites... Since it was around 3 pm, it was happy hours and it was 1:1 on all drinks... Got to try the in house brewed Lager and Wheat beers... Ordered an assorted kabab platter which had mutton, chicken, fish and prawns and was very good in taste... Great ambience, great service and a wide array of food and drinks to chose from... What more does one look for in a pub... Strongly recommended...', "It's a damn cool place especially during party night. The starters is amazing except for vegetarian dish. Hard drinks is better compared to their specific cocktails. Even though the dance floor is small but the DJ is incredible so you'll enjoy like anything during Bollywood night.", "A beautiful place for dinner, clubbing, and drinks. The food here is good and tasty. Its costly but worth it. There is a pub too so you can chill, dance and have fun. It's a nice place for hanging out with friends.", 'I loved everything about this place. I have been here a number of times. I have ordered chicken, beef, cheese balls, chicken cooked in curry paste, Fish and everything tastes so good. Also their beer. Special thanks to David and Sukumar for their lovely and apt service every time I went there. I will definitely be there again. Also special mention for the DJ , awesome music.', "Pathetic hospitality. Staff is not well aware about the restaurant policies and it's tie ups with third parties.

A customer like me who doesn't really fight for these issues has to pay the full price instead of availing the offers clearly applicable.

In short staff should be more aware and there should be better resolutions for such issues.", 'So, Nice place for those great beers üçª average mock-tails n good starters. I loved the fish n prawns from their bbq...mock tails are good too, loved the coconut flavoured one ...! So this starter session is very good n they do not have non veg pizza in buffet, o we did not get. Main course is average...sweet side is good. Nice place which was crowded on a week day too...so it‚Äôs a busy place and still each one is taken care of..thanks guys!', "BIG PITCHER is a pub which is located at Old Airport Road. The place is huge as it's got many floors and each floor has different Ambience and different seating options and i like the way the place has been made. Big Pitcher also has a rooftop which is so amazing. i really love the lighting of the place.
Service was good and quick and i was happy with that.
Staff Behaviour also was at best and they were friends and interactive and welcoming.
Food was just amazing, we tried all their dishes and they all turned out to be great. Drinka were well blended as well and perfect mocktail they made i felt. what else do you want, GOOD FOOD, GOOD DRINKS AND GOOD PLACE WITH GOOD COMPANY. this place is define chillout spot for me from now on.

MY RATING : 5/5

Ambience : 5/5
Service : 5/5
Staff Behaviour : 5/5
Food : 5/5
Drinks : 5/5

Do try out this place guys and also have a lovely day ahead. Make sure to follow me here and on Instagram : bangalore_foodtales
Take Care and bye now ‚ù§Ô∏è", 'If you are ever near Murgeshpalya / Domlur, and can‚Äôt decide on whether you want to go for a rooftop restaurant / dance floor to groove / have drinks at the bar, BiG Pitcher is the all-in-one place with every possible combination of a restro-bar you‚Äôd think of. 

The staff is humble, if the weather is favourable I‚Äôd recommend rooftop for chilling but you can‚Äôt apply Zomato Gold on the rooftop so decide beforehand.

Plus, the food is great too, though it burns a hole in your pocket. The Drunken Sicilian pizza aka Fire Pizza here is the most sought after as it is flamb√®ed with Vodka!

Update: The Druken Sicilian Pizza is removed from the menuüò∂ and Bois can‚Äôt visit the dance floor in denim shorts / without shoes so choose wisely!']

address: 60, 1st Floor, GNR Enclave, Indiranagar Double Road, Appareddy Palya, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews:
["I've ordered food from here multiple times via swiggy and zomato. Not sure if they have a physical hotel space. The food has been good and neat till now, I've not faced any issue with quantity or quality.", 'Ordered Chicken Biryani combo and phirni via swiggy. The combo was amazing tasty biryani, great kababs and delicious gulam jamun as well a must try. Phirni was tasty but too sweet please reduce sweet and it will be great too.', 'Taste of kidney beans was amazing. Quantity was enough for 1 person.

I ordered so many other restaurants what taste of kidney beans not so good. But after long time I had very tasty kidney beans.', "I have ordered the following from this restaurant

1. Dosa, Chicken curry
It was quite delicious. The chicken curry was pretty good, adequate quantity for one person (4 curry cut pieces). The dosa was also not too oily.

2. Chapati, Egg burji
The quantity of egg burji in this portion can easily be shared. The chapati was also soft.

3. Buttermilk
The seasoning of buttermilk was slightly more. So I wasn't a great fan of the buttermilk.", 'Horrible experience. I ordered food from here and it was greasy like anything and had smell of stale food. If you want to ruin your appetite and mood, go ahead and try this place.', 'Horrible Experience ! I was so hungry and ordered food fro FRESH BITE ,Irony is this name is not suitable for this restaurant because food was stinking and it no doubt it was stale food.
How can they even do this a customer during lunch time,trust me ,this people are just making money not bothered about us!
Higly ! recommended ! not to order any thing !', 'Horrible food. Extremely oily. The kadai paneer has 4-5 small pieces of paneer and the chicken had the left over pieces that usually no one eats. address: 726, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['Excellent cakes and really not expensive !
#pie almond #cakes #macaron #delicious #friendly
Really you should try at least one time one of their cakes', 'I was looking to pick up a cake and dropped by to try came Genie. Picked up a half kg strawberry cake.
It wasnt that great, It was too sweet, the cake wasnt fresh as it seems to look, I‚Äôd much rather stick to just bake rather than cake genie.', 'Wonderful food, wonderful place and wonderful people...no words to speak but have you EVER heard of bakery that would melt in your mouth,..be it cupcakes to mudpies to brownies to my favorite tiny bakes, the "blondies". If you have a sweet tooth or a savory, and do want to have a pocket friendly experience Cake Genie is the place to go!! Added to that, the Owner Vijay is an absolute gentleman to the core and gives me FREEBIES at the end of the day (yes you heard it right!! lasagna and sandwiches just to taste). How can I forget.. love you guys!! Telling all I know about you all', 'A friend requested me to pick up their order from this p√¢tisserie, I was impressed by their affordable prices without compromising quality.
I would highly recommend the seasonal strawberry cheesecake and the mud-pie has a nice biscuit base with some coffee essence on top of the chocolate ganache. Anyone in need of party cupcakes will be happy with their selection as well.', 'Fresh and delicious, right from the red velvet cupcake to their blueberry cheesecake, their melt in mouth treats will leave you craving for more. The mixed fruit gateau and pineapple gateau is loaded with fresh fruits and layered with light, fluffy cream and is easily one of the best cakes on the menu.', 'Probably the tastiest cheesecakes I‚Äôve had in quite a long time. Would recommend it over some  of the more popular bake houses around. Not just the cheesecake, even the apple pie which I‚Äôm generally not a huge fan of was pretty neat. The chocolate mousse also one of the highlights of this little place.', 'Over the past 2 years, I have been to this place a few times. The cakes tasted delicious and based on faith, I ordered chocolate truffle for a birthday today. What resulted was utter disappointment and embarrassment.. The cake was dry and flaky , the cherries were sour. It looked delicious from the outside, but was quite contrary when consumed.
I called the shop immediately to express my concern, but the lady who answered the phone was defensive and parroted "Our cakes are fresh" and paid no heed. I didn't know what to say when the mistake is swept under the rug. Hope they learn.', 'The pine apple cake was moist and yum. At first I thought, is this real! Can cake really be this way but the way the flavour holds together convinces you that you were meant to be. Order cake. Order pineapple. Save the world.', 'Shittiest cake shop I have been to, in Bangalore . Pastries served here were spoiled , when I complained the person at the counter offered me another from the same lot saying "maybe" this one is good . Overpriced plus your pastries suck', "Stopped by for Getting few Takeaways , The Lemon Cake Was Like ACID Drops in between each bite, The Pastries were Hard and Smelled Old , The Donut Was Round that's all.. Have some quality check before serving your so called food to customers ...With  Shubha Thomas"]

address: Carlton Towers, Near Diamond District Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["One must try aloo paratha and peri peri fries. It's really good. The ambience is also nice.
If you are really a food lover I'll recommend you to visit bhookha sher restaurant once", "I ordered French fries, packing is good and taste is awesome. Process of cooking didn't took much time, I got my order in 20 min. Thank you for such wonderful food", 'Had crispy corn from Bhookha Sher. It was delicious and finely cooked with added spices making it mouth watering. Really a good touch of the Chef.', 'Food was delicious. Highly recommended must visit. Sandwiche are really good. French Fries are also very tasty. I am impressed and will definitely order again and again. Try once you will never regret.', 'Ordered a non veg caesar salad and veg sandwich. The food is just ok. The salad barely had any chicken in it. And had way too much croutons, which made the salad taste very oily. The sandwich also wasnt that great. Filling was just tomatoes and cucumbers.', "Tasty food which makes us to order again and again.
Masala omlete properly coocked with onion and tomato's
Toast given with butter and jam
Yummy üòÉ", "Recently 3 days ago to be precise through Zomato I ordered 2 breakfast from single serving ( bread omelet & one masala omelet) for my aunt at home who is a patient and it was a pathetic service from the restaurant side.

The bread toasts weren't sent & the masala omelet was seriously sad, spite of given specific instructions not to add tomatoes as she is just gone through a kidney stones surgery, yet they went wrong.

Sad ... When called the restaurant to enquire about the missing Toast, the manager Nikhil who attended the call was insensitive & was trying to request for a good review rather than doing anything about the missing Toast.

It comes to me as a surprise that Mr. Nikhil the manager was trying to ask me not to write a review of this than feeling sorry for the missing order . The taste was ok but the omlet was slightly over roasted & left a bad taste in her mouth.", "Recently I have purchased chicken Caesar Salad, taste was not good and salad was smelling badly. I really didn't expected this kind of food. Also would like to mention that the breadcrumbs was quite smells like old oil. And had to throw my order!", 'Ordered Puri sabzi for breakfast. I loved it! The sabzi was spicy and very tasty. Felt like it was homemade. The breakfast made my day. Also not to forget, 2 cups of watermelon juice which was included in the combo.', 'Nice place for day to day visit and eat. especially, one of the rare places for north Indians to have north kitchen food in Old Airport road. Not a very big joint, but good enough for 3-4 guys. I ordered Aloo-paratha, sandwich and loved it. You can tell them how you want it, soft or crispy and they make it.']

address: NA
more_info: Delivery Only, Seating Not Available,
reviews:
['Such a pathetic box of pizza. Disgusting is the word. Restaurant has no number to call on.', "True rating - 4.5/5

This place makes such wonderful pizzas. I don't know why its so under-rated. The rating on Zomato doesn't do justice either. I have had their pizza twice. The first one was the Feast Chicken Pepperoni Pizza. With a yummy layer of cheese running through the crust, the pizza was extremely dilicious. To be honest, I didn't expect the pizza to be this good. The second time, I ordered the Exotic Meat Eater Pizza. This was slightly spicy, and maybe not as good as the former. But on its own, this one was quite tasty actually.

The only problem with this establishment is that they are closed at evening, and you can order only after 9pm. So if you're planning to have an evening pizza party, Woodfire Pizza is not the place for you. As for me, I know from where I am going to order my next pizza too :)


PS - A photo I upload showing the packaging keeps on getting deleted. The package has Swiggy tapes around it. Is Zomato being naughty?", 'Ordered a margarita pizza and burger from here. The packaging was stable and delivery was swift. The pizza tasted average. This restaurant offers value for money.
                                                althingsbeautiful.wordpress.com', "Such a bad pizza I never had till now..It's worst..it didn't cook at all..I wanted to give zero rating.i will never order from this woodfire.Zomato pls respond fo this", 'Burger Sucks..Tasteless and Dry...and Pricey.Bun was dried up..patty was just two small chicken wings..Price is a scam..only other filling in the burger was a dried up capsicum.', 'Worst place to order food. Attached are the photos of their Popocorn Chicken which costs 119 rupees. Just 10 pieces. No value for money! Never ordering again!', 'I have ordered a red sauce pasta. However what I received looked like a pasta salad. The pasta was dry and there were chicken fried pieces in it and that‚Äôs all. It was sad. Also I ordered coke and received thumps up.', 'burnt more than usual', 'I ordered a chicken Burger. It was less of a burger and more of onions, Mayo, Capcicum and Bun.

Very disappointing. Never going to repeat anything here.', 'Loved the burger. The bun was a combination of the crisp and softness. The patty and the sauce was clean topper. Looking forward for pizzas.']

reviews:
['The finest Malai chicken I have eaten till date in Bangalore. Not kidding , this one went straight to my heart! Perfectly balanced sweetness of Malai chicken with soft and puffy kulchas. Must have if you are here.', 'The guy basically just roasts pizza base on a tawa and calls it kulcha. Very horrible.aloo Gravy was awful. ate what I ordered cuz I was hungry, but save yourself from eating these so called "kulchas" if you can.', 'I ordered masala kulcha and plain kulcha along with kadai paneer. As the other reviews go, I don‚Äôt really know what and how their kulcha is made but it isn‚Äôt the traditional kulcha we eat. I think it was just flattened white bread roasted with lots of butter.
It tasted good along with the much gravy and very less paneer that came along with it. Their should increase the portion size of their main course and pieces of paneer.', 'The food is definitely tasty. I ordered chicken kheema and kulcha and i found it satisfying. I tried hard but could not understand their concept of kulcha. It looks like a pizza base or rather like a soft AND thick bread to me.... But definitely its a bread and not a kulcha... Whatever it is, tastes good though.. Checkout the pics', 'The Chicken Keema and Kulcha combo is very delectable, indeed. I would describe myself as a heavy eater most of the times and I was satisfied with the quantity. The packing is also very well done.', "Excellent food. The chicken kheema is a must try! Also the kulcha's are very good as well. Wonderful meal packages as well. Everything is a must try! :)", "Great food. I've ordered many times from Kulcha kulture and the food is delicious.
I've ordered for kulcha with paneee bhurji, chkn kheem wuth kulcha as well. Must try both of these dishes.", 'Not that great .\xa0Chole was also not that tasty . I ordered from .swiggy. I dont know\xa0 why after taking so much money the food taste so bad. I did not like it .', 'Never ever ordering from this place again. Placed an order through Swiggy, restaurant confrms it, then calls & says food is out of stock. Then again I get a call saying order will take 30 mins more because they are preparing other order. Pathetic.', "....And it is proved that Indiranagar has a neverending list of eateries.\xa0
Came across this new kid on the block and decided to try out their food. Thanks to zomato it gave a hefty discount on the occasion of Independence day, otherwise, the combos do seem a little overpriced for people just ordering for themselves on a regular basis.
Kulcha and chicken keema \xa0Ordered this combo from @kulchakuture for dinner last night.\xa0
Honestly, the kulcha could have been softer but in their defence, the delivery time takes a toll on the food as Kulcha is best when consumed hot. The keema, however, was fab! It wasn't oily or greasy but extremely tasty and filling. ‚ù§

Desi khana FTW!!"]

Thanks.', "This place is awesome for biryani lover's.. Tasty food as always.i love to be here when I feel to have biryani.most recommend for all friends ‚ù§Ô∏è", 'What a sad place. Ordered food and they serve it cold and say this is how we serve food when we asked the lady there if she would eat it in the state it was served she refused to eat. They took the food back heated it in a cooker. Food tasted bad. Service was worse. Regret stepping in. Steer clear of this place put your money to better use.', 'The food was too bland, had no taste at all. The chicken was undercooked. It was raw and taste less.
Needs to improve a lot with proper guidance.', "Quite a few options of combo meals to choose from.

Quantity of the food is really good. Not the best of Biryani in and around the region - but definitely worth a try.

Drop a visit if you're in the mood for Dinner Biryani!", "Visited this restraunt for the dinner tonight. A friend of mine was recommending this place from sometime and I should say it didn't disappoint. According to him the must try was Pepper Chicken, but unfortunately it was already over.

We ordered Biriyani Rice, Guntur Chicken and Chicken Kebab. Guntur Chicken and Biriyani were spicy. Chicken Kebab was served hot. Overall the taste was good, but be ready for the spicy food.

The service was quite fast and the place was not crowded. The price is very reasonable as well."]

reviews:
["One of the best coffees I've tasted. Their brew reminds of the filter coffee flavour we're used to having at home, only its a lot better and creamy.", 'I mostly have my breakfast here. its one the best place to have a chicken tikka sandwich. its just 60 Rs and the stuffing for that money is really worth. and not to forget the cold coffee you would love it.', "I loved the ginger tea, didnt find yet better tea than this one in bangalore. Also bought truesouth coffee decoction, it's great

if possible, can you extend it with swiggy, so we could order online, will be extremely happy", 'Beautiful decor, even better coffee. The cold coffee was simply heavenly. Staff was also friendly and helpful. Will definitely recommend. Go for it, guys!', 'Though I am not too much of coffee lover but true south coffee is awesome ...
The ready to use packets are great for lazy people like us ...
Ambiance is great too...', 'Late evening, my sister who is back from US wanted to drink a good filter coffee, so we decided to try True South. When we reached the True South store on Old airport road, guys were closing the store, infact they were already outside, all lights off and their bags on their back, we were disappointed and we requested them to serve, they were so kind to switch on all the lights and open the store for us for just 3 cups of coffee. We loved your coffee so much that we also picked up a pouch of eighty20 and malabar each for my sister to take it to the US. All thanks to the guys at the store. Abhilash was the person serving us and he was very kind and a great host. We really appreciate the service rendered to us. Truly very South Indian. I have been a fan of your coffee since the soul santhe days. 
Thanks for making our evening perfect.

Coffee- 5/5
Price- 5/5
Ambience- 5/5
Host & Service- 5/5', 'Its a small outlet beside Anand store, easy to locate for tourists like me, Had a Coffee and tea only, which was too good,Malabar filter coffee large was perfect, not too strong, Ginger tea- finally I got a place where people really add crushed ginger in tea, which was really a difficult thing to find in Bangalore', 'Their baked nippat is really good. Coffee is just average - its not very strong. The only good thing about their coffee is that its not as sweet as darshini coffee.', 'Cute standing-only coffee place with a nice selection of filter coffees. I had the Malabar blend coffee, which came in a brass tumbler, along with a cinnamon roll and a quiche. Loved the coffee so much that I bought a few punches to take home.  Food was good, on par the other fancier bakeries around. Loved the compass on the wall pointing "true south".', "I've only had the cold coffee here, but it is amazing. Not too strong and not too sweet. Looking forward to having more cold coffee at True South. Do they deliver?"]

more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Outdoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating,

reviews:
['So I came here to pick up a few donuts the other day at about 12 noon maybe. There was no one at the counter outside. So went inside and placed an order with the one guy who was available. And this is what the guy does:
1. Gets the cardboard and starts making the boxes with his bare hands. Like sliding his hands over the place where the donuts will be kept.
Anyways,, I try to ignore and kept watching.\xa0
2. He goes out and starts picking up the donuts with his bare hands again.\xa0
As soon as I saw that I cancelled the order. He said he'll get the gloves and got the gloves from inside and started packing the donuts again, but I told him that there was no use since he had already touched them.
All I could think was "God knows where those hands have been." I'm sure he's clean but whatever. I've seen people dig noses and scratch where ever, so not going back to this place again. The staff should be taught about hygiene.']

['Good place fresh food healthy as well , a lil on the higher side but will not stop from eating here , packed well for delivery as well and the chocolate mousse is yum', '', 'I have been very less disappointed by Chefcraft. I never ordered though from Indiranagar but from a Kammanahalli branch on swiggy. Love their salad and steaks and chicken wings. 
Not giving a 5 because of quantity and one bad meal (fried rice and chicken where rice was flavourful and chicken was smelly)', 'I had ordered Vietnamese veg summer roll. The wrapping outside each roll was like plastic .. I wasn‚Äôt sure if that‚Äôs actually plastic or something that can be eaten. But I could not remove it so had to eat with it and then remove from mouth after chewing rest of stuff! 

The chutney was the only thing good and yummy. 

Further they do not have hot food. This one was also frozen and came with ice pack actually! 

No value for money either. 

Coincidentally my stomach has been upset after that meal. Won‚Äôt order again from here.', "Ordered Nasi Goreng with prawns and prawn crackers. Box it came in was of good quality and decently packed. Food was warm as well.
Pros: Egg in the nasi Goreng was just runny , which was very well done. Taste was also quite good.
Cons: Quantity is just enough for one. You shouldn't be too hungry when ordering this. Also, I felt there could be a bit of freshness added to the dish, like some.cucumber and carrot strips also some greens...
Overall a good box of Nasi Goreng!", 'Decided to try some new stuff, delivery was quick and food was decent too! 
Tried the spring rolls and Penang curry veg! Price was decent too!  Just that the portion of the Penang curry could have been better . Well packed tho !', 'Got a Chicken Arabic Fattoush Salad. 
Terrible portion size! Substandard quality meat. Bad salad dressing. 
And all this for 280 bucks. One wouldn‚Äôt even pay 100 bucks for the salad they provided. NOT WORTH IT AT ALL. Shame!', 'The portion size for a main dish is quite shocking really. Just about 3 pieces of chicken and a handful of veggies is what made up our lemon herb chicken. The portion of sauce that came with the dish was larger than the actual food. Quite disappointed.', 'Ordered a Teriyaki Chicken Pita Sandwich with Pickled Veggies. The chicken was super smelly. I could literally ‚Äútaste the smell‚Äù. This was my first time ordering and I was pretty disappointed.']

address: 3145, HAL, 2nd Stage, Opposite ESI Hospital, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'This roll joint has been serving my cravings for sometime now although, I was never too much intregued by it. As a roll joint, Rolls on Wheels does offer great options to chose from but the taste or flavours and the quantity is just isn't there yet, the charges are slightly higher than average.

Tried their biryani for the first time and I quote "Large" pack. I was not surprised rather shocked to see them packing a large biryani in containers others use to put in side gravy items. The taste seemed like spiced up ghee rice with chicken pieces. I don't understand what's wrong with biryani preparations in this city cause there have been only a very few places that I feel to be serving somewhat good or authentic Biryanis.

Hope they work on the quantity bit going forward.', "Rolls on Wheels definitely justifies it's name by serving good rolls. I'd called for the Chicken garlic kebab roll, the chicken was tender and flavoured well , the paratha was crisp and the roll all together was a good treat. I'd also called for crispy pizza fingers which were a good snack, deep fried with cheese, what could go wrong.
Sadly, the biggest disappointment were the steamed chicken momos. The filling was yummy and the accompanying sauce was delicious but the thickness of the dough was just not acceptable. The covering was just too thick.
May go back for a roll but definitely steering clear from the momos in future.", 'This place is mainly good for combos. You can definetly try combos here as they are cheap and sufficient for your one time meal. Other than that this place serves biriyani, momos, rolls, beverages and light snacks.', 'For an evening snack we ordered for a bunch of rolls including chicken spicy roll,chicken tava fried rolls,potato pops and paneer rolls 
Felt slightly overpriced according to the taste and size of the rolls', 'Too many onions', 'good', 'It was good', 'I pretty much look at this place everyday and I have always wanted to try it ever since it opened. Finally got a chance to visit this place recently and it was a good experience. Just forget the ambience and the place. Just go there for a quick roll and you won‚Äôt be disappointed. The roll sure was a good one and the starters were good too. I personally liked this place.', 'super testing']

address: 14/1, Wood Street, Ashok Nagar, Richmond Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Full Bar Available, Above 18 Only, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
["I juz loved this place..Such properly decorated and designed mainly the outdoor area full of bright sunlight gives you a good vibes ..Comes to the food part we just order appetizers one is Au revoir Colonel Sanders , where chicken is marinated in yogurt and raw mango and cooked in Naga chilli sauce perfectly goes with your gin n tonic..And when in Toast n Tonic u should not miss pork belly it's too yumm.. For gin n tonic we ordered flower power, gentlemen's tonic, citrus basil tonic

Food: 5/5
Service : 5/5
Value for money :5/5
Ambience : 5/5", "The food was good but the restaurant is really good at screwing up your reservation and they cramped 5 of us on a 4 seater. Anyways getting back to the food - The Beef Bone Broth - OH my, it's easily the best sips of soups you will have, it's technically a Pho (a vietnamese dish) and their Steak was cooked to perfection (I always prefer medium rare), this was served on a bed of potatoes and turnips. Overall a delightful food experience, must try.", "Love this place, it's a proper piece of heaven, and I'm glad its survived this long in Bangalore, as most of the really good places never do. I like their small plates the most, and the G&T is to die for!", 'Nestled in the streets of Richmond town is this cozy place, with the perfect blend of Western and  Indian warm decor. Excellent food - the veg topped our pallet with beat salad and the risotto doing the magic. This place has 3 sections, each designed exquisitely with a lovely bar attached. The staff is courteous and recommended us some good food options as we were new to this place. An ideal place for Gin lovers! Though I‚Äôm not one, I wouldn‚Äôt want to go back without trying one. Their cocktails are well made and ‚Äòstiff‚Äô :) Lovely ambience and great vibes is what this place has to offer. It‚Äôs my new favorite and I‚Äôm coming back again.', 'Good ambience and decor although it was a bit cramped and crowded... Very quick service. Food was ok. Very very very limited options for vegetarians and most of those were also not available.

Cocktails were good.

My FAVS score -
Food - 3/5
Ambience - 4/5
Value for money - 3/5
Service - 4/5', 'Simply outstanding!

I loved the place from the moment I entered. The service is excellent. Small details like removing the extra cover show that effort has been put in training. The drinks are to die for and I reccomend you have the fig & tonic! One must have the Victorian Cheese Platter (Bel Paese is my favourite), Tempura Waterchesnuts and Slow Glazed Honey Ribs. The only thing I did not enjoy at all was the Soft Shell Crab which had to be sent back as it was not fresh n edible. This was immediately replaced by the Brik Chicken which was to die for. Service recovery at its best! All in all this is perhaps one of the best places to visit in Bangalore! #amazing']

address: 2nd Main Road, Kodihalli, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available,
reviews: ['Great place to enjoy yumm food. Owner is really nice and will also suggest you great preparation.', '', '', '', '', '', 'Fantastic place. Lovely food. Young and old all family can enjoy a quick bite. Ready in a jiffy. Friendly staff. Tasty food. I would go there again and again. Awesome.', 'The food was awesome and given quickly .... Cleanliness n hygiene was maintained , service Excellent... would recommend this food truck to everyone... Must visit if u r in Bangalore üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç', 'Food was excellent. They have lots of veg and non veg varieties. These are must try for people who love to experiment with new food. Will surely keep experimenting.', 'If you are in Bangalore , you need to visit this place , awesome food , one the best for all especially foodies . I tried it with all of friends , had an amazing time']

address: 3rd Floor, Garuda Mall, Ashok Nagar, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Mall Parking, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Heard a lot bout this place, name has it as the ‚Äúbest thin crust pizzas‚Äù.  

First time here
Portion size is too small, not so great on flavours. 
Ambience was nice, music was peppy. 
Staff was courteous and helpful. 
The Raspberry Mojito was star of the day. 


Zomato Gold helped ease the day.', 'Since we are shopping in the mall and we wanted to eat Italian food we thought we would try this restaurant.
Ambience: it‚Äôs a tiny and a simple place
Food: the pizza was extremely bad it was not at all good, it was very dry I did not like it at all 
Chicken lasagna also was very bad to tangy the chicken was cut properly the lasagna was not at all good 
Staff:very nice and polite
Service: I got my food within 15 min', "We have visited there with ma frnd and found this place great to have pizzas and pasta.
Pasta is far better than anything else there. although pizza is\xa0 good.
We tried few drinks also there which we didn't like at all.
Overall a nice fooding experience in a small sitting place with decent service, I still prefer New BELL road branch", 'Quick tip:- pocket friendly place, much better compared to the food at the Garuda mall food court. Reasonable and portion size is good!

Bbq chicken wings- good sauce can try
Alfredo chicken pasta- too saucy good For the price
Bbq pizza- thin crust nice no complaints..

A must try place in Garuda mall!']

address: 5, 1st Main Road, Stage 2, Domlur, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews: ['Saw the good reviews and ordered the ham and cheese croissant sandwich from this place. Left me utterly disappointed. The croissant wasn‚Äôt cheesy at all and the ham was veryyy chewy. Couldn‚Äôt taste butter as well. One of the worst croissants I‚Äôve ever tasted.', 'Budget and Pet Friendly cafe.If you really need some place for your leisurely conversation then be their guests. Staffs are really welcoming and warm.Service is very customised considering the space is small with limited tables.I visit this place usually on weekends for breakfast with my fur boy and friends. You can take away some fresh baked items off the shelf.They are so fresh and different.It‚Äôs part of Cafe Max but unlike them this cafe pocket friendly.']

address: Shop.3, AMMA BUILDING, BEHIND NERALUR BUS STOP
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['A Must place to try for tea in Indranagar. They serves one of the best tea. Tea & snacks are very cheap and worth the money you spend. 

Bit overcrowded on weekends.
Ambience : 2.5/5

 Recommended!!', 'Its your end of month hangout place. The food is worth the money you pay. The chai does justice to the name as the adarak kadak chai is quite kadak. The music gives a unique 70s feel to the place. A good place to try.', "Tiny place that serves amazing Chai!!! Our search for Kulhad Chai in Bangalore lead us here. It's a small tea cafe. Serves a variety of Chai and veg snacks. Best part,it's served in a kulhad. There r a few chairs to sit, or u can stand n enjoy ur Adrak Wali Chai! We were lucky,wen we went here,it was kinda empty,so we sat on d bamboo chairs. We had Adrak, Elaichi and Masala Chai. Adrak Chai was amazing. My husband loved his Elaichi Chai. We also had d Masala Biscuit. No ambience,no service,but it doesn't matter, bcoz d Chai is d only thing that matters. Must try!!!", 'Same kind of chai place but with seating arrangement!

I like chai so I bookmarked this place some time back. One weekend I visited this cafe with one of my friend. To locate this cafe was very hard. There is few seating capacity and with few posters on walls. Although this place was nice to relax when we visit with friend. 

We ordered two Bombay cutting chai and one Bombay breakfast sandwich. The cutting chai was very average as it had wired taste of tea powder. The Bombay sandwich was good. It was made of veggies and brown bread. 

Although this place is good to chill and relax and the pricing are very reasonable.', 'The place is good, worth going. It might feel little too congested at times but still, a good quiet place to sip a nice cup with friends or during tea breaks if nearby. Taste is really appreciable and staff is friendly too!', 'A good place for chai over smoke and the person javed makes amazing chai apart from the tea bag ones...people who go there should request him to make chai for the best taste, now a days there is a new chap who denies chai or says no smoking and is very rude and annoying to customers, if this continues i think only houseflies will come to drink chai there..i wish i could take javed and start a new chai shop.', 'Old bollywood retro music playing in the background and you sit outside in a cool green quiet lane of Indiranagar with a khullad of chai. The serenity and timelessness of this experience will make you want to just repeat this experience maybe for hours if you have a book or something. This was on a Sunday afternoon, and this lane is just parallel to the busy and noisy 12th main. So the weekdays would get only better in terms of the quiet.\xa0

I had the Ajwain and ginger khullad chai and followed this with a Monsoon Dum Chai‚Ä¶the quantity is just right but maybe a little less if you want to sit and sip for a while unless you go for multiple repeats. 

Snacks are limited, so if you want something hot, there are not too many options. I was not in the mood for any of the small snacks that they had on the menu. I just had poppins for some time (you can buy this here).

But I loved this place and it is sure to be a weekday afternoon hangout.', 'Small cafe in indiranagar,love the way this cafe,
Variety of tea, I like Vada pao & cutting chai üëåüëå
Would like to visit again for rasta lassi üíï,,,,,', 'A good place to chill and have a chai of your choice from plenty. My favorite is the sulamani chai, its just lemon tea with honey. Seating area is pretty relaxed and informal. Good place to escape from the busy city.', "It's  type of cafe in indiranager .... Nice ambience  food and service..... I like the place.... Vada pao you must try..... And kadak cutting chai they served in kulad which looks awesome.strongly recommend to others we will come back again for sure chears@.........."]

address: NA
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews:
["I'm happy to see such rice only restaurants coming up. I'm not a plain south indian rice guy at all. But I can neither eat fried rice or biriyani on all days. That is where Bowl'd Over Rice comes into picture. It serves you healthy rice with different types of curries both veg and non-veg packed in a bowl. I tried the Dilli Rajma Rice Bowl and I was happy with it. The regular bowl has the right amount of quantity to fill an average person's appetite. But if you're too hungry, you could choose the larger bowl.
I'll surely give their non-veg rice bowls a try soon.

P.S it's delivery only restaurant üòï

Food - 4/5
Packing - 4/5
VFM - 3/5"]

more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews: ['', "Wrost momo I ever had. I paid 150rs and got 6 smallest pieces of momos. First bite I took, I chew stone inside. Though I was hungry I threw momo I saw inside momo it was all white kind. It was not oil they, they use dalda instead of oil. You won't see when its hot. Never ever Gona eat even I get it for free.", '', "The best Momo's I have tasted ever, excellent variety from chicken to choclate, pocket friendly, filling, we ordered only 4 different varieties", 'Awesome momos I ever had in Bangalore.Even the momo chutney is very yummy and spicy. I would recommend ppl to do order from here and have a great experience.', "Some of the best momos I've had for the price. My husband ordered at 5am and we got yummy, juicy momos delivered. Will definitely recommend if you're hungry.", "Some of the best momos I've had so far. They were simply fresh and juicy. Was delivered so soon. Pocket friendly also. Will definitely order again."]
