address: 1083, Prince Arcade, 12th Main, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Table Reservation Not Required, Wifi, Rooftop, Free Wifi,
reviews:
['The New #Cupshup Rocks ..TreeTop View and Aunthentic Bengali Food makes it a great experience. Staff are polite and courteous. Overall a great experience :)', 'The new revamped Cup Shup is a place to make memories. The ambiance is amazing and with a view to get lost in. The place is perfect to spend some personal time or crazy with your gang. The place is peaceful and serene enough to read a book, finish your office work or just catch up with your date. Well, to add to the place is the yummylicious food they serve with love. The management is sweet and warm. I would love to visit this place again and would recommend you guys to do so soon.', 'Fab Restaurant Ambience and Good Food.. One of the best rooftop cafe experiences in Bengaluru. Can spend long hours working there.

Revamped recently', 'Love their new location. It‚Äôs a rooftop cafe now as opposed to the chaotic one in the past. The food is amazing, as always. Loved their Bengali loochi aloo dum and ginger chai. They have a few signature dishes. We tried the Chatpata chat burger which happens to be their signature dishes. It was absolute yumm... I recommend this place for their wide variety of menu that does not pinch your pockets.', 'To begin with, the quality of food is horrible. Never had a thicker tomato soup before this. Bad ambience. Not hospitable. Never seen a restaurant which is listed under Zomato, not providing the basic things like tissues, water and clean cutleries.
Placed in such a prime location at Indiranagar, needs to improve a lot in the quality of service and overall experience.
Cutleries weren't clean. This is my second visit to the place in less than 6 months. No improvement in the ambience. Cleanliness is a serious issue with the place.
Awful experience.
And lastly, the wait time, which is like "forever" that too for one customer. Wondering what is the wait time on a crowded day, well if at all.
Highly disappointed! Not a single thing was upto standard.', "WHAT WAS IT? I mean what was it, seriously. They call themselves a hipster boutique restaurant. I wish they just focus in the boutique bit and leave running a restaurant to those who can. Went there with a friend. The ambience was bext to nothing. There were no tissue paper on the table. We ordered Chicken Manchow soup and Pesto tossed Pasta with Olive and Cheese. We were the only customers in the whole restaurants with a bunch of youngsters scattered around us, all of whom surprisingly knew each other. Weird. Anyway, none of them ordered and we saw that we were the only paying customers at the time. The soup wasn't divided as ordered and arrived straight with the pasta. Still not a deal breaker right? Right. The soup was no soup, it was more like the sauce munchurian are dipped in. Inedible. Coming to the pasta, the lesser said the better.", "Cup Shup seems like a small and cute cafe which looks quite and artistic from the outside. But, to be honest it is a little uncomfortable and unhygienic when you go inside and sit there. It's one thing that the place looks filthy but the utensils that the food and beverages are served in are also quite dirty. We ordered some beverages and the utensils were very dirty but we didn't say anything for a while because the person who runs the place was busy shouting at her employees. Anyways, after a while someone else ordered something and complained about the same thing i.e. dirty cups. Instead of apologizing, the owner just denied that the cups are dirty but did replace it. Overall, it is not that worth your visit. Thanks!", "The place is way more different than what is looks in the pics under ambience section. The menu is varied but the quality is not good. The chocolate shake is nothing but just some milk, tons of sugar and a spoon of choco powder. The pasta is too too too oily with no sauce. Overall it's a place where one can just go and sit in pajamas and have a cup of tea. And ask them for tea in disposable cups. I got my glass of tea changed because it looked as if it was not washed. Could see the malai of last served tea on it. Overall an okayish place.", 'A place to go when you have a lot of time in hand and want to chill out! Ambience is average, not much attention is paid towards improving the interiors! We ordered bruschetta and it was super tasty! The watermelon orange mocktail had no flavour of orange..I think they forgot to add the same. Chocolate shake was good. Service is poor.', 'Very good food, I have tried many different items all of them very good...my favourite is chicken and paneer steak...love the mashed potatoes with it...nice place to hangout casually !']

cuisines: Cafe, Italian, Tex-Mex, Fast Food, Burger
address: 3, Lazer Tag Castle, 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['went to this place lazer castle,as we were hungry too ordered Burger all four varieties available on the menu and white sauce pasta.Tatse was not great and food was too cold. Not a very good place to opt for.', 'They gave KitKat shake without KitKat. It was just sugar and milk. Barbecue chicken was small pieces of chicken with barbecue sauce. They got the wrong order for our lime water and when we pointed it out, they said "it's ok"!', 'Horrible service. 
Horrible food. 
Took eternity to get the food and once the food came it tasted like they were serving it frozen stale. It was so bland.', "Ordered tacos, got a bunch of mini puri looking things with stuffing like nothing I've ever seen in a taco. 

Ordered fajitas, got vegetable gravy with no bread. 

Ordered Nachos, got really oily crisps with no dips. 

Ordered a lemon ice tea, that was spoilt. 

Ordered a berry juice, that wasn't available and was replaced with a peach iced tea. This was the only thing edible. 

Im definitely ordering from here again. Not.", "Ambiance was average. Food was overpriced and tasteless. Had high hopes for this place but it turned out to be a bust. I've had much better food in Bangalore for half the price. Service was okay, the waiter did not understand some of the things we asked so he just smiled. Rating 2 only for the ambiance.", 'Decent place, you can enjoy some indoor activities, laser tag, Food was good, chilled out ambience. Little disappointed with the service and the wait time.', 'Completely worthless. I ordered the chicken Caesar salad which was priced at 120 bucks and what I got was stale chicken, some croutons with some sort of sweet sauce and a lot of lettuce.', "Review based on delivery experience. I had ordered the gymmer burger,nachos and cold coffee. The burger tasted good but nothing special about it. The nachos were a bit disappointing as the dip was just tomato sauce with onions. They didn't provide the cheese dip as well. Coming to the cold coffee, it was very sweet with extra sugar. Overall, nothing special about this place...just average food.", "I knw it's basically not a place to eat, but then they kept me waiting for more than half an hour for a pasta. But it's a nice place to hangout with friends and do some gaming."]

address: 18, BDA Complex, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Serves Non Veg, Outdoor Seating,
reviews:
['This small and not visibly noticeable joint dishes out some really awesome kebabs. If you are a beef lover them you will get proper beef kebabs and tolls to try out on. My favourite yhe the jumbo roll and the bhuna kebab. Other chicken items too are worth a try as the kebab is cooked really wel and the service is damn quick. Easy on the pocket and tastes yumm.', "Absolutely delicious beef. I highly recommend the boti kebab, beef sheekh roll and mutton sheekh roll. The bhuna kebab is pretty good as well. It's a great place for hardcore beef lovers. Not much available for you here if you don't eat beef.", 'The sheekh rolls are to die for. The rolls are made with rumali roti & they have chicken, beef & mutton with beef being the best of the lot. Always works well for a quick bite after a beer binge in Stones just around the corner.', "One of the best rolls I've eaten.A must visit place for all the beef lovers out there but  the rolls are bit overprized.The place doesn't look that great though.", 'Nice rolls.. Had tried the chicken jumbo roll and beef jumbo roll...succulent meat and properly cooked.. Bit smoky ambience  because of the grill.. Gud joint for a take away...', 'The place is a heavan for beef lovers. Small joint near BDA complex, it has yummy juicy beef rolls. Excuse the smoke that comes by from the grills but its worth eating these romali roti rolls.', 'Average place to relish your hunger of rolls and kebabs... good place for take aways because they don‚Äôt have enough space to dine in only 3 to 4 chairs to cover up the place they laid.. full of local crowd... For vegetarian they have only 4 options like veg roll...no main dishes are available in the menu... Very cheap price but food is average as per the bangaloreans palate... But really you will not enjoy your food if you count the cleanliness in the food joint... They are serving beef items as well. . . But they are not mixing any beef things in chicken you can trust them in this regards.... Guys please upkeep the hygienic scenario of the food joint... you are serving tasty things but the hygiene also plays a vital role to grow up...

Bon appetite @chef bb
                                                chefbb.in', 'Excellent Boti rolls and Sheek rolls. Its a mini fanoos and perfect place to get cheap but extremely tasty sheek rolls . Open only in the evenings.']

address: 51, Near ESI Hospital, Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'The place is normal but the taste of food is good
. I often have chicken biryani from here. 1 biryani is good for one person, affordable and tastes quite good . Hygiene and cleanliness is not well though', 'Order via uber from this restaurant, and they sent me the biriyani in a brown cover which the delivery boy spilt in his bag, and sent gravy in an aluminium foil. Does he think customers are fools, and will put up with all your non sence', 'An awesome evening spot after gym workouts. Tandoori Chicken is a must try at Meaza. One of the best Tandoori you can get in Indiranagar. They serve some real special Kerala Dishes. Puttu Biriyani was one of the highlights I tried out. It was some filling with real plenty in quantity. Arabian Pulpy Grapes is a must try and special in there menu. Highly recommended for Mallus.', 'I Tried Fish Meals recently was superbly delicious and well packed food many type of curries kept me satisfied the dal which they gave me was perfect and felt like home,other time tried ghee rice and beef masala and felt satisfactory.
I will surely keep ordering from them again they do consider special requests on few occasions asked for pazhampoori they had sent that also.', 'Everage quantity
Quality is good, Staff Co-Operative, have tried 99 Biryani and Starter. The best part is green chutney they are provided with Grilled starter', 'Love the resturant. Authentic malabar snacks and great food. If you crave malabar food this is the place. Their pazhampori is something to crave for. Courteous stuff and brilliant service. Definitely one of the best places to hangout as well if you have company who loves Kerala food.', "It's a decent food joint serving economical kerala food. Food quality and taste is average. Had meals, porotta and different curries. Meals was average and porotta was good", 'Friendly, fast and warm service. Try Idi-irachi - which is pounded/roasted beef/buff. There is a spicy beef curry called Shappile Kumari. The Kerala porottas are nice too. Try the place for the Kerala style meat delicacies.', "Had lunch today in meaza ginger multi cuisine restaurant which located indranagar. It was absolutely disappointing.. ordered for fish meals but there was only few broken pieces of fishes served to me. So again asked for fish fry which was fully uncooked and left with masalas as such.. when asked about it there was no any proper reply from their side and even my money is neither refunded or reduced. As far as I concerned , they are not properly responding to the customers and it's not satisfying our expectations and it's certainly waste of money!!! Also if have any options to give negtive ratings definitely I will give them minus five (-5)."]

address: 10, Krishna Temple Road, HAL 1st Stage, Off 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['very less quantity of food', 'The taste of food was amazing and portion of is enough for 3 people. Quality was good.', 'v average run of the mill', "Ordered couple of biryanis and a soft drink all because my street was filled with rain water on Aug 15th. 4.5 rating all because of delivery guy who muddled through the knee high water to deliver us food.\xa0

Biryani wasn't great but the dedication the delivery guy showed, made me rate this joint with 4.5.\xa0

Over all pocket friendly menu, will definitely give other items on their menu try (After all judging food quality of a Punjabi outlet based upon their Biryani is not practical).", "It's a very small place. Probably won't find it easily. But the food is really great and cheap. I will definitely visit this place again. Also you can pay using paytm.", "An outlet overlooked and shadowed by bigger joints surrounding it. The board claiming authentic punjabi food tempted us. It is a popular takeaway place judging by people flocking. There are hardly two tables, mostly chairs around. Service is quick and efficient. We tried lassi, paneer labedar, rotis and roti thali. Prices are customer friendly. I won't say the food was authentic punjabi but definitely pleasing on the palette. Hygiene is doubtful. Child labour is obvious and visible..very disconcerting.. We left with happy tummys but the image of the children working there are embedded in my mind.", 'Nice food at very cheap price. Grt fr students/bachelors living near by. Small place though,
No place to sit n eat properly......enjoyyyyyuu', 'The place is quite good... If u don care for anything lik ambience then its a must visit,.. Comparatively cheap... The food served is tasty and is a run for your money...moreover the plates and glasses to drink water are very clean...trust me...very clean!!
Pls take note that the prices mentioned in the menu are not in force... They are hiked...

Recommended!', 'This small place serves the most authentic home cooked food at a very reasonable price.A truly Punjabi eating place with amazing tandoori dishes,run by a loving Uncle-Aunty who just make you feel that you at home with your parents.', 'Ok for a hurried late meal. I had the paratha meal which had 2 lachcha parathas, daal and rajma. The paratha was ok but the daal and rajma were thin and bland, some may call it homely but there was too little rajma in the curry. This gravy and DSL was not sufficient for me for the 2 parathas, luckily I had ordered the kadai paneer which tasted a little better than the rest. The lady cashier / owner was pleasant.']

address: 3115, East West Building, 13th Cross, 2nd Stage, Off Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Smoking Area, Live Sports Screening, Table booking recommended, Outdoor Seating, Wifi,
reviews:
['A place where you can get delicious english breakfast at rs 149. they provide power banks and a good wifi connection. courteous staff but lack cleanliness.', 'Worst place ever! So many mosquitoes, I ordered a Veg English breakfast and they gave me chicken sausages , plus the staff is so careless . It seems like they have given up on the place', "Very nice place in terms of Ambience, service and pricing. They have indoor and outdoor seating. Reasonably priced tasty food. Staffs are really friendly and good to hangout with friends or even alone. If you have a book to read, it's the best cafe to go. Highly recommended.", "Its a small cozy place with indoor and outdoor seating. The menu is pretty good with pocket friendly items. After dawn the mosquitoes are a little problem.
We had french fries and a juice with had grapes in it ( I don't remember the exact name)

I would surely visit this place again for long talks.", "After seeing few mix reviews thought of visiting this place and gave a try.Food is ok but what I ordered was not available and it was around 6 pm that I visited the cafe.Mainly serves breakfast food and had ordered for 'the true brit' but was not available nor any item of chicken was available.So had ordered a black coffee and satisfied myself with bread toast and omlete.Staff is good but needs a bit training.
Guys please keep the items available next time.", "I was initially skeptical about visiting the place due to the reviews. However, I found the place nothing like it.
The prices are good and quantity is good too. The quality of food is reasonable and service is great.
You are allowed to stay for long periods without any questioning.
If you are looking for a cafe to enjoy the ambience, food or have a proper dining experience, this place isn't what you meant to be.
But, if you seek a quiet place to work or discuss with light eats, then this is the ideal place for that.", "good food and nice service. the cafe should improve on it's service by making a fast delivery. and the Ambience of the cafe is good. a place meant for Friends.", 'This is a hole in the wall kind of neighborhood place. Food is reasonably good, with the pasta and the salad being very good as were the potato wedges. The shakes were not so great. But at the price point, this place is a great deal.', 'Decent food, but double charging the taxes post GST implementation is completely wrong.
Earlier, paid the exact amount as mentioned in the menu, which should already include the necessary taxes. Post 1st July, an additional 12% GST tax is being charged on the amount mentioned in the menu.
As per the manager's explanation, a "new menu" will come in soon with the renewed rates, claiming that the base price for each of the items in the current old menu has been hiked and now is equal to the amount shown. Until a new menu is made available, I believe the customers are being hoodwinked at this establishment.']

address: 479, 1st Floor, 2nd Main, Behind BDA Complex, 2nd Stage,  Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Free Wifi, Vegan Options,
reviews:
['', 'The food is really great and the variety of vegan dishes are amazing.The ambience is homely.
The hosts are very warm and welcoming. Every food order is freshly cooked so it takes at 15-20 minutes for your meal to be served. Overall we had a very good experience.', 'Awesome food taste... first time tried vegan with my foreign teammates..it actually taste good than the one dishes prepared with animal products. White sauce paasta chats and dimsums are must try.', 'Cutesy lil vegan cafe in Indiranagar. Enjoyed the tofu scramble, mango shake and sandwich.
Look forward to going back for their Karanataka meals.', 'Had been there for breakfast, could not find good options. Taste is below average with average ambience. Service was slow too.Not going to recommend this place.', 'A small vegan cafe with a Artisty ambience done by the owner herself.
We went on a Saturday night, and ordered potato corn balls for starters and it was really good. Absolutely loved it. The dahi paapdi chaat was great too as it had "vegan dahi".
The dimsums were made of wheat and was really good

The pasta and Torttilas were really good.
The service was prompt. The seasonal fruit smoothie bowl could have been better but overall would love to visit here again and try more stuffs!', "Was there for lunch yesterday...
Wanted to give some honest feedback to the owners who were there and spoke to us:
1. The idea of this restaurant is great,but the food and ecspically the quality of ingredients used left a lot to be desired.Ordered the avacoda sandwich ,but there was hardly any avacoda in it?...the lettuce was stale...please use ingredients lavishly and fresher.
2. There was no music ..asked for it...why do we need to ask for it...
3. The tofu scrambled was good.
4. The dimsums were decent.
Somehow didn't get a warm, welcoming feeling in the restaurant...though both the husband and wife spoke to us ...felt like they were unhappy about thier own restaurant.
Inshort...came expecting a lot but left disappointed with the quality of the food...
But hope you'll pick up as it's a great place to hang out... best of luck", "When you miss your lunch and you need to have something light, this might be your option. Hummus Avocado Veggie Sandwich. I never had Avocado before, so I thought what the hell, let's have it. Toasted in brown bread, filled with lots of crunchy veggies and accompanied with a special sauce (was that made of dates?), this sandwich is fulfilling, yet light on your tummy.

Packing was innovative, I must say; but it did not stop the bread from getting soggy. In 20 minutes of time until the delivery was made, my sandwich was all limp. Also, I liked the sauce individually, but I don't think it went well with the sandwich. In my opinion, my regular hot and sweet tomato sauce went well with its starchy taste.

All in all, I loved what I had. Will definitely try other things as well.

P.S. Very curious about the name. Celebrates being Veg/Vegan?", 'Excellent Food ! Loved the chocolate pancake and veg Thali! Quantity is good ,everything was fresh and tasted heavenly! Thanks for opening Ahimsa Amrit! Keep up the good work!', 'AhimsaAmrit is a very homely and well decorated place to have a quality time with your loved one on a special day. We visited together on our first Valentine‚Äôs day. They served us some mouth watering vegan dishes and surprised us in so many ways. We really had a great time. If you want to surprise your loved one with some decent ambience and food, you should surely visit this place once. Kudos to you people specially Ms.Shila for your hard work and amazing ideas. üòä']

reviews: ["It's a new place and I'm always game for trying new joints. I'm always too keen to try out the biryani preparation from any new hub that opens up in the vicinity. Moodswings was once such experience today and sadly, it wasn't at all like a biryani. I mean, the quantity and freshness is there but the authenticity of a biryani wasn't just there. Rather, it tasted like some spiced up rice cooked with chicken pieces which were decent. And above all, the pricing seemed a bit higher compared to the quality on offer. Let me try some of their mains and then I'll get the vibe about this joint.\n\nAll in all, it's not a place for biryani craving souls as there are many other better options to choose from."]

reviews:
["Ordered their breakfast veg combo. It came in tiny little boxes, with every element having flavors which were not overpowering but complementary. Their Poha had mild flavors of Cardomom and cinnamon with tomato chutney unlike any Poha that I'd tasted in the past. There was another box full of fruits and two other tiny boxes with a sprouts salad and paneer burji. The portions were good enough for one person.", "Lovely dips , I must start of by telling you all their dips are definitely worth a try.

The open faced bread ,think twice before ordering it because what they do is they wrap it in cling wrap making it all soggy but it's a got a lovely filling for sure if you want to use a fork and spoon.

Overall it's a fantastic place which is pocket friendly however I would strongly recommend Picante to improve their packaging for their food .", 'Ordered Tortas De Pollo with Mango Habanero Chilli Sauce through UberEats. Was so filling and the sauce was super good, a different kind of spicy. Loved the sauce. The bread and other ingredients were fresh, proper packaging, reasonable price. But the quantity of bell peppers was way more than the chicken.', "Ordered their green Buddha bowl chicken and I was disappointed with the quantity of the chicken. It has only 4 to 5 pieces of chicken and had more of veggies to fill up the bowl. But their dips have a good taste.  Only if the quantity of chicken was up to the mark, it would've been a feast!", 'I ordered the Hawaiian Pineapple Delight with Multi Grain Baguette bread along with Thai Jalapeno Mayo dip from UberEats. It was really delicious and better than Subway. The vegetables and pineapples were fresh. The prices are reasonable.', "The Mango Habanero Sauce changed my life. It has literally changed my life. If I were a cannibal, I'd use it to eat myself. It hits you with a sweet and tangy punch and just as your eyes light up at the sourness you feel the warmth starting to take over your throat and your eyes tear up because of the sheer beauty and spice of this sauce. It was LOVELY. I use it for salads, for cooking any meats or just as a dip.", 'Just ordered a Tortas de Pollo through Uber Eats. Timely delivery and Excellent Packaging. Excellent bread and great taste over all. However, an overdose of black pepper actually killed the dish (the 4 star is just for this)

Will treat it as a minor fault and will definitely order again.', '‚óºÔ∏è Home delivered üïí

‚óºÔ∏è Order was delivered withing 45mins and is reasonably priced.', 'Probably the best sandwiches in indiranagar . Filing , delectable , and not priced exorbitantly . Their dips are heavenly . reviews: ["Ordered a salad. Got only cabbage with a few olives and spinach leaves and it was soggy to the point of dripping with water. You don't want to pay so much for wet leaves.", 'Ordered pasta (Pasta Con Cipolle) with broccoli. Got the pasta without it. sinners. The coconut shake was ok ( i say that with reluctance :( ).', 'A tiny outlet in Indiranagar below Figurine Fitness for healthy tender coconut drinks & shakes. Visited the place for salads and ended up with ordering tenco refresher drink and non veg salad. They give it in a nice glass bottle and the shake looked very tempting and tasted good at affordable price and they even have subscription plans with attractive prices.', 'Happened to notice this small cafe and thought of trying it out. They essentially have a menu comprised of coconut-based drinks and salads and is ideal is for takeaway since they have just a couple of chairs outside on the road with limited space available. It is a good place to have some healthy and light salads. I tried the Special non veg salad and Just Coco drink and it was a refreshing change. The flavors of lemongrass and honey chilli with the chicken indeed made it taste good while the coconut malai was a welcome surprise. The food was packaged in takeaway boxes and the drink was served in a Tenco branded glass bottle.\xa0\nThey do need to majorly improve on the service time since despite being the only customers, our order took a good waiting time.']

reviews:
["Horrible service ! They called me after 84mins of placing the order asking for the address. Didn't refund the money as well. Terrible. I would never order from them.", 'Food was delivered an hour late - Food quality was average', "Recently I have been trying out Zomato's online ordering app. It's pretty awesome actually... 

So, I happened to come across this outlet with good rating one lazy day, and thaught of helping my test buds with something new. 

Hence I opted for a Low carb Mexican chicken cauliflower fried rice. I surely was eager to taste it, but totally bowled when the food was delivered at my doorstep.

I imagined it would be something healthy, but did not imagine a fried rice without rice. It was completely cooked with grated cauliflower and had chicken pieces. The taste was good. 

My only disappointment was the quantity of the food was less as compared to the price.

Team, thanks for surprising me with out of the box cooking."]

["Just like any other ambur biryani! Order after getting recommendation from people living nearby! Though it wasn't that special..the same normal rice.. The chicken was undercooked ! The gravy given along was sweet! Who has a sweet gravy along with chicken biryani! Won't recommend to anyone!!! 2 stars!", 'A typical ambur biryani take away centre with limited seats to dine in.

They serve only biryani and kebabs. The biryani was cooked pretty nice. The ambur biryani is flavoured mild with tender slow cooked chicken. The kebabs are pretty bad soaked in oil. The taste is pretty average. 

The ambiance is pretty simple. Prices are cheap. If you are on a budget than this would be a good place to collect a quick biryani and kebabs to go with.']

address: 841/1, Binnamangala, HAL 1st Stage, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Its an average outlet. The prices are really. On tthe lower side. They are the biggest chain in thailand. Im sure these people focus on the health and cleanliness compared to the likes of chicking and kfc. Tastewise, i dont think ita much high on the standards. Its pretty average and the quantity is less too.', "As expected different from other outlets. Each outlet has it's own menu.

99Rs Chicken combo isn't a good choice. Too bland. Hot dogs have bad bread but the sausage was delicious.

Chicken cheese nuggets are too tasty. Fully cheese filled with crispy outer layer", "Totally worth visiting. I've always been a fan of five star chicken, so when I spotted five star cafe, I readily went there.
They got a decent seating inside and outside. Outside seating had small wooden tables and benches, which is quite appealing,to have a view of whole 100 ft road.  We ordered chicken wraps, chocolate icecream and fried chicken. Totally worth the money.", "Ordered the super value meal -Biryani + Snack of Choice + Drink. Taste was decent but the quantity was pathetic. You wouldn't even get an amount of rice that is termed as a 'Personal' size. Calling it mini biryani would be more apt.", "Walked into Five Star Cafe for a quick lunch, this was the first time i've been to this place and for the price you pay the food is pretty decent and worth it. I tried their Super value meal, a Five Star spicy burger along with some coke and a crispy tandoori roll. Everything tastes pretty decent and i really liked the Mayo used in the burger, although a little bit of chilli sauce or something spicy would have done justice to its name.The roll was surprisingly very tasty. I wasn't a huge fan of the crispy fried chicken in the Combo but I loved the curries and sauces that the rice came with.
                                                bitesizedjournal.com", 'Five Star Chicken is one of the most popular brands in Asia with 9 countries coverage having more than 7000 outlets in Asian countries itself. Founded in near 1985 in Thailand, it is one of the top 5 companies of the world. It is the third largest producer of chicken in India itself. The company(CPF) has its own state of the art infrastructure for storage and distribution from Farm to Food.
                                                ...Read full post on foodgasmdiaries.wordpress.com', 'Recently I got an invite to be part of the exclusive Blogger‚Äôs review panel for the yet to launch menu of Five Star Cafe ( Five Star Chicken / CP/CP Foods/ Charoen Pokphand Foods) the leading fast food brand in India. This newest offerings of their new menu gives equal importance to non vegetarian‚Äôs as well as to pure Vegetarian‚Äôs like me. While reading out the new menu I was very excited as rarely I get to see so much of vegetarian options in any place which is all about catering to mainstream Non vegetarians and in the process completely neglect the vegetarians. So as a result one tends to stop visiting those place altogether. The Brand ‚Äò Five Star Chicken‚Äô which previously is mostly into non veg frozen food items is all ready to revamp it‚Äôs image and positioning it self as ‚Äò Five Star Cafe‚Äô.
                                                ...Read full post on ambrosiia.com', 'I would have said I loved this place...blah...blah....blah...

I have eaten here previously on many occassions and love the quality and aptly priced menu.

Today I however, ordered  crispy chicken burger and spicy tangy roll and utterly shocked that I got the bun than was stone like. Previously it used to be very soft bread. Called umpteen number of times to provide feedback but someone received the call and then hung up nearly 5 times. Hence I resorted to writing here.

The invoice number is 0000013817. 

Quality for any eatery joint is required to sustain. If this were to continue you may soon loose out on all ur customers.', 'Its a Flagship store for Five Star Chicken! This outlet looks completely different from the ones we see at different vicinity. I happened to try few of the dishes from Five Star Chicken and totally loved the fare. After this visit, i keep ordering from Five Star Chicken now. Well, i tried Yummy Veg Burger, Peri Peri Fries, Veg Roll, Vegetable Biryani. The prices at Five Star Chicken outlets are reasonable and filling though, which is commendable. They do have a balcony seating, which is pleasant.
                                                bangaloreepicure.com', 'We all know the Bangalore is an IT Hub of India; there is an unknown fact that, it‚Äôs also a hub for new restaurants & tiny eateries. We see 100‚Äôs of new restaurants opening every month and those are running well because of the strategy, offers and good marketing. Also, the taste & consistency of the dishes play a vital role in any restaurant! Well, recently Five Star Chicken invited few food bloggers in the town to try out their newly introduced dishes. As soon as I see the Invite, I felt what Vegetarians have to do with Five Star Chicken! However, my assumption was wrong. Because Five Star Chicken has numerous Veg options, which most of us aren‚Äôt aware!
                                                ...Read full post on naveensuresh3.wordpress.com']

address: 11, Century Plaza, Kamaraj Road, Commercial Street, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['nice cosy place ..... yummy food .... delivered in a readonable time ..... less waiting ..... nice music ..... a sure revisit listed place and recommended to friends ....... 
to grab a quick bite between ur shopping at comms street a must visit ...... try the savoury waffle flavours esply bbq one ......', '#Hashtag.

A nice place to chillout and treat yourself a dessert after all the hustle and bustle of commercial shopping.

A small place with limited seating but quite good food.

We tried a couple of things, something unique they have is a pizza waffle. A waffle base and the toppings of a pizza, but the drawback is the waffle softens because of the melted cheese. 

The savoury waffles are scrumptious and they do not hold back with the filling and mayo. A combination of hot waffle with cold mayo indeed makes it unique.

The Belgian chocolate waffle also known as the dark maze, I loved it throughout every bite was sinful and loaded with secret chocolate.

Good place for a small snack.
Overall- 3.7/5.', 'Great quality waffles at such reasonable prices!', '', 'Why go for expensive ones like frozen bottle and keventers, check in to hashtag and experience the wide range of shakes and waffles which are far more better than others and reasonably priced.', 'Very nice stuff in affordable prices.', '', '', 'Best waffles ,shakes and mocktails ever and good place for desserts üç¥üç¥
Best ambiance üòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄüòÄ
Good service ü§©ü§©ü§©ü§©
Reasonable price üíµüíµüíµ']

more_info: Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Smoking Area, Table booking recommended, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['', "We decided to try this place based on the reviews, however we were quite disappointed. We waited for an hour but they were not able to deliver anything except the soup....they had only one chef , hence the delay. BTW they don't make pizzas anymore !", 'Have been there on a weekday and it‚Äôs a descent ambience. The food was really yummy and it‚Äôs worth spending as the quantity is also huge. After a long time I see somebody giving chips along with burger üòã which I used to have when I was a kid. This made me so happy. 4 of us have gone and we ordered veg chilli burger, chicken biryani, potato wedges and chicken burger. Every item was tasty and pocket friendly as well. Whichever item you order the taste is good.', "Whoever is the owner of this place this is for you. Your staff is going to eat up your busines, your resturant has such an amazing potential, food is great, good ambience but your staff is very delusional. We went on a saturday night with two friends who are vegetarians and ordered pure veg food.To our surprise your staff served us chicken instead of paneer. YES CHICKEN. The bad service doesn't end here we reordered for 1 tandoori roti and the staff got us a basket of rotis ( imagine the wastage ) The night gets better when we are charged for a plate of garlic bread that we ordered but never got. It breaks my heart to see a resturant with such a good food suffering due to moronic staffs, please take charge or else it's downhill from here.", "I love this place. Despite being quite simplistic, Grubhouse has a great feel to it. When it comes to the most important part, I. E. the food, you wouldn't be disappointed. Give the beef burgers and pork ribs a try.", 'Visited this place last weekend . Was surprised to find them pet friendly which is indees a great initiative ! I ordered
- pizza ( loved it, too generous amount of cheese and good portion )
- chicken wings ( good taste )
- chilly beef ( good one )
I liked the ambience and the monochrome of white theme which was soothing . Quieter place with good choice of playlist ..nice place to hang out for brunches and evening .', 'Been meaning to review this place for quite sometime. This is my go to place whenever i want to order some comfort food other than Indian and Chinese. I love their pasta - the bolognese and the carbonara. The carbonara is sooo good, creamy sauce with boiled eggs and crispy bacon. I have been too many premium italian  restaurants but theirs the best. Another one of my favs is the shepherds pie. Creamy mashed potato and juicy lamb mince with the right amount of heat. Hits the spot every time!', "10/10 service, 10/10 food, a simple, cosy dine. So, you can dine from both Singh Saab and Grubhouse together which made it pretty perfect. Best Punjabi food I have eaten in a while and the Grubhouse continental did not disappoint either. All's good, a real happy, yummy in my tummy meal that doesn't burn a hole in your pocket.", 'The restaurant is a combination of Grubhouse and a punjabi restaurant. The menu is combined and you have the option of ordering a mix from both the menu.

We had ordered bbq chicken wings, chicken steak in mushroom and pepper sauce and a pizza. Chicken wings was juicy and had great aroma of garlic infused in the barbecue sauce coating. The sauce of chicken steak was the best part of the dish and chicken was perfectly cooked. The pizza was delicious and would love to come back here.', "By far some of the best burgers I've tasted in Bangalore. Good service and great background music. If you're looking for a quaint dinner hangout, this is the place for you.
The only disappointment were the milkshakes, they could've done a better job there."]

address: 84/85, Safina Plaza, Infantry Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Free Parking, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area, Live Sports Screening, Live Music, Rooftop, Pet Friendly,
reviews:
['A Cafe that serves good food in the Central Business District, near Commercial Street. We visited this place with a few friends last weekend and had a great experience. The French Fries, Tomato basil soup, Grill chicken mushroom sauce, Penne alfredo chicken and Spaghetti aglio olio were all very tasty.
The seating is an open seating with 2 tents on either side. The cool breeze blowing on your face helps you get one with nature here. Mr, Robin, the Steward was very courteous and helpful.', "Coco jumbo a new place at infantry road situated on the terrace of safina plaza building.

Few words about ambience, this place on terrace with a fresh breeze hitting your body, sipping your favourite hot chocolate is all you need on a weekend.

Started off sipping hot chocolate with some masala french fries to balance the sugar rush.

And then Some chicken pesto bruschetta , very light n flavorful.

BBQ wings served with good amount of bbq sauce.

The penne arabiata pasta was one of the best I had in town. To good it was. The balanced flavour of garlic and chilli peppers. The sourness of the sauce does not over power your senses.

Best place to visit with friends.I would definitely come back to have the pasta here. Don't miss out when you are here.", 'Ambience: This place is on the roof top, however it‚Äôs more like a terrace of some big house. The reason why I say this is coz there are rooms that have windows facing the tables. The weather currently is super good so the clues and sky look beautiful to dine under. 

Food: Pretty average place with a limited number of dishes and a small open kitchen on the rooftop. The Pasta and chicken wings were pretty good. Nothing seemed bad honestly except the burger which was very ordinary. Even the shakes had a great amount of creaminess to it which was decently thick n sweet.', "Coco Jumbo goes by its name of serving each and every dish in a fascinating jumbo way. Visited this place on last weekend and believe me it's a beautiful cafe available with roof top. You can enjoy good food while cherishing gorgeous Bengaluru clouds.

When it comes to food they cover most of the cuisines. Tried Masala Fries, Penne Pasta and their Cottage Cheese Finger definitely deserves a try. The dishes are simple and efforts are made to leave a long lasting impression on ones taste buds. What I like the most is that dishes will not cost much on pocket because of their not so high prices.", 'Entering to this cozy place, gives you some real positive aura.
With really simple interiors, they have come up with this cute place to hang out.
I had chicken pesto bruchetta, penna Alfredo , spaghetti, and grill chicken mushroom. Everything tastes good.
Being a fries lover, I also ordered masala french fries, totally yum with mayo.
Also, not forgetting to mention Robin, his service is really nice.', "This newly opened restaurant in MG road is perhaps one of the best roof top cafe's that I have been to. To begin with, the tomato basil soup was a little high on the tomato content but goes fabulously well with the monsoon terrace winds. Both the masala and regular French fries were perfectly crispy and well seasoned. The penne Alfredo was served piping hot which gave the cheese the best of textures. Also loved the chunky penne Arabiata pasta and the pesto spaghetti. The hot chocolate simply delicious so are the cold coffee and fresh juices. In vegetarian, they have some great options as well of which the cottage cheese fingers were my favourite. End your meal here with some delicious ice creams and keep craving for more."]

address: 228, Kempegowada Service Road, HAL, 2nd Stage, Doopanahalli, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Beer, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Serves Cocktails, Group Meal, Table booking recommended, Catering Available, Vegan Options,
reviews:
['Nice ambience, ordered for bi maki (shrimp tempura sushi, soft shell crab black, pepper, mee goreng chicken, & chicken woke tossed thai fried rice, also ordered for high on grass, twisted tropical orange, nice beer based cocotail, high on grass with superb, food was great, nice service, great job team misu, team kitchen.', 'I have been a frequent visitor and fan of their branch at St Marks Road and i must say i definitely love their food. Their dimsums are a must try and also their desserts are a definite no miss!', 'In Frame: Japanese Souffle Cheesecake ,Raunbow Dumplings,Mushroom Chestnut Fried Pouch, Vietnamese Thupka 1üòç Its a proper Asian Restaurant, Everything was just great here.Great Ambience ,Service too With courteous staff..', "Decent Asian food but overpriced for the quality

Heard a lot about this joint so thought of giving it a try one evening. The decor and ambiance are praiseworthy and so is the service. Coming to food, there were some hits and some misses. The maki was good and so was the khowsouey. The Bao was really bad and so were both the desserts we ordered. I would not suggest having dessert here at all as it seems it's just loaded with sugar.

Over all it has some decent dishes, but nothing extraordinary for the price they charge and hence i feel it's overpriced, especially given that there are several good Asian places in Indiranagar that serve much better food at lower prices.

Would really advice the management to look into the quality as some of the stuff was below par.", 'Went to Misu for lunch twice.

The first time, we ordered veg red thai curry with jasmine rice (YUMMY) and Krapow tofu (quite meh in itself, but absolutely worth a shot when mixed with the red curry) with jasmine rice.

The second time, we ordered the summer garden roll (average) and spicy yaki Soba with extra garlic and peanuts (yummy noodles).

In addition, Misu also provides pickled cucumber+carrots, chilli oil and black bean sauce (all 3 amazing additions!)

Good food, good service and lovely decor+music.

They accepted our cred coupon for a 20% discount as well. Shall be returning for sure!', 'Had not prebooked my lunch but got the table luckily. They served me with their chutney n sauces initially but the staff spilled it on the table. 
I has ordered for the set menu.
Food was really good but you need to inform the staff to get everything one by one to enjoy ghe meal. 
The staff was polite and helpful but a little sloppy.
The ambience and vibe of the place is goid but the washroom couldbe better.', 'Great ambiance,specially people like me, who used go behind a proper asian restaurant.
Service 5/5
presentation 5/5
taste 5/5
atmosphere 5/5
we have ordered for avocado sushi,rainbow dumpling & padkemao for mains.
Numa was very helpful to select the dishses from menu.
Must try there matcha tea garden..

keep up the good work..cheers', "Misu definitely won me over with their courtesy and not to forget their FOOD.
We got started with jasmine tea, rainbow chicken and basil dumplings and spicy tofu avocado maki. The dumplings were very soft, they almost melted in the mouth, sushi was also very good, but not spicy as the name suggestedüòâ.
Coming to the main course we ordered stir fried vegetables with chilli basil sauce and nasi goreng. Both of the items were pleasantly very nice.
After having all these, we thought of calling it a day, but we had a nice chat with Avinash who was attending that evening. He surprised us with their house famous japanese souffle cheesecake as complimentary. We would've surely missed this awesome cheesecake else.
Will definitely visit this place again to try something else in their menu.", 'Quick tip:- for accompaniments they could have served a kimchi,try the pad Thai. The portion size is good. Prawn dishes are done well. The wine cocktails are too strong ask the waiter for suggestions before ordering. Can try new dishes menu is pretty good.

Grilled mushrooms- soft and well done 
Teriyaki grilled prawn- soft and done very well
Chicken n prawn Sui Mai- succulent nice dumplings
Pad Thai- flavours were good
Burnt garlic fried rice-done well
Kung Pao chicken- flavours were spot on 
The wine cocktail recommended was made of a reduced plum should be mentioned if sweet or too pungent. Wines should be explained more elaborately for the prices charged. 
The accompaniments could be made better and the pickled veggies were too sour, I would like if I wasn‚Äôt explained what you‚Äôll served and concentrated on the feedback!
Over all a good experience will get back to try more!!']

Now a days it‚Äôs so difficult to get fresh food. I will recommend to order food from there only. Tasty and yummy food üòã', 'The restaurant is listed as vegetarian but it seems that they also make food that contains egg.']

Ambience: ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è.5/5', "Reviewing an old classic Chinese place.. Have been going there for a long time..

Even though it has crowded floor space with tables occupied every possible inch.. One can blame them for making the most of the business offered.. Invariably always crowded with people waiting and that's what makes it worth it..

One of the few places which makes the American Chopsuey to perfection. Love that dish. The soups and starters are very good.

I don't know of any dish that I don't like there.

address: 20/A, 3rd Floor, 1st Cross Road, KHB Colony, Koramangala 5th Block, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Mughlai Paratha', 'Butter Chicken', 'Kadhai Murgh', 'Chicken Biryani', 'Shahi Tukda', 'Shami Kebab', 'Mutton Biryani']
reviews:
["Found the flavour of #lucknow right here in Bangalore. While the food was really delicious, the service was a bit on the slower side. Nevertheless, whatever we ordered was finger lickin' good.", 'Situated at the heart of Koramangala 5th Block, Little Lucknow is a great place to go and have a nice Nawabi dinner.
Great place, with authentic Lucknavi flavoured kebabs and gravy dishes and decor.
Easy on the pocket too. The Breads were delicious too, special mention to the Laccha Paratha and Mughlai Paratha.
Mutton Boti Kebab Masala and the Mughlai Chicken Masala were delicious.
Highly recommended the place.', 'Went there for lunch. Discovered this place due to Zomato Gold. The Mutton Biryani although tastes really good but the quantity of mutton was very bad. All bones. The chicken lajawab is a must try and would like to visit again.', 'A very cosy little piece of place. Staff are uber polite and friendly. We had ordered so much food of variety and were not disappointed in any of bites we took. Their Awadhi kheer is a delight. They definitely know how to make mutton.

P.S: They gladly let you play your playlist over the system, that also by Bluetooth. üôÉ', "A hard to notice gem in the Koramangala food street, this place offers authentic Lakhnavi shahi spices in its licious Mughlai offerings and flavourful Dum Pukht. Awadhi roots can be experienced in its thick rich gravy, enthralling aroma and quite lucrative interior design resembling the Mughal art of dine. I won't say it's the best place for Lucknow-style cuisine in the area but come on a Saturday night with your loved ones, and believe me you won't regret. It's because gems sit silently and are quite hard to find."]

reviews: ['', 'One of the best chicken rolls i have ever tasted... price very expensive but its absolutely worth... double egg burji chicken roll was quite enough to fill my tummy... perfect place for rolls i would say... awesome taste...', 'staff was very polite and used to serve food that was very decent. this was my first experience so much recommended to everyone go and taste.', 'Loved the Gobhi paratha. It was big enough and at reasonable price.\nThey sell the French fries that are spicy and crispy enough, freshly made. Overall had a good experience.', "Galli belly a good place for paratha and sandwiches. I had many time chicken roll and sandwich. Vada pav and samosa evening time a nice to had with affordable price. Now I feel like use to daily customer. It's nice place for quick bite near EGL.", "Nice place for quick bite. Specially for paratha and sandwich and evening Vada pav also too good. Near to egl it's best place to have snacks.", "Arresting on the outside; hardly enough inside. Galli Belly may seem like a food joint you'd get what you wish for, but no. We had Egg club Sandwich and Double Egg Roll. The taste was indistinct and weak. The filling was not enough and the bread was a little burnt but you get used to it. Both the snack items totaled up to Rs. 130/- and for such spendings, anyone would expect more and the dishes did not exceed our satisfaction.", 'They packed food that fell on the floor. This is something they did in front of everyone when they thought that no one had noticed - fortunately I did. If this is something they are doing in front, God knows what they do at the back.']

restaurant_name: Sidewalk Cafe & Bar - The Paul Bangalore

reviews:
['', 'Excellent food, excellent hospitality. Puts 7 star hotels to shame. One of my favourite places in Bengaluru. Super chill ambience and very friendly staff. Keep it up!', '', 'A great place, great food, courteous staff... I loved the pizza... 

I did not book, we just walked in.. not too crowded nice play to hangout... 

I did see a good buffet option, will try out next time...', 'Binoy provided good service .... Really love it here this weekend', "The only one word that comes to my mind after visiting this place is 'Classy'. The decor was so classy, i loved the ambience. The food was top notch and so do the service.", 'They are not accepting gold membership', "This place took me by surprise. I dig the quaint vibe of the place and the tables are spaced out well. I'm unsure as to how the restaurant is connected to The Paul and but I bet it's a fun place to be at during Oktoberfest.
The bar offers a good variety of wine, and pizza and pasta to go with it under the warm yellow glow from archaic-looking lamp posts is quite a feel.", 'Awesome place for do party.. Yesterday we visited with my closed friends.. Fully satisfied... Food was month watering... Service also good... Ambiance was good... Sanjay was very good waiter.. He gave us great service.. address: 8, 2nd Floor, Allied Grande Plaza, Diagonally Opposite Garuda Mall, Magrath Road, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Smoking Area, Nightlife, Outdoor Seating, Pool Table, Indoor Seating, Dance Floor, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
["I had a lot of expectations from this place. But it did not turn out to be that mind blowing. Had some few bad things including the service. The waiter gave a lot trouble in beer menu and most of them were not available. Apart from that all our orders were coming quickly. That was a plus point. Dj was good and Bollywood songs were started around 10 but the dance floor was a bit congested. The food was quite tasty no doubt in that. Veg tandoor platter and veg hawaiin pizza was phenomenonal. The drinks were great aw well including mocktails. Shirley ki jaani was the top pick. Another issue with the place was that the ac fans were directly above our seats and we were shivering. When asked if they can close that fan or something else, they denied. So just because of these 2 things, couldn't give 5 stars. Rest was a good experience.", 'I ordered french fries loaded with cheese, quantity and taste both were great.I have ordered a paneer pizza which tastes amazingly delicious. However , nachos which i order was not at all good in taste.I have also ordered a lime soda which was bad in taste too.
However coming to ambiance, this place is great to dance and enjoy. Service was good üëç', 'Had been here on a Friday night. They had free drinks on the house for all the ladies. Had an amazing time. The DJ and music was superb. The food was tasty and quantity was enough. Loved the dance floor here as it is spacious with a good crowd. Safe for girls too. Overall the best Dj Club I have visited in Bangalore.', 'Nice place to be , food is moderately priced and they have two dance floor playing Bollywood and edm on weekends dj were good and crowd was also nice
, food is average here portions are small
Zomato gold is accepted with same menu
Staff is not that polite, this is with most of clubs these days
guys entry is charged and can be denied also sometimes', 'It is undoubtedly the best club I have visited in Bangalore till date. Its one of those places that you do not go to sit\xa0 and have a conversation. You go here to bust a move. They have amazing DJs .

I love the Cosmopolitan here. The food is average and so is the service. The place gets really crowded at night and its almost impossible to get your orders in time.']

reviews: ['This is supposedly a fine dine restaurant charging ‚Çπ140 for a fruit salad with ice cream. A basic customer expectation would be that the fruit salad should contain Kiwi or atleast grapes. When asked i was told they only have Watermelon, musk melon, Apple, pine apple and Banana. Well these fruits we also get on roadside at ‚Çπ20 rupees, considering the cost of service this shouldn‚Äôt have been more than ‚Çπ80 rupees. The concern here is not the cost, the concern here is value for money. Hope this feedback helps. Thanks']

address: St Patricks Complex, 2nd Floor, Brigade Road, Ashok Nagar
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Such a horrible place, if you look at  the face of owner we will not eat anything,soo money minded people. No value for customers . They should learn from other mallu restaurants.', 'I been to adukkla restaurant food was fantastic this my second time i had fish meales prawn fry appam. great service and kudos kitchen team.i will come back', 'I was pleasantly surprised by the packing and authentic Kerala taste that I could find at this place (at least in terms of a couple of dishes). Some dishes are value for money, whereas some are downright expensive.

Plain rice- Was surprised with the amount of rice available for such a cheap price. Plus, they also provided pickle and sambhar, which is quite thoughtful‚úå‚úå. I would not change much because the rice was cooked perfectly every single time.

Prawns Fry- This was a letdown. First of, the price was quite high for the quantity that was offered. The taste was also lacklusterüëé', 'A group of  5 members went to the restaurant today, the restaurant service is worst experience in my entire life .they don‚Äôt even bother about us .were are like waiting for a hour ,after an hour they give a glass of water ..I really pissed off with the service.', 'The restaurant in the Brigade road.. Near a school building in 2nd floor. The Appam & Beef curry is good here. Kerala Poratta and Kerala meals is available here', 'Such a pathetic place..the owner is a fraud..first ask for the estimated price and then order..v ordered n v had to wait for half an hour..over priced not worth the money.. basically a kaththi place..', 'Nothing great, had their fish curry meals in lunch and another day tried appam chicken roast in dinner. Meals was ok . chicken roast was pathetic [instead of roast it was deep chicken fry]\xa0
Huge space in second floor , Space was clean and service was ok. ...\xa0 behaviour was good, but lacked attentiveness .. like for meals the curries on table were missing and need to be called multiple times... Reordering appam took more time as no one was around to take the order', 'Very nice Kerala Food served with passion . The name Adukkala strike me to visit this place and I was stunned by clean and tidy restaurant .

I had puttu + kadala and it was great !! Menu was filled with verity of authentic Kerala food .

I am going to visit them again and again to try all the items in their menu .', 'Very tasty kerala food. Loved the Appam - beef combo. Appam is really soft and sweet, and well cooked beef in light brown masala gravy is something to die for. Pocket friendly. Highly recommended.', "They serve food prepared with their own recipes and even the masalas used are prepared by them. We had a veg meals from there and it was to my surprise veg meals came with a variety of curries especially their aviyal which even had cooked raw jackfruit pieces. All together it tastes very homely and fresh. The place is absolutely neat and tidy, with a very calm and peaceful atmosphere. Its a great place to get the value for money spent and I would be visiting again to try out more dishes. Their pothi choru is another one in the menu I'm eagerly waiting to try out ."]

cuisines: Steak, Italian, Continental, American, Burger, BBQ, Salad
address: 1, Brunton Road, 1st Cross, Ashok Nagar, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Wine, Indoor Seating, Outdoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['This is a review of their Halloween Special Dinner menu. The meal started with a refreshing lemonade. Just the right zing. Starter was a Chicken Saltimbocca. A mix of crusted chicken with creamy spinach. Interesting concept. Delicately roasted with cajun or equivalent spices. Spinach was a good foil. Nice plating. Next was the entree. The steak was juicy, soft and paired with a simple tangy red wine sauce. Mushrooms and baked potatoes round off the experience. Zucchini, carrots and shallots bring in a bit of health, thus reducing the guilt. Quality of meat could improve. But that could be put down to a sourcing constraint. Korean grass fed or Angus Prime, is too much to ask. Dessert was a moist walnut cake. Not too sweet. A perfect meal. Great service.', 'Went for a late lunch at around 3:30....nice interiors ordered farmers market salad,double cheese burger,philly cheese beef pizza ,stir fried pepper steak and steak supreme and an apple pie.....the was nice', 'Case of a place which did not live up to the hype. Well done up place with a decent ambience. But the lethargic service ruined the experience. Food wise it was quite decent. Burger, steaks, all was fine. But not the pleasant overall experience which you expect.', "Could have been better. I had heard about portland from my friends. Went there to satisfy my meat cravings. Although I'd say I wasn't disappointed, but I wasnt too happy either.
Service is good and the server new his steaks well. I ordered a filet mignon, ribeye and a turkey/cranberry pizza. The filet was good but the ribeye had unedible fat along with it which was a pain. The pizza was surprisingle good. I also ordered 2 pies and they were decently good too. Decent choice to spend a lazy Sunday afternoon with wine and steaks
So here it goes
Food -3/5
Service- 5/5
Ambience - 3.5/5
Cost- 4/5
Overall- 3.5/5

Can go there again to try something different.", "I had been to this lovely restaurant with my partner in the month of February.We had tried fried calamari and meat balls for starters...The calamari was outstanding and the meat balls too were full of flavours.For main course we ordered, burger and old school steak..loved the steak.For drinks we ordered a passion fruit and kiwi mojito...both the drinks were refreshing..apple pie was our dessert..The ambience was soothing with dim lights and candles..I'd say it's perfect for a quiet romantic date..The staff is very courteous and friendly..would definitely be back...", 'Pretty good steakhouse. I had the Filet Mignon, medium cooked. Not the best steak I have had in Bangalore, but quite good. For dessert I had cheesecake, which was okay, but not noteworthy. Service was kind of indifferent though.', 'This is hands down my favourite steakhouse in bangalore! The interior is a perfect setting, with well lit glass ceilings. 
So they have a reasonable wine menu, ended up ordering a bottle cause it turned out cheaper than per glass. 
Coming to the food, we ordered a T-bone with mushroom sauce and a filet mignon with house bbq sauce. 
So first you choose your cut, then you choose your sauce, then how you want it cooked. We went with medium rare and medium. Which was on point! The juices from the meat were dripping! 
I usually always end with apple pie after a steak, but the apple pie was average! Prefer the apple pie at the only place!', 'Perfect to set the evening with great ambience. I tried their mocktails which were really delicious. I haven‚Äôt tasted the wine though. Next time may be. The steak was nicely cooked just how I asked. It had a great taste. And the cherry on top was the dessert that I ordered. It was hot, melting, yummy and everything. I would definitely love to go there again.']

address: 33/1, RamaKrishna Mutt Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Taste of Chhola Bhature is excellent and must try. But service is very poor. The lady who caters there is very much confused. She will make customers wait like anything. She will pack Bhature and make wait for 10 mins. Then pack Chhole and make wait for 10 mins. Then collect money and give parcel. She can be improved or changed to increase customer experience. Apart from this, food is very good and must try.', "Good taste not great would rate 7/10 owners are courteous and warm all in all good place bhature we're awesome chole not up to mark aloo sabzi was good", "Worth visiting
I tried three things.
Plain Kachori - ‚Çπ10 Great for the price.
Tasted fresh and delicious. It had decent amount of fillings.

Kachori Chaat- ‚Çπ20 Loved the Masaley used. The boiled channa added to the taste.

Bhel Puri -‚Çπ25 This was a downer for me. The puri(puffed rice) used wasn't something I liked. They were soft and thick and the lack of enough masala was a let down.

Nevertheless the Chaat store delivers what it promises at super cheap price. The place is hygienic and is in a small lane.", 'Visited the place this sunday on a friends recommendation. m a big fan of delhi chole bhature... review about the chole bhature here... it is among the best i have had in bangalore... they give alu like delhi style... gazar pickle is missing... bhature is served hot...place is quite crowded and car parking is not possible... must try... the owners are patient to handle so many bhature lovers in a short span of time.. if u go with delhi chole bhature in bangalore in mind... u will be upset... but if u r thinking about something among the best available in bangalore...this place will not disappoint', "Excellent Chhole Bhature on Sunday mornings. Better VFM than Kartik's Mithai Shoppe near Indiranagar BDA, which used to be our default Sunday morning breakfast earlier.", 'People who say taste of choley bhaturey is like Delhi are really not aware of the real taste of Delhi is, road side wala in Delhi makes better than what Maaheshwari chaat guys are making that too at much cheaper rates. Its not even 1% close to that taste, its just ok in taste. If you have not tasted Delhi stuff then this might be a good taste for you.', 'Awesome North Indian (dilli wala) taste of Chole Bhature only available on Sunday . love to be here again and again, Behind Someshwara Temple , Ulsoor. Hosts are a lovely couple with smile to greet and fingerlicking taste.
Also, if u want to try their chat items, do visit the shop from Monday to Saturday after 5 PM. Highly recommended..', 'Best place to have affordable and delicious chole bature on a Sunday morning. The batures are served only on Sundays for breakfast and is super crowded . There is minimum of 20 min waiting to place order and get it but the taste and quantity is super worth and satisfying . The staff is patient enough to handle such crowd and provide quality service . Over all it‚Äôs a must try place for a budget friendly breakfast.', 'Chole bature is the only thing you should concentrate here. That too is available on Sunday from morning 8:30 to 11:30. Try going early,so that you will get it served in less time.', "OMG! They prepare undoubtably the best chole bhature in town.
I haven't tried other items there but Chole Bhature on Sunday morning is worth the travel and time.
Very soft and special black chole."]

reviews:
["Ordered an Aglio Olio - first of all the quantity for what is considered a main course and is priced as 1 is terrible! Secondly, I've never had an Aglio Olio pasta with carrots and capsicum as vegetables, only those two with a few olives btw and as you can see from the image there are NO CHILI FLAKES or GARLIC, two of the main ingredients in the dish. Aglio Olio is one of the simplest pastas to make and means olive oil and garlic in Italian - it has like 3 main ingredients - olive oil, garlic, and chili flakes and the dish tasted nothing like any of them. I'm obviously cautious of trying anything more complicated dishes from this place. Very disappointing. As the name suggests, probably the shakes which get the good reviews are the priority and the others are just accessories.", '', '', "They have reduced the quantity by half. I don't believe it's worth the price now.I was fond of this place previously but drastically reducing the quantity and keeping the prices same is unfair to the customers.", "Tried the french fries, pasta (alfredo), brownie shake and red velvet shake. The shakes were absolutely delicious, they're a must try. Prompt service and polite waiters.", 'The pasta what we ordered was tasteless it almost had no Malala and also the burger wasn‚Äôt served properly', "Looks like a shady place from the outside, but don't be fooled by looks. Quite an interesting Cafe/Snacks hangout in indiranagar. Interiors are nicely done with colorful painting and graffiti. Nice board games and cards too to hangout and play with friends. Enjoyed the food and quick service too. Even the quantity was nice, quite economical too. Targeted at students, good combo options available.", 'Rich, Tasty and healthy. Epitome of goodness.
Cheesecake Shake and chocoholic are too good.
Ask for Jenga or chess to time pass. Short bites are available too. But the shakes are to die for.', 'Ordered cold coffee.. it‚Äôs amazing .. extremely thick.. just enough sweet.. too refreshing! Loved it ! Will try more flavours .. 

Packaging is cool too in a handy glass bottle ..', 'Small cafe for having some chilled milk shakes and some hot maggy or french fries or whatever you like. They have some nice combos which you will definitely like if you are milk shake lover. The way they serve their items are also little unique. It‚Äôs little over priced, but still you can spend some time there by sipping the chilled and thick milk shakes.']

reviews:
['', 'My favourite coorgi restaurant. Reasonably priced to regularly order and the pork is goood. The akki roti was dry. I get Only the pork fry from here.', 'Had just come back from coorg and craving for some of the wonderful cuisine i had there ( standards had been set by my meals at "coorg cuisine" in madikeri and in the tamara resort). And hotel dil coorg did not disappoint. I had ordered pork dishes and the chicken curry. The meat was really soft and well cooked, flavors were just right and the chicken curry was very smooth and light. Wanted to try the akki roti (rice rotis) but these were not available when i ordered', 'Ordered pork fry and Rice balls which was in authentic taste of coorg..Ghee rice and chicken curry were a perfect combo..Overall happy with the taste and value for money...üéâüéâ', 'Not a bad option for pork .. Actually I am looking for pork dry .. So I ordered for take away .. Taste was gud and portion size also OK ..
For us it OK OK .. Not a bad ...', 'Well,being a coorgie and surviving without coorg Food, is a TASK.But,this place have made my life so easy staying in Bangalore‚ô•Ô∏èNow I don‚Äôt really need to wait until I travel back to my hometown to have my favourite food‚ô•Ô∏è Great Thanks to Hotel Dil Coorgüòäüíñ', 'amazing taste!', 'Yummy coorgi food!!', 'I had ordered pork fry it was very OK but I was just thinking that if the sourness was little bit reduced it would be more tasty...

Single thought', 'no taste']

address: C/o Indiqube Brigade Square, Muncipal No. 21, Situated at Cambridge Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Momos', 'Thick Shakes', 'Burgers', 'Oreo Shake', 'Peri Peri Fries', 'Hot Chocolate', 'Red Velvet Shake']
reviews: ["Had ordered filter coffee and ginger chai from Chai Central for one of our events. Both were steaming hot when delivered. Delivery was on time. The packaging was perfect. Usually most of the chai delivery outlet's chai leak by the time it gets delivered. I am very impressed that this did not happen with Chai Central. Absolutely amazed by the quantity provided. There use no plastic which is a big bonus point.\n\nComing to the taste, beverage was very fresh. No ginger extract used. They had used the fresh ginger. Could tell that by the aroma. The best part is, they have customizations available. They provide sugarless chai too. So, if you are craving for some good chai, do order from Chai Central!"]

reviews:
["I've ordered king's Breakfast from this place. They have three type of English breakfast items and most expensive is the one I have ordered. Generally restaurants have the price difference because of item difference for a particular product. This particular product comes with 2 sausages, 2 becons, omelette, baked beans, mash potatoes.
The thing I got was completely different from the description. There was no sausage, no mashed potatoes (instead they gave 1 hash brownies), becons were very small.

Advice for owner: Customers need not to be cheated like this when they are spending a handsome amount for the product. Also, don't keep things you can't afford.", "Great omelets but please stop using so much plastic in your deliveries. A simple paper/cardboard container would suffice. The plastic containers are pretty much why I've stopped ordering."]

address: 23, Opposite Aishwarya Bar, Appareddy Palya, Double Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['The Mutton Donne Biryani and the Mutton Liver Fry were great, if not amazing. Liver was fresh, and it had a "snap" to it.

Chicken Kebab was a bit dry. Should have been served with a side of onion or coriander n mint chutney.

Ending with drinking 2 small glasses of piping hot rasam to end the lunch was great. If you want, you have a varied range of cold drinks as well.']

address: 322/1, 1st Floor, CMH Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Lunch Menu, Indoor Seating, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended,
most_liked_Food: [5, 'Sea Food', 'Neer Dosa', 'Fish', 'Murgh Ghee Roast', 'Prawn Ghee Roast', 'Crab Soup', 'Coconut Pudding']
reviews:
["Maravanthe in Indiranagar - just opposite the metro station has been my go to place for Mangalorean sea food since years now. I love their ghee roast dishes specifically their prawns and Crab Ghee Roast. Paired with soft neer dosas and some shell fish sukka and you're done. Also get some coconut desserts if you crave for the sweet tooth. And they have nice juices - - ask for the days special to Relish on some more delight! The service though is a little slow to respond to queries and prices are a little too much compared for the ghee roast compared to its less quantity. Nevertheless tastes amazing.
One disappointment was that I was informed they don't accept Zomato gold on seafood fresh catches which includes prawns and shell fish. Being a seafood place, and putting a restriction on sea food for Zomato gold was a turn off. Team should work around this. Rest I liked the place and food is tasty, so is the good hygiene maintained.", 'Such an amazing coastal food. Chicken and fish are must try here.

Yummy ghee roast goes good with neer dosa.

Service need some improvement, but would still rate 3/5. Cost is average and food is worth every penny spent.

Would love to visit this place again and again', 'Excellent Seafood they serve. There seer fish/king fish tawa fry and prawns with cocunut is very delicious. The food quality is also good. Very fresh and good hygiene.', "It's a typical Mangaloren restaurant!!

If you want to enjoy typical coastal food then visit this place without thinking about price!!

Coz they charge minimum 400 for fish items!!üòä

We ordered Neer Dosa, Koti rotti and fish masala!!üòã

Taste was good and have to mention about ambience and service which was good and comfortable!!!üòç

Overall I can rate 4/5ü§ó", 'Maravanthe is a coastal food fine dining restaurant in Indiaranagar. It has a small entrance but the 1st floor where the restaurant is has a good space. The ambiance is good. The furniture is robust and the wallart work is minimal ,yet to the point.
I thought initially that the service was good but later had a feeling that they were a little too keen on getting the guests done with.. At one point, there were 4 people taking our orders..
The food is the star attraction.. We had ordered, a Buttermilk, Solekhadi ( kokam mixed Buttermilk), a plate of Rava babycorn, a ghee roast Squids, A Maravanthe special veg Thali and a Prawns Biryani.

Well the buttermilk was good, but the Solekhadi was amazing!! The squids and the tabs babycorn were out of the world and fingerlicking good..the Thali was just about OK. The Prawns Biryani was superb, though it felt that the prawns were added later to a Veg Biryani.

All in all, it was a good visit.', 'The food was good.A nice place to get mangalorean food.
We ordered neer dosa,ghee roast and prawn biryani 
The food was tasty the only thing that I felt was the ghee roast was a bit dry otherwise the food was good 
Ambience: its a formal setting  
Staff:very polite and courteous.', 'To start off, the waiters were so humble n polite when ever they were asked to get something. The Neer Dosa was soft and tasty unlike other places and the Mutton Biriyani‚Äôs flavour was exceptional üëåüèº

The reason for 3 stars was mainly cause the Mutton pieces were NOT tender and when asked, he said other ppl did not have a problem. They may not be foodies and the meat that I got was definitely of an old goat. Lost sense of smell so can‚Äôt confirm if it was sheep. So I asked if the pieces can be exchanged for chicken and he did give me by making sure he charged me for Mutton Biriyani though. When questioned, he says it‚Äôs only u who had a problem n u already ate a piece of Mutton (NOT BONELESS JUST SO U KNO). The Ghee Roast was better at Coast to Coast without a doubt as a lot of South Indians love spicy tender meat.']
