address: Level 4, 1 MG Road Mall, Trinity Circle, MG Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Mall Parking, Indoor Seating, Self Service, Vegan Options, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews: ['I love the food here! Always have! Tried the guacamole greens, Arabiatta pasta and Falafel bowl yesterday for lunch. Great food. great quality and always fresh.\nOnly reason for 1 star is the cutlery!!! We kept spilling the salad everytime because of the bad quality fork (made of papery wood). Please get good glass/steel cutlery if you want to run a restaurant thats not only delivery!', 'A great place with great food. The flavours and ingredients are good and fresh. I loved the Mushroom Fettuccini and Chicken Ceaser. The Spaghetti Al Pesto was not to my taste. Overall I had a great time and there are a lot of things to buy from there as well!']

address: NA
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews: ["Of course, after reading the reviews and lacking will to try n take risk, ordered The Cuban Sandwich. When I order sandwich with meat, tenderness of the meat means a lot to me and this sandwich fulfilled my expectations. Other than that, the highlight of this sandwich (according to me) was fermented pickles. Just by the mention of it, my mouth salivated again. Mozzarella was stringy and the whole experience was fun. It truly lives up to its name 'gourmet'. The bread was tasty and fresh, but a bit dry and tough for my taste. Thus, the rating. I don't like it when I have to eat food as a tiger. ‚ò∫Ô∏è Not that it lessened the fun, but I would have liked it more if it was 5/5 food.\n\nWill now try the other ones as well. Attaching elaborate photos to let you know just how big this sandwich was."]

address: 68, 9th Main, Seepthappa Colony, Thippasandra, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Free Parking, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', '', 'Order was delivered very fast, food quality and quantity was ok considering the price point. But cockroach in food is something not acceptable. I have attached the picture for your reference. I called up your restaurant 10 mins ago but they disconnected the call so I have no other option than to place a review.', "Are you an Odia? Do you love fish curry (maccha jhola) then u must order from here...
I was excited to see Odia food somewhere in Bengaluru..
Don't know about other dishes but fish curry was tooooooo good..
I wish they would make other Odia dishes also rather than making other North Indian dishes.", 'qualit and taste is really good... but quantity of dry veg and dal is very very low..it is not sufficient for 3 fulkas and chawal ..you should increase little bit dry veg... otherwise food is really good', 'I have ordered 1 item, marked as non-veg (üî¥ ), but when I see its completely veg. I called the restaurant and asked them.. They told its a bengali dish and its called as mentioned in menu. They are cheating people in name of bengali dishes. Zomato Customer service not much help either.', "This a fairly new joint in the vicinity of Thippasandra main road. Located at the 9th Main opposite to the Motis Kitchen, they looked to be promising in the early days but have lost that over the period of time.

Most of the times, the restaurant is almost empty as most of the orders served are through deliveries. The place itself never offered any confidence to me to sit and dine here as I find the joint to be cluttered and not maintained well.

Coming to the preparations, it's not at all at par with the quality that most people would expect and the portion size too is less even for a single person. On top of that, the rates have been kept high which contradicts to everything they have on offer.

Hopefully they work on these things otherwise the competition in this area will choke a place like this..", 'Ordered gobi manchurian, veg noodles and aalo paratha. In the morning this paratha was good but coming to gobi manchurian n veg noodles.. Utterly disappointed. Gobi has lot of color in it and feared to even taste it which is half cooked n noodles was also half cooked and quantity is very less. Not at All recommended', "previously they used to make good food, now quality is degraded & they give very small portion which is not for the value, WORST OIL, DEGRADED TASTE & a recipe to get people sick. They don't have any values as a food serving place. DON'T ORDER FROM HERE. This place definitely don't have health and safety norms & quality for food.", "I'm order for katla fish fry and I'm not satisfied for katla fry and only for gravy thes diss thes is katla kaliya
Then egg kosha vary bad for egg kosha and full gravy
And very bad food"]

address: 2984, 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['Walked into this place last night randomly because it had an eye catching blue door and looked very warm & welcoming.\xa0

We tried 2 paninis each was about 270-300 rupees each.\xa0

The "Patrick" - Basil Chicken, Caramelized Onions, Egg and Mustard Mayo. I loved the taste of this panini. My only complaint was that the paninis were fried too much and felt very oily. The taste of the filling however was spot on.\xa0

The "Jacques"- Prawn, Garlic Aioli, Fried Onions and Lettuce. This also tasted very fresh and nice (thanks to the lettuce). There were hardly 2-3 prawns in the entire panini - but it had good flavoring.

Along with this, we had the Veloute Soup and Cajun Spiced Fries. Both were average. Also had a watermelon-basil cooler which was average too (my husband said it tasted like watermelon infused tea)

The ambience of the place is beautiful. They have some good desserts like pancakes and biscotti with caramel, which is next on our list to try.', '', '', '', '', 'Tasty panini along with veloute soup. This place is a must try. They serve good food with taste and quality.', '', 'This place is a follow up to the iconic french food truck of bangalore. The french owner and his staff are very courteous and will explain every item on the menu with detail and tenacity. I tried Chloe and Cheese Toast. Both were delectable and fulfilling. The cheese spread amount on toast was too much. It should be reduced :)', 'Menu could have a bit more options', '']

address: 960, 12th Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Wine, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
known_for: wide variety of wine and authentic Italian Cuisine
reviews:
['Great food!
Great service!
Great staff!

Visited this place for 31st Dec dinner and had a great meal along with wine. We had ordered the non veg platter along with a red and white wine. Followed by a dish of pork chops, lamp chops and chicken breast in cream respectively. Each of them were delicious.', 'Quick tip:- kid friendly restaurant. Perfect for a date. Gourmet Italian. The staff recommendation can be considered. Portion size is good. Tiramisu one of the best in the city.

The ravioli was perfectly done in the Roman sauce. Moist pasta with a yummy filling!!
The chicken dish of the day:- chicken was melting. Veggies done perfectly. The sauce could have been given a little more on the side.
Tiramisu presentation was lovely. Taste was one of the best in the city.
The sangria was good with the pineapple pieces for a twist!! 

Will be beach for more for sure!!', 'First experience at this storied restaurant was a mixed bag. Food was just sufficiently good but not the kind to inspire.

It was just Italian enough with a laid back family vibe. Pesto sauce spaghetti - Sauce was delicious but the pasta could have been a little better texturally. It tasted a little raw.

Pizza Verdure - best item of the night!

Garlic butter prawns - I suppose they did the best with the seafood quality available in Bangalore. The prawns themselves were packing in freshness and bite.', "This place was on my wishlist for very long as it's supposed to be the best Italian restaurant in town. . It has a very classy ambience and beautiful decor. The lighting is soft and perfect for a dinner date. However the atmosphere was quite noisy, because of a weekend night.

The food was really delicious,and the slightly higher pricing was justified by the flavours, quantity and beautiful presentation! We ordered the Pork Ribs and Mozarella Basil Ravioli. The latter was from their new menu and upon request, the chef substituted the tomato sauce with Smoked cheese and Mushroom sauce.
For dessert we ordered Vanilla PannaCotta and Hazelnut chocolate mousse. The PannaCotta was slightly bland and could have used more of the raspberry compote.", "No matter where I have pasta , I end up comparing it to Chianti. Their Gnocchi de Patate and Spinach Ravioli are sooooo good. Sometimes you can't stop at one . Have been there en number of times possibly thanks to Gold and also otherwise for their excellent food and service.

This place is a must visit for all Italian food lovers. You surely won't be disappointed. What's even better, they also give you an amazing bread basket with seasoned butter and a Make your own Bruschetta , on the house.

Ambience - 4.5/5
Service - 4/5
Food- 5/5
Overall Experience - 6/5", 'Nice restaurant to eat in. Went with high expectations but still may not be upto the mark but ok. The eggplant dish was a bit soggy but tasted good. The tomato tasted good. The DIY bruschetta was a pleasant experience. Pasta was ok', 'Went to Chianti (pronounced as Ki-anti), named after the famous wine was one of the most sought after Italian restaurant in my list but I wish I could say I liked the food. 

I ordered
- Crostini with Toasted Mushroom & garlic
- Veg. Lasagna Verdure Al Forne
- Mimosa
- Sangria 

Both are authentic Italian cuisines and I did not like the taste nor the quantity was sufficient. The lasagna I tried in several other italian outlets were either too indian or it just didn‚Äôt appeal to my taste buds.

Excitement turned to dust and I‚Äôm not sure if I‚Äôll visit Chianti again for the same reason.', 'Lovely! Its one of those places where you enjoy the ambience and experience and food comes secondary. No doubt the food is delicious but over all dining experience is exceptional.\xa0
Soft music, dim lighting , perfect for laid back evening.

Coming to food , we ordered Gnocci De Pallette, Fusili Primvera, Verdure Pizza and Rustica.
Food was top notch and authentic!

A must visit!', 'Availed my zomato gold option here. ordered spaghetti frute de mare and Pollo del Chianti. Food was great and wine selection is extensive. The other plusses were the night lighting for outside seating was nice, felt like it was a candlelight dinner and the servers were attentive. Do try for great Italian food and wine.', "Their Tiramisu was out of the world. The cream with the cashew cookie went so well. The pizza I loved their texture the Peporoni was cookef so well and they had this pork fat with went so well together. The basa was cooked to perfection. I did not like the little sweet flavouring but the rest was an amazing experience.
I swear I couldn't eat but I was stuffing my self. The staff was very cooperative and mainted a good amount of courteous professionalism.
I loved every experience about this place. :)"]

address: Opposite Snap Fitness, 12th Main Road, 4th Cross, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Live Sports Screening, Valet Parking Available, Live Music, Serves Cocktails, Table booking recommended, Nightlife, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area,
reviews:
["We went to this restro-bar looking at the great Zomato ratings however were a tad bit disappointed. The service is extremely slow and food is okayish. The redeeming factor is the lovely rooftop ambience and their wide range of cocktails.

We ordered a LIIT and from their house specials- Mistletoe, which was a fruity cocktail. Both were great and had enough alcoholic punch. For food, we ordered Chicken Wings, Grilled Chicken pizza and Spaghetti Aglio Olio. The pasta was extremely bland and didn't even have a hint of the typical garlic flavour associated with Aglio Olio. The pizza however, was tasty and well made.", 'A very good restaurant for outing with friends.

Good food with almost all verity of food. It being roof top was another add on.

It was a good experience overall with drinks and food, would visit it again with friends']

address: 618, 2nd Main Road, Binnamangala, Hoysala Nagar, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating, Free Wifi, Wifi, Desserts and Bakes, Live Music, Rooftop, Table booking recommended, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['A Friday evening and an open-mic event were why we visited the place. Ambience - The ground floor has merchandise by various artists - quirky quotes, dreamcatchers, and some cool diaries. Shows are generally hosted on the third floor. Beautiful decor and great use of lights to add a nice touch.\xa0
Drinks - Secret Caramel (195/-) and Skin deep drink (175/-). Coffee lovers should try the secret caramel. The skin-deep is a refreshing drink after having a long week.
Food - Lemon Butter Fish (310/-), Pancake platter (240/-) and Moist maker sandwich (265/-). The fish is great and so is the sandwich. The pancake platter might surprise a few (due to the proportions and taste), so do check with the waite before placing the order.\xa0
Lovely ambience, good service, great food and a host for open-mics - would highly recommend this place.
Meal for two would cost between - 1200-1400/-
Rating -3.5/5', 'Thetealdoorcafe was a perfect place for brunch date with your friend. We visited the place during day and had an amazing experience.

We ordered Peri Peri fries, egg bhurji and idli platter all of which met our expectations and the portion they serve for the price charged is worth it.

In addition to food they have those cute and creative hand crafts and art work which they sell as merchandise which you can purchase.', 'Loved this place as soon as I stepped in. A small and cute cafe with a nice ambience. They have a place to sit outside which over looks the main road and on the 1st floor with lovely lighting‚Äôs. Their menu has a variety from snacks to main course. Loved the Kadak Adrak chai and the bread pakodas. This place has more of college crowd mainly cause of the location and the pricing of the food. The staff was friendly and service pretty quick . Definitely a revisit.', 'Great taste with lovely ambience. The quantity served is sufficient. The staff are really polite.', 'A small cute cafes with a quirky menu.. "swalpa south" "nim-ajji-bhajji" is what is the most interesting thing about this Cafe! This place has outdoor sitting.. perfect for a date as well as a indoor sitting perfect for hangout with friends with some board games! About food.. trying out just few things.. I thoroughly enjoyed my lun h here..! I tried the queserathas which is a quesedila with parantha. The butter battered prawns are amazing as well. ! What I liked the most is "Nam-Amman chicken biryani", served in an earther pot..!', 'Tried breakfast here. Were seated outside, which is nice because its open, however, its just beside a busy road, which is not that good. The food was good though.', "The Teal door cafe is an eatery in Indiranagar that serves continental food.

Ambience:
-Outdoor and inner seating space available.
-Ground floor has some cute show pieces, books and ornaments on display and for sale.
-We avoided outdoor seating due to mosquitoes/drizzling and went to first floor, which was a mistake as it's dull & boring; The gloomy weather made it worse.

Service:
-It takes around 5-10 minutes to get the ordered food/drinks.

Food:
-Nachos: Served with veggie toppings and mayo. Nachos were crispy but I have had better.
-Mango iced tea: Made of mango flavor and topped with mint leaves-overpriced.
-Paneer pav bhaji: 3 big fresh pavs served with paneer bhaji- not bad.

Conclusion:
-Food items are overpriced.
-There are umpteen cafes opening up every other month in Indiranagar and has something better to offer.

Food: 3/5
Service: 4/5
Ambiance: 2/5
QFM: 2.5/5", "Cute cosy place in Indiranagar spread over multiple floors! The first floor is quite perfect for a date and second floor for friends hangout as it has foosball & board games.we ordered an Alfredo pasta which wasn't available so they gave us alredo Maggy which was too cheesy by yummy.the hot choc that we had ordered was sugar free & even after adding your own sugar it wasn't that good & was a waste of money. I may return here just for the ambience (though it has no ac)", "Very nice place to spend time with special someone.
The ambience is very nice and calm and the taste of food is awesome to make your visit wonderful. The day we arrived , it's raining and sitting on rooftop with delicious food is something one must try.
Must try mushroom soup and paneer pav bhaji.", 'Went here for a lunch date and had the best time! The ambience is great and the place is very inviting! Loveddddd the food and impressed with the service! 
We ordered: 

Butter Ke Patashe: Butter Chicken filled in Gol Gappas! Such an iconic dish because who doesn‚Äôt like butter chicken! 

Peri peri Fries: cravings are everything! But perfectly seasoned! 

Strawberry Sunrise: extremely fresh beverage

And a Frappe 

All the food was up to the mark and delicious! Definitely will visit again!']

address: 48, Defence Colony, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Full Bar Available, Nightlife, Serves Cocktails, Table booking recommended, LGBTQIA Friendly, Private Dining Area Available, Wifi, Valet Parking Available, Indoor Seating, Smoking Area,
reviews:
['Finally a brewery to match up to Windmills although I will say that there is a ways to go. The hefeweizen beer was almost as good what windmills serves on their beer menu.

An interesting although slightly limited menu serving a mix of Pizzas, continental and oriental fare. Amongst the dishes that we tried the calamari was excellent as was the lamb kebab. The pizza too was pretty good.

Overall an excellent ambience (the Johnny walker statue was brilliant) and some amazing retro music which only adds to the experience.

Cheers,', 'This is one of the place I absolutely love the ambience,Jimmy and ravina was very courteous and helpful excellent service,Love the overall experience here at Arena.I would definitely recommend and visit again.', 'Mashed potatoes could be better.', "We went to this place with my Cauliges for hang out. It's really great experience with loud music& craft beer,especially Hafewezen beer I love this beer. Nice ambiance we will visit again", 'The place has a fancy ambience, with pyramid shaped structured, stretching to 3 levels. The interiors are also fine up beautifully.
The food is also good too. We had dimsums, veg nachos, barbeque chicken, flat bread pizza , Thai green curry with rice . Except for green curry which I found little watery, though was full of veggies, everything else was lip smacking. They serve great brewed beer- Belgian wit was good. In mocktail , do Berry Burst, berries based drink.
Overall Arena is a good place to go have good good amidst equally good ambience.
                                                bytetrails.com', "Visited this place for Team dinner on Thanksgiving day. Definitely one of the finest interiors and ambience. Ordered penne pasta, mushroom pizza, crunchy chilli chicken, kungpao chicken, warm chocolate ice cream(the best of all..sorry missed to click a pic). They provide well crafted beers wid perfect blend.. don't miss to try German beer. The food was delicious...Must visit place and i definitely like to visit again.", "We choose this place for our Sunday night dinner.

Ambience : This place have a really amazing ambience with a dome shape and tables on different floors .
[5/5]

The music was also playing good with low volume to enable a good conversation .
[4.5/5]

The service was also pretty quick so that your hungry tummy doesn't have to wait for long .
[4/5]

Food : This is one thing on which they have to work on because the pasta order was pathetic and just spoiled my whole food experience.
[3.5/]

The order dishes we ordered was also pretty okish .

Or maybe we just order wrong set of food . But another visit anytime soon is highly unlikely to occur.", "This place was so crowded even on Wednesday night. It has got a fancy ambience. I am not a fan of Asian food but my friends loved their Sushi. It's a three storey building. Their üç∫ was also good. The place is really amazing and gets filled very soon so have a booking prior. Definitely a must try place and worth every Penny. Both the Pizzas, Tartufata and Spicy Chicken and Cilantro which we bought were good. Crispy fried Chicken wings is a must try.", 'Ambience was one of a kind, their Pizza was good as well as the beer.
Keep up the good work.', 'Loved the food and\xa0 ambience with\xa0service... must visit place in Indiranagar.. Had a great time with close friends . Was really good suggestion to celebrate a friends birthday on weekend in this place.']

address: 55, Surveyor street, Basavanagudi, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Standing Tables, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews: ["This yummy crunch fills was once gifted to me d I feel in love with it.as the name says it's crunch yummy healthy and has the right amount of every ingredient to make u eat more d more of it. the chocolate is everyone's favourite d I personally loved the walnut flavour.i gifted these goodie box to some children and they love me for thatüòç", 'Really loved the crunch !! My son really enjoyed the chocolate ones ,very different and tasty would recommend it to everyone .  Personally I loved the walnut ones yum.', 'It is indeed love at first bite. Crunchy Fills . A very novel desert snack. Doubles up as a great gifting idea. They also customise the gift with a personal message. A good substitute to flowers and healthy too. Strongly recommend.', 'This was just a small gift to my mom instead of calling her and saying I love you felt like doing something special. Delisias did a great job sending it on time and these taste out of the world. Would rate 10/10 for the service given by Mr. Varun and his wife.', "Delisias introduces an interesting concept. They have taken the time to perfect a versatile confectionery. It's definitely something a foodie should try. It's a light and crisp outer that envelopes a wholesome flavour bomb. reviews: ["Great option for those days when you don't feel like cooking yet want a home cooked meal!! If anyone is looking for the yummiest mudaliar dishes...This is your pick. The flavours, choice of meat, spice, quantity... All just perfect.", 'Well I really don‚Äôt know what to write as I haven‚Äôt eaten more delicious mudaliar food ever , every single dish is mouth watering , finger licking and tummy kush. You're sitting at home, getting some of Bangalore's best quality seafood and meat delivered home, cooked to perfection nonetheless, thanks to Mudaliar's catering. As the flavours burst in your mouth, Sandeep's food transports you to a traditional Mudaliar kitchen, replete with all the goodness and aroma of pepper, cinnamon, and ground spices. more_info: Delivery Only,

reviews: ["Healthy eating is the buzz these days. What most eateries do is remove sweet out of it which to me is a crime. It is the strongest flavor and the skill lies in balancing it out. So healthy Sapiens is a whiff of fresh air for people with a sweet tooth. Especially if they want calorie less, guilt free food. Ordered a couple of things- Banana walnut chia pudding and Pomegranate parfait. The first thing you notice is the packaging- a glass jar with a premium look- neat. The ingredients are chia seeds, fruits yoghurt, muesli- the usual suspects in a healthy diet. Sapiens are able to balance them out well to give a perfectly sweet flavor- no overpowering honey sweetness alone. The prices are reasonable for the flavor, ingredients and quantity. They don't deliver to all areas of banaglore yet but hope they do that soon. Dunzo is a good way to get their stuff.", "Fresh and tasty breakfast in a jar! Was heading out to work and carried this in my Uber ride. Ordered the Apple cinnamon oatmeal and loved the taste and travel-ready packaging. Would definitely recommend to everyone who's looking for a healthy and on-the-go breakfast option.", 'Was looking for a healthy breakfast option without sugar after workout. Found this new option on Zomato and ordered Parfit . One of the best breakfast I ever had and highly recommended for people who chose healthy lifestyle.', "Healthy n delicious both in one thing !‚ô•\nThe healthylicious breakfast you can have ever , the chocolate pudding had made my dayüôà & I would really recommend you if you're looking for health & taste.", 'Had breakfast delivered in this pretty little jar! The food was good, the quantity sufficient, and the sweetness just right. Was looking for a healthy option and stumbled across this. Loved it!', 'Great option for people who wish to follow a healthy diet without compromising on taste. The oatmeals come is different flavours and you can have them on-the-go as it ia served in jars.', 'Ordered few items of the menu yesterday and found them all to be wonderfully made, and high quality. The Chocolate Chia Pudding and Banana Walnut Parfait were delicious and felt extra good with their healthy ingredients. Would love to continue pampering myself with these sinfree delights.', 'Ordered chia chocolate pudding. Loved the taste of it and being suger free was a blessing. Packaging was also very nice as the jar is reusable.', 'Tried the chocolate pudding. I must say it was amazingly made. I keep on scouting for food which is unique and healthy. Also, loved the cute lil jars which was used to serve.', 'Great flavours, fresh and energizing. Loved the breakfast. Bored from regular breakfast options,I stumbled upon this place on Zomato and decided to give it a shot. Really healthy stuff and would recommend others to try it out.']

reviews:
['Ambiance: 3/5
Cleanliness: 3/5
Service: 4/5
Food: 3/5

A small place located on 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar. Has a very warm and cosy feel to it on entering. Decor is nice and simple with some sketches on one wall coupled with some old pics on the other wall. Staff is nice and friendly. We ordered the Murgh Yakhni soup, Kalmi Kebab, Murgh Amritsari, Malai Kofta and Stuffed Kulcha. The curries and starters were decent, nothing great about it, although I liked the breads.

This restaurant used to be on Zomato Gold and recently logged out of it. The price according to the place and food quality seemed a little on the steeper side. I would suggest this place to anyone looking to try some decent North Indian food around 80 Feet Road area.

Thanks', '', '', 'Moong dal halwa was very oily! and the oil smelling bad.. seems like re-used oil - not sure, but smell bad. Disposed.', "This restaurant sucks! They give yu rotten chicken! You'll literally puke...
Horrible food! Never ever order anything from here.
Y'all treat guys suck! Screw you", 'Horrible experience with the staff of treat especially a guy named amar or so he said his name was . Very rude and arrogant behavior . If the owner has any concern he should take his staff to task and teach them how to behave with customers.', 'Zomato has to remove 1 plus 1 on food for this place. They r becoming so careless. Treat ppl have stopped zomato gold since 10 days n tes zomato ppl have not updated. Wat is the use having zomato gold n not using it. Update all the places which r nit available. Overall food quality is average.', 'The food here is great if someone is looking for north Indian cuisine.....service is quite fast....dal makhni was really great and the paneer was also nice...the ambience was not that good and the place is underground to be careful to find it...... service and food are really good...moreover with Zomato gold its cost effective...... looking forward to visit again', 'This place is one of my favorites in Bangalore.
Pure Bollywood evergreen songs from old times and in a very soothing volume. Can enjoy with family and friends.

Food is awesome!!
Both the menus veg & non-veg are filled with the surprises of the nostalgic taste which is very hard to get easily in Bangalore.

Awesome Food. Friendly staff. Quick service.', 'Nice place, good ambience, food is tasty, reasonable price, good variety of options in Veg food. Must visit once here............theme of Resturant based on old Bollywood style which is also unique']

address: 68, 9th Main, Seepthappa Colony, Thippasandra, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery,
reviews: ["I'm all in when it comes to trying new joints nearby and this happened to be one such instance. I ordered Chicken Korma and Phulkas the other night and was utterly disappointed by the preparation. Keeping phulka aside cause no one is that bad to mess it up at least, the korma was tasteless and had a distinct flavor to it which at all I didn't like. And I don't understand the chemistry restaurants out here have with Kadi leaves cause no matter what you order, it has to be there which is useless and spoils the taste."]

address: 124, Ground Floor, 2nd Cross Road, Amarjyoti Layout, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available,
reviews:
["I'm a North Indian and Matter of Taste is my preferred and go-to place for having some good homely style and flavorful food outside home.
Super friendly staff.

The best part is the food they serve is great! The flavour, spices is just like home, it doesn't get heavy on your tummy or make your stomach feel bloat.

If you ever happen to cross by or around DOMLUR...Give it a try, I am damn sure you will not regret it (to say the least).

If you have a sweet tooth, do try their Besan Ladoo and Gulab jamun...it's just yummm and the perfect dish to sign-off your lunch/dinner.

Not giving a 5* just to ensure they continue serving the beautiful cuisines with same love, passion and dedication!

Cheers to the entire crew of Matter of Taste!

A photo of their Veg Combo Meal offering."]

address: 303, Ashok Terrace, 1st Stage, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
known_for: Authentic Dhaba style North Indian food
reviews:
["Have been to Kund many times in the past, they just renovated the place and had gone for dinner with family.
Kund has some amazing Punjabis food.
The ambience is very decent with benches style of seating.
We had tandoori kebab, Lahori Thali, Reshmi kebab and Mutton Biryani.
The kebabs was delicious, especially the makhani dal that came with the Thali was so good.
However I didn't enjoyed or liked the Biryani at all.
The staff was nice and quick service."]

But they have some great options in chicken & veg dish also.
Coming to the taste all dishes very asome.
The staff r very friendly and welcoming.', "A friend of mine and I were looking for a place we haven't been to in Indiranagar when we decided to visit this unique dining option. 298 for butter chicken and 4 phulkas.
Phulkas were smaller than average and butter chicken was the worst I ever had! It was sweet as a dessert only to be saved by the hotness of some green chillies! 4-5 chicken pieces out of which 2 were okayish and other two were really small.

cuisines: Chinese, Thai, North Indian, Seafood, Beverages, Desserts
address: 2008, 2nd Floor, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Free Parking, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["The concept of the restaurant is simple- You order food with the help of a tab kept on your table and a robot comes with the food you ordered while a waiter serves it for you.
The things that let us down were mainly the ambience. The bright white lights ruin the whole set up and the crowd is usually noisy with kids and people celebrating a special day, it feels like you're inside a market. The washroom was quite dirty. The food was very average for the price they're charging. It's obviously a one time visit for the unique theme here because you wouldnt find another reason to come back again.", "This place is really unique and a first in Bangalore! Till a few years back we could only imagine robots in sci fi movies but this restaurant houses 5 life sized robots as its staff. They are extremely efficient and stops right at your table. There are even bullet trains on conveyor belts to serve your food. The menu are is also in the form of a tablet. So to brief it up ,this is an exemplary technologically advanced eatery in the silicon valley.
Talking about the food, they offer a variety of items starting from Indian, Chinese and Thai.
I tried the Thai prawns and it had the perfect Thai cuisine aroma and taste. Kung Pao chicken was also cooked perfectly . Overall, loved the food.
The price may seem a little on the higher side at first but when you look at the quantity it won't feel too high. The quantity is pretty good! One portion of all items can be easily shared by 4 people.
Food: 5
Service :5
Ambiance:4
Quantity:5", 'The food is average...we had ordered singapore noodles did not find it worth the price. The ambiance is good obviously because of the robots but they just keep moving in a queue with trays on which they carry food and just deliver it near your table.Definitely a good place to take your children once.', "Order placing process in tab is nice, food can be better in terms of taste it's just ohk, but big let down while eating, others waiting guest wait inside the restaurant even in between stop thr robots to click pictures while robot were carrying others food , and no one stop them from the management. Guest should wait out side .", 'It is a new restaurant but the hygiene is not maintained that well. The washroom is really too dirty to be used. Coming to the food. It was good, specially the soup was very good. I think they can still try improving the quality as it has a new concept of robots and will attract lot of customers. Its a nice place to experience it for one time.', 'Use of technology - 5/5
Ambience - 3.5/5
Food - 3/5
Service - 5/5
Seating - 2.5/5
Menu variety - 3/5
P.s - There is no lift to this restaurant. You have to take the stairs.', 'This is one place where they have gone wrong in FOOD.  How terrible that can be. Ordered Chinese. The fried rice and noodles were bad. The basil Chinese chicken starter that I order tasted like chicken lababdar.
Food took forever to come.
There was a glitch in their tab, as when we ordered 7up, it came twice. We had to return it back.
Yes, a robot serving you food sounds fancy. 
The saving grace were the robots who bring food to your table, and there is a coveryor belt in which a  train which brings in your soft drinks and starters.
Food charged is overpriced. 
7up cans are priced at  ‚Çπ30 which is good.
The portions of the starters is good, but it lacked flavours and taste.
3 star for pricing of 7up and the robots. Also, you get to see your bill on the tab, so in that case, you can add or delete anything that you have ordered.', "Pretty cool robot themed restaurant in Indiranagar, where they use robots to serve food to the tables. The ambience is like a laboratory and the place tends to get quite packed so advanced booking is needed.

In terms of food, it was average and very very overpriced.
The chettinad chicken was pretty good for starters.
The wow chicken gravy had a weird taste.
The black mojito was very watery.
The robots do serve you the food pretty fast, but that's about it.", 'The place was packed early , being a Saturday and bustling with children and families..while the concept is mind blowing, the service is slightly laid-back..
We faced a little challenge while differentiating between veg and non veg dishes , the food however was decent
Dragon Chicken : Had a honey chilly sauce with bits of chicken and cashews
Spicy Prawn : pleasantly delicious
Baby corn in HK style : Really a must try
Chilly Garlic Noodles : Lacks taste .. tasted neither of garlic nor of chillies', "There is nothing called as robot in real ,its just a moving device on a fixed track shaped like a robot.
per the food didn't like much anything out of paneer, mushroom starter and veg biryani in terms of fried rice .
On ambience it was clean, a simple standard place and courteous staff which gained two star else 0."]

address: 12/1, Ulsoor Road, Sivanchetti Gardens, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['I have had the sadya here multiple times(except during onam - avoided visting the restaurant amidst the heavy onam rush) and it has been amazing. The sadya is exactly what you would expect and it is a nice experience to take guests too as well to introduce them to kerala food. As nonvegetarian sides we had ordered the mutton pepper fry and it was an absolutely splendid melt-in-the-mouth meat dish. Good service.', 'Kerala being one of the top ten Paradise on earth, One should know about the heavenly food they make.

Talking about hospitality and food this restaurant located in indranagar is the bench mark for Kerala dishes. The ambience is very well maintained and soothes your mind. The staffs are so friendly and well behaved.
Sadya ( feast ) which origins from Kerala is of most importance to all Malayalis consisting of a variety of traditional dishes served on a banana leaf.

We tried the veg sadya and it was mind blowing and one can have it very easily. The sadya was cooked in traditional manner and one can smell the aromas of coconut oil and makes you feel you are in Kerala.

Well balanced food with no loaded masala and spices. Options of opting kerala boiled rice and normal white rice is also available.

Desserts were top the charts and had those 2 times.

One should try the sadya when ever they visit this food paradise.', "Every year we wait for Onam sadya at Ente Keralam. It's been 5 yrs we always celebrate Onan at Ente Keralam. This yr also we were at Ente Keralam and it was not up to mark or just as every year. Disappointed with it and especially the payasams were horrible. It was water, no taste. Pathetic!! Though we had early lunch around 1.00pm, it was water. Never expected and was not satisfied this yr. Also the crowd was also not heavy this year. 

Hope they will get back next year.", "Amazing Sadhya Luncheon. It was served within minutes and tasted awesome. The yellow curry served by the side being the best. It's located bin heart of MG road Ulsoor area and just a walk from Taj where i am staying. I think i will return for more in days to come.", 'I am rating it a 4 because of the unreasonably pricy menu. Barring that, a fantastic place to experience Kerala food. The food is as traditional as it gets and covers a wide variety in both veg and non veg. We took 2 sadhya meals and 1 neymeen polichathu. Great presentation of food. The kaachiya moru and payar curry in meals were delicious. Nice desserts as well.', "An amazing option for dinner! The unlimited thali is such a great option. I enjoyed everything on the thali. I'm definitely going here again for another (hopefully) great experience. Another thing - the servers here are extremely sweet and helpful, which was very refreshing to see."]

address: 2607, 18th Main, 3rd Cross, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery,
reviews:
["They don't toast the bread in the breakfast. Ordered Additional breads and a jam sachet and they didn't send it out. I don't know who cooks and who manages there but this is not good at all. The coffee was sent in a plastic white container and it got cold till it arrived. The baked beans tasted really bad. I would suggest to avoid this place and rather go to Ants Cafe or Cafe Terra.

The breakfast was 80% fries without salt. Coffee was water. Change your employees and cook. I wonder who gives more than 1* to this place.", "Extremely measly portions of food. I ordered a double delight pork burger that cost 290. The patty was hardly visible among all the raw onions. Upon calling them and speaking to them about my problem I was told that the burger is just given the 'double delight' name and has nothing to do with portion size.

Extremely disappointed with this experience and will truly recommend my friends to never order or eat from this place again.", 'Ordered via Zomato:
- pancakes
- OMG BURGER
- double DELIGHT burger

To say we were disappointed is an understatement. The double delight burger was a size similar to kfc zinger, With raw onions and a patty that was hardly visible.
Pancakes were so bad we could not finish and had to throw.
The only item "good" was OMG BURGER which can pass as being edible

On calling the cafe we were told the chef was new and they will get back. After an hour we called back and were told that "double delight" was just a name. And through she had not seen it but was sure that was the way it was supposed to be and will"try to do better next time".

Be careful in ordering.', "This is a 'Veggie Burger' as their menu states - deep fried patty seasoned with homemade spices, assorted lettuce , salad mayo , handpicked vegetable and cheese. Okay ..did a home delivery..
What i got - 2pieces of bun , 3 slices of tomato and one potato patty ! Pathetic! I do not suggest this place.", 'Great quantity. Good taste.', 'I ordered scrambled egg but the order I received was like egg bhurji .. scrambled eggs should not have onions in it ..', 'Worst service ever. For just a simple order they took freaking 1 hour to deliver. We tried to reach the delivery guy but he too was busy. And the food was ready in the restaurant. Zomato, your service is degrading day by day. Just few credit money in not enough to compensate for the blunder. I want full refund. Make sure you do it fast!!', 'the food was clearly a day old.', 'Worst restaurant to order a burger. I ordered an egg and cheese sandwich through swiggy and I got a potato patty in between two pieces or bun. No trace of egg or cheese in the burger. Disgusting!!?', 'For the money spent quantity is pretty good. Love the chicken cheese sandwich and the English breakfast. The chicken sausages are just too yummy, however their best sellers are the sandwiches!']

address: 23, Survey 10 & 12, 3rd Floor, Domalur Service Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Delivery Only,
reviews: ['A new delivery kitchen. Tried the food couple of times....the food was tasty, fresh.... The packaging is premium.... Rolls are a must try.. fusion rolls...with lemon rice...which I never expected in a roll...their meal box are something which tastes very good and have a nice grill combination...', "This is a new joint in Indiranagar and I'm always curious to go for biryani first. Yesterday was one such day and ordered chicken biryani from this place. The delivery was fast and the packaging looked premium. In terms of quantity, it was sufficient and had freshness to it however, the taste wasn't that authentic. I felt the pepper a bit more than what I'm used to in biryani preparation. Although the pieces were tender and cooked well, the overall biryani experience wasn't there. Also tried the chicken do pyaza the other day and although the quantity was there, I didn't find that much of a taste in it. Too oily and bland to me it was.\n\nI'm sure they have some good surprises in store which for sure, I'm going go explore in time. For now, I wouldn't rate this for a fine plate of biryani."]

address: 1st Floor, Salarpuria Landmark, HAL 2nd Stage, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
["This place is one of the best vegetarians options in the city. Based on Rajasthani theme, the place has its own charm. Restaurant offers only Rajasthani Thali unlike it's online delivery order. We were served almost more than 25-30 dishes including starters, main course, desserts and chutneys and buttermilk. Lassi was charged extra. The taste was really authentic I quite liked the spread.
Ambience-4/5
Food-4/5", 'After hearing alot about Rajdhani aam festival ,finally landed here on Tuesday evening. Daal baathi was awesome in taste. There aam pna was lip smacking.

Ambiance was okay because of Tuesday rush. Staff was sociable. Worth trying their thali. Highly recommend Rajdhani.']

address: 110, Ground Floor, 18th Main, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available,
reviews: ['Finally found my go to place for authentic fresh lassi. Have ordered quite few times from The Lassi Pub for lassi cravings. They never disappoint you. The taste is always consistent. They serve authentic punjabi lassi which is the best part. Water is not added to lassi and it is thick with right amount of sweetness. Just the way I want. Served with fresh cream and white chocolate chips. Definitely recommend you to try lassi here. You would love it.']

address: 176, Amarjyoti Layout, Intermediate Ring Road, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['It is a small place with hardly 3 tables. They are overpriced for what they serve. French toast was bad but the sandwich was good but not worth the price. The place is either under renovation or is being shut down. There was also no proper place to wash your hands, not even a tap. A street side vendor has better arrangements.', 'You should try aloo tikki chole and cold coffee at this place as they are amazing and gives the taste of north...visited this place due to recommendation from my friends.... Very good experience', 'Very nice place for North indian food.. their paranthas , kulcha and meals are just unexpectedly tasty with very authentic north taste. Good experience for me and my family and very resonable for the taste.. highly recommended!', "Amazingly tasty north Indian food. Can't find anything better in this area. The parathas are just like the ones in north Indian places. Calm and peaceful place where you can have nice food. Keep up the good work. :)", 'Authentic north Indian food... stuffed paranthas, amritsari kulcha and rajma chawal were really good with pure North Indian taste. Really enjoyed the food!', "A completely pathetic place with extremely slow service, bad food and arrogant and rude management. The owner of this place is a person who won't listen to any of his customers' requests or complaints and would try to strong arm them into paying quickly and leaving the place quicker. The kitchen and the seating area is so badly maintained, one might feel like throwing up. Highly not recommended. Stay as far away from this place as possible.", "This place will take you by surprise. It's a cosy little place off Koramangala inner ring road near EGL and serves great food. Loved the aloo paratha, garlic bread and veg fried rice. And all of that, plus a drink, costed 200 bucks. There's a pretty looking gift shop adjacent to and run by the cafe.", 'We normally come to hotspot for chocolate milk shake and rolls which are good.. but they recently introduced delhi chats and cholla bhatura.. which we tried and were presently surprised as they were amazing just like what we get in delhi and the best thing is they always make fresh through out the day... awesome experience!  Will definitely be a regular as we are big chat fans.. we tried suji gol gappa, samosa chana chat, papdi chat and cholla bhatura..', 'Pathetic service. They seems not at all interested in serving. Not even smiling to the customers. U have to self serve the food. When the food was ready they just called me and the behaviour was "Come and take if u want" attitude.

Had tried Veg Noodles. The taste was just below average, something weird taste and smell (I guess some sauce was put non-proportionally)

wont recommend going again']

address: Q Court, 3rd Floor, Garuda Mall, Ashok Nagar, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Mall Parking, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Taste of food and service is good. Food court also maintained well. Need improvement in Starters with wide various products. Keep it up guys.', "Not much to say since I only had the chholle bhature here, but they were the best chholle bhature I've had in Bangalore so far. I think that warrants a 5 star review.", 'To say that Chole Bhature are a must try here would be an understatement. There are an eye-catcher by themselves by the virtue of their size. Value for money. The dim lighting augments the taste of the food.', 'Hospitality needs an improvement by multiple times.

Should prioritise customer needs and then act.

Food is not upto standards of what they serve on plate and what they charge', 'Worst north indian food i have ever tasted.
There was no taste in the food.
Also they were out of a side dish for the thali and told us at the very end that we dont have so plesse take it without that.
Cost was also too high for what they gave.
DONT TRY', 'We were looking for something different and we were craving for sizzlers
They had a wide variety in their menu and we thought of taking a chance and went for having chicken sizzlers.
Well the outlet didn‚Äôt disappoint us. We loved it
Theere were 5 flavours and each one of them was lip smacking good.
Along with this they served us with a butter naan and dal makhni which was unexpected 
But we liked the taste of them as well
I will recommend this outlet if u r looking for some taste change as i found it a mixture of southern n northern taste.']

address: 16, Wood Street, Ashok Nagar, Richmond Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Wheelchair Accessible, Full Bar Available, Valet Parking Available, Outdoor Seating, Brunch, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended, Smoking Area, Buffet,
reviews:
['One of the places in Bangalore where you could take your date for a perfect dinner with a romantic Ambience. Food is really good but super pricey. Also, the milk cake dessert which i had ordered was not at all good. However, apart from the dessert everything else was fantastic ü§ò', 'I‚Äôm went here for the second time after maybe ten years. Like all legendary restaurants, this place continues to stand the test of time. Still relevant. But maybe my last visit was more memorable. Like most famous chefs keep liking to change their menu, I‚Äôm guessing even this one has. Somehow some of the epic ones have gone missing. Like the apple pumpkin soup if I remember right. But yes the range continues to thrill you. And it is unique. Ideal for a romantic evening. Or just a family out. The only crib I have is that maybe am they should avoid cover versions in the music. And some really badly sung ones.', 'The service is very good, they are there no matter what! Food is yummmm and kudos to the ambience and maintenance team. They are courteous and suggestive

Cons: Service as mentioned is good, but too much of their presence is not good too', 'This place is perfect for a romantic candlelight dinner. Great food, delicious taste, great mocktails and the candlelight set up will definitely lighten up your mood. Only thing is its little bit expensive. Also it may be because a lot of foreigners visit this place. Otherwise its just a perfect place for a romantic getaway. I had a great time here.', "Went here last week and was a bit disappointed compared to my visit last year. Chicken Liver Patte was a let down. The main course is what made us feel better. Giving it a 4/5 based on previous experience. Hope I don't get disappointed next time.", 'Olive beach, This place is as beautiful as the name is. Your go to destination for a romantic date. Food is yummy ambience is way beyond Beautiful. Take your partner if you are looking for a candle light dinner kinda destination in and around bangalore. I loved the pizza here, definitely going back for more.', "I've been to Olive several times, both for special events in the outdoor space and for dinner. It has always been nice. When you step in, the whitewashed walls and quirky decor feel like a Mediterranean home. The food and drinks are to match. Pizza is super yummy as are the prawns with harisa. Service is attentive but could be a bit more friendly.", 'This is usually a place to celebrate for both of us, we go to celebrate birthdays, get together or evening specials. Food, ambience and drinks always bring the mood to the next level and does the job for the day.

A star less for the behaviour from the staff. This time service and behaviour of the staff was not acceptable.

Overall a good place for evening hangout‚Äôs.', 'The moment you enter the restaurant, you are transported to the bylanes of Greece with blue and white decor theme. They have both Indoor and outdoor seating arrangement and you are spoilt for choices.
Coming to food, they offer mix of Italian and Mediterranean cuisine. We ordered Pasta, their woodfired pizza , hazelnut crunch cake and coffee. The food is great and you feel the distinction in the taste and flavours.

The service is impeccable. All in all, it is a must visit place.']

most_liked_Food: [4, 'Mascarpone Cheese', 'Apple Pie', 'Paan Ice Cream', 'Nolen Gur', 'Nolen Gurer Ice Cream', 'Kesar Rabdi', 'Gur Ice Cream']
reviews: ['', '', 'A tiny ice cream parlour serving some amazingly yummy and unique flavours. We tried lemongrass, kesar rabdi and south Indian coffee and they resembled in every bit way to the parent source in terms of taste.Loved them all!.Price wise felt bit on higher side for one scoop though.', "If you want a taste of every bit of India , you should go here.. innovative flavours of paan, rose , nalen gur ice creams will take you down memory lane and back to places from your childhood memories.. it's a small quaint shop, but underrated if you ask me.. people should go here more often .. if you like experimental flavours and trying something new, this place could trump all others..", "It was a pleasant surprise when I found pabrai's stall at Manpho convention center during durga puja. I tried their nalen gurer ice cream. Those who know about this Bengali jaggery, know how wonderful it tastes. And they have captured its flavour wonderfully. It has bits and pieces of nalen gurer sondesh and tastes heavenly with a bit of jaggery spread on top of it. A must try.", 'I had been wanting to visit this place for over a year now and finally did today! Had the most amazing icecreams. The Nalen gur was nice and so was the seeta phal. But my favorite here is the Paan, you will love it if you enjoy sweet paan. The place burns a hole in your pocket so will only go there occasionally.', "Quaint little place tucked away in d by lanes with some mind blowing ice creams..! Most of d ice creams v tasted was good n d ones v actually ate was pure bliss..! The house speciality Nalen Gur was so yummy it impressed d most difficult person to impress, my hubby..! Tender Coconut was yummy n so was d Paan.. such explosion of flavour. The sugar free kesar malai was so good.. But it is slightly on d higher side, yes agreed it's natural but so does so many other places with much less prices.. overall worth a visit.", "I have tried your Palm Jaggery ice cream ..it's mouth watery and tried multiple times....I wish to try different varieties of yours as parcel...I m staying in HRBR Layout...can u deliver here...", 'THIS IS THE FIRST PLACE I HAVE TASTED NATURAL ICE CREAM UNTIL NATURALS. THIS PLACE IS OUT OF THE WORLD ICE CREAMS SO YUMMY AND MUST TRY WOULD BE THE NALEN GUR ICE CREAM U WILL BE IN LOVE AT FIRST BITE N LICKüòÜüòÜüòáüòáüç®üç¶üç¶üç¶', 'The person at counter was quite knowledgeable and was answering all questions nicely. I loved the nalen Gur flavour the best. Other chocolate flavoura were also quite nice.']

reviews: ["Have you ever got your order mixed up and served Beef Burger when you ordered Chicken Burger. The same happened yesterday. ['Ordered Kaju Katli and kachori and samosas from this place - all of them tasted good. Samosa and kachoris are priced a little on the higher side though.', 'Reviewing their restaurant named uthara. Have been 4 times to this restaurant, and not disappointed even once. They have very good variety of options and is completely veg. Also I like their presentation. A good place to visit with friends and family and also with kids. The prices is slightly towards the higher side but the taste and quality makes it completely worth it. Must try is their pani puri shots.', 'We regularly order stuff from them through Swiggy. Have a suggestion though. Please add your Thalis and Kulfis to your Swiggy/Zomato delivery menu. Will literally order everyday!

Keep up the same quality and consistency!', "Had been there 3 times. Ambience is good with good service too. Sweets are lil extra sweet. Chats and other street food is nice to have. One can definitely visit at least once to try out from so many options. I've tried papdi chat, suji Pani Puri, paw bhaji and gujiya(ok)", 'The interiors are too good. Service average and food is bad. Everything super tasty and fresh...
Absolutely In love with their sweets, so tempting they are!', 'An eye catching sweet shop in the busy location of Indiranagar.
Tried dahi puri, masala puri ,rabdi and jalebi.
Prices are decent for the location and decor.
Taste was average, nothing different from the other chat places .', 'Very old and trust worthy sweet shop chain in Bangalore. Started in Malleshwaram now more than 20 locations all over the place. They maintain same quality every day on all the products.']

['Awesome place for homely food, must try makke di roti and sarso saag( season special), kali mirch chicken. friendly staff...a must visit place for all foodies!!', 'If you want to have a home cooked food with some good bollywood music ,it is a must visit . The ambience is not that great even though it's a roof top restaurant. But the hospitality by the staff and the manager is worth mentioning.", 'Sometimes the name says it all Swad E Punjab! This place is indeed one of my most favorite when all i can think of is punjabi food!

Swad E Punjab is a new version of their main outlet. Their food menu is indeed tempting. Good thing is they offer a variety of veg and non veg food which makes ur tummy full! Do try one of these!

What i ordered:

1. Dal makhani - they have the best dal makhani in the world!!

2. Kadhai paneer - very well prepared ! Delicious

3. Raita - mix veg. I just hope the quantity would be a bit more

4. Naan- great! Soft crisp what more i can ask!

5. Lassi - this was indeed amazing in this scorching heat this was exactly what i needed.

This place never disappoint for anybody! I Loved every bite!', "Amazing food. Breakfast was delicious.‚Äù ‚ÄúExcellent staff, great location.‚Äù ‚ÄúSuper mind blowing worthful.
Incase if you're looking for a Pool side Romantic Date, this is a place, you should always look forward to"]

more_info: Home Delivery, Outdoor Seating, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['I love the fact that secret alley ever started. I have been there since they opened the restaurant and the service has never changed, they are still humble and hospitable as before. Cheers to the 2 stars of secret alley Prathyusha and Aadarsh‚ù§', 'It has good reviews so not sure it was their bad day! I ordered chicken noodle and turned out to be a disaster. Although the quantity was large, noodles were excessively oily, the oil had some peculiar smell and very less chicken.', "Ordered fried rice bowl, Manchurian and lemonade between two of us. Good food , priced well and friendly service.. definitely recommended..wanted to try the chocolate shawarma but didn't have room for it. Next time", "This is tiny Cafe in the streets of indiranagar
The siting arrangements is decent enough not a fancy outlet but a very peaceful one specially in the evenings with a cool breeze
Ordered a white sauce pasta must say for the price it's actually very good
The taste is good
The quality served also was very much
This place has a good tea also
Overall would recommend everyone to visit this place once in the evening Time you will definitely would love it", "Really nice outlet with lovely yummy milkshakes! Even pasta was amazing! Must visit if in Indira Nagar. It's small but seating arrangement is provided.", "I ordered Non Veg Combo via Swiggy from their Combos section.\xa0
Wonderful is so less to speak of it.\xa0
You can choose between 3 types of noodles or 3 types of fried rice and 2 types of chicken gravy dish. Also, you get a glass of fresh lime juice along with all of this.\xa0
Enough for a heavy eater. And, the taste of each and everything was so brilliant.\xa0
Would have liked more if the lime juice was served more chilled. But can't complain because it was a delivery.\xa0
All in all, it is the best place to eat Non Veg Chinese combo in this area.", 'Nice place to hangout with friends.!! Food taste is good!!! Well recommended Cafe in Indiranagar with an affordable price.!! Had been there 4-5 times. Staff behaviour is very good.. they were really humble and polite.!', 'Been getting food delivered from here for 4 days in a row now, because the Quality and Quantity is too good! Big fan of their range of Chinese dishes, especially for the taste, it beats most other competitors hands down.
Tasty, hearty and satisfying meals at Cafe Secret Alley.', "Awesome place to hang out . Good range of shawarma's . Nutella banana shawarma was awesome. Place is very pleasant and calm. Suerly should try their ranges of shawarma's.", 'Cute cafe around indiranagae where you could enjoy the food making cool friwnds along with..
Staffs are too good..
Chocolate shawarma is a must try item..']

address: Shop 4F-6C, Gopalan Signature Mall, Old Madras Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Mall Parking, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Vada pav and tea are awesome..love this place..very tasty food..the owner is also very polite and friendly. Enjoyed a lot.best place to enjoy food', 'Nice food items and vada pav was amazing. Really nice place to grab something to eat..

We have tried samasa chat and vada pav and it was good .', "Super mindful lady at the counter 
My child was very hungry today after game zone and in tears because the American corn was not available at one of the other counters. Agreed to have a sandwich instead which has corn in it. So I headed to the grab a grub stall and asked if they had anything with corn. The helpful woman informed me that they indeed had a sandwich and ordered it for me.

Not only she helped me calm my child but also added extra instruction to the cook 'no chilly', which i had forgotten in my super mindless state coz of the crying episode. Cant thank her enough. Yummy sandwich and Absolutely tasty sabudana khichdi too.

Thanks a ton for saving my day!
More power to you", 'This place is my all time favourite. What wonderful food is served here !!!! 
The cheese masala grilled sandwich, pav bhaji and Mac and cheese are prepared with fresh ingredients and have a brilliant taste.
The French fries are the favourite snack for both my nephews, who choose these fries over the Mcd ones!!! 
And the cherry on top is the masala chai which is a must try if you the visit the place.
The owners of this place are so friendly. They never miss out on greeting us. 
Such a happy place that makes my tummy so happy üòÄ', "If you are on fast, then this place is for you.
There are very less places where you cam get dish like Sabudana khichdi.
Khichdi was good, tasty... little bit of more oilyüòÖ.
They don't serve it with anything like Curd. You have to bring it.üòÖüòÖ", 'I had Mac and Cheese pasta which was really yummy. I had gone to the place second time just to have that again. Though it takes 15 mins\xa0 to get ready, it really worth.', 'I love Sabudana Khichdi, but Bengaluru has given me atrocious ones till now. I mean it when I say it - this is my first ever decent and tasty Sabudana Khichdi after coming to Bangalore.

Sometime even small, unnoticeable eateries can surprize you. I was sick and tired of home deliveries and wanted to eat steaming hot food for once. I ordered regular Pav Bhaji and Sabudana Khichdi. They told Sabudana Khichdi will take a while, I was ok with that. It was Friday night. I had time of the entire world.

They served Pav Bhaji first. Though this was no routine Tomato Puree based red Pav Bhaji, it was weirdly tasty. They use small buns and are very frugal while giving cut onions, but the overall experience was good. About Khichdi - Tapioca Pearls were well soaked, there was enough potato, a dash of coriander, it was mildly spicy, in short - it was very yummy!

Felt great after my meal. :) Will visit again for sure.

P.S- Sabu Khichdi was missing peanuts though. Maybe they can look into that.', "it's amazing & so tasty. I'd rather come here than mc Donald's. very hygienic. love this place a lot. authentic food only. just the best. love it so much.", 'Nice little place
We have tried Vada Pav, Bread Pakoda, Dabeli, Misal Pav, Paneer Toast, Poha, Sabudaba Kichadi and more
All were tasty and yummy üòãüòä', 'New place opening in Gopalan Mall\xa0
They have good variety in there menu\xa0
We ordered Vada Pav and Dabeli but was disappointed with the size of the item I have taken a pic item with my friends \xa0Finger it is super mini size , Normal Vada will look like a monster in front of what they server here\xa0

Taste was ok but can improve\xa0

Dont want to rate them low as they are a new place and want to give some encouragement but will visit again too see if they had improved , to re visit on my rating']

reviews: ["I tried the chicken quinoa and the classic hydro fresh salad. Both of these were filled with fresh vegetables and made for a healthy yet filling meal.\nI really liked the quinoa salad, and it comes with a side of bread too. Even the bread is brown and usually not toasted or topped with something low calorie. It's definitely something to try if you're looking to eat healthy but don't want to compromise on taste!"]

address: 57, B2, Ground Floor, 3rd Cross, SLV Vijaya Arcade, Old Airport Road, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["The vadas are tiny, the chutney is tasteless, and the sambar bad too.

They'd forgotten to send the vadas, and the owner was very apologetic and courteous, and sent me the missing vadas and one extra, so I appreciate his attitude, which is why this is not a one-star review, but the food needs improvement.", 'Useless food. They are running the hotel to loot customer money.

Thay should improve customer service.

Very poor sidesh. Very poor in hygienic', 'I had ordered masala dosa and vada. The masala dosa and vada were average and not upto the price in same price you can visit other restaurants like Udupi park and get better taste', 'Kisna cafe always reminds me my mom, Sunday specials, the dishes are so authentic that it feels like home! (For South Indians only), waiting for andhra cuisine.', 'I have ordered quite frequently from this place from UberEats. Almost all the times it was a very good experience. I ordered thatte idly, uddina vada, plain utthappa and set dosa. The taste of all the items was really good. Thatte idly was big, soft & fluffy. The dosa and vada also tasted really nice. They provided red chutney, white chutney, sambhar and saagu which were also good. The cost of all the items are affordable. A good place to savour South Indian cuisine near CV Raman Nagara & Old Airport Road.', "üîπHome delivery ‚åö

üî∏I ordered, idli vada, plain dosa and coffee. The idli was okay in taste; soda added was more than required to fluff the idli. Vada was good, crispy but it's small in size. The dosa was above average in taste and soft. Coffee was rightfully balanced.

üîπ Restaurant was able to deliver within 45mins.", 'This is one place I would love to have my breakfast daily when in Bangaluru. It is walking distance from my Sons place in Bengaluru. They have recently registered in Zomato. However I have visited this place number of times for breakfast and dinner too. Delicious food in Budget. It is an open restaurant from 3 sides. Spic and span cooking area, chamacham utensils. Eat your food standing or get it parceled. The aroma of freshly made. idlis, dosas Uttapam is just mesmerizing. I am a Delhi wala where it is masala dosas with varieties of stuffings, Idlis either rice idlis or Rawa idlis. But here I came accross many more, set idlis set dosas which were extremely delicious. Their Poha, lemon rice\xa0 is equally good. Awesome sambhar & chutney. Highly recommended. Looking forward to my next visit in bengaluru.
                                                cookwithreena.wordpress.com']

address: NA

reviews: ['Ridiculous job! look at the pics! my husband ordered a cake for my bday..both were super disappointed, they should have atleast told us if they were not able to make it well! Never go even if this is the last resort on earth! The finishing is horrible! Wat a waste of money!', 'I had placed an order online through this website, with the delivery to be done today (15th July, 2018). The order was successfully placed and the payment done. However, after trying different numbers obtained from this website and google finally i was able to reach get in touch with someone.\xa0\nAfter constant following up for 2 hours i get a response from an unapologetic idiot that bakery is closed and cake will be delivered tomorrow. When I asked for why order was taken he says talk to madam. A take it or leave it attitude. Pathetic to the core.', "Very unreliable, have had to wait quite some time for the delivery on occasions. They don't stick to the promised delivery time either. Cakes are decent but avoid this place if you have time constraints.", 'My family and I were celebrating my grandparents 50th wedding anniversary at Bangalore club and the cake was arranged by the event planners at the club. It was a two tier mango and strawberry flavored cake that tasted just as good as it looked. I had never heard of this bakery before until we tried it and will surely recommend it for anyone who wants customized cakes for special occasions.', 'A customized order for a Minion theme cake for my four year old was handled really well by the team at Delices. The flavor and the look of the cake was just what we had thought of. My son was overjoyed that his favorite characters were a part of his birthday celebration as well. Thank you, Delices! Will surely recommend to family and friends.', 'Ordered, fresh strawberry, vanilla and chocolate cakes from Deices. i thought i ordered a lot of cake for the number of guests i have. Little did I know that the cake will get over in a jiffy! Delicis made really awesome cakes! Thank you guys!']

reviews:
['Was wanting to visit this place always when ever I pass by on 80ft road. Finally happened to go last week for dinner. The place is very minimalist in in ambiance. Service was prompt and polite. We ordered seer fish fry as a starter which was actually bland in taste and not up to the mark. We ordered chicken biriyani for main course which was dominated by spices but was tasting good. Biriyani combo comes with chicken kababs ,sweet and interestingly rasam as an accompaniment.Tried rasam in biriyani for the first time and it was good.
Overall a decent experience but they can fare better', "See not even one star is worth for this food which you have provided me, think like this if customer are not coming what you people Will do..
Even im having my own restaurant.... Don't provide old food to customers for their money", "Don't waste time reading reviews , this is lip smacking spicy Chettinad food and amazing value for money .

Decent sitting area
Superb value for money ( 200 per head )
Food : we had a biryani meal and a kottu paratha which was new to me and loved it !", "I had Dindigul chicken biryani, the rice used is of very poor quality....it was waste of money.....
I'm seeing lots of negative reviews but look like they are not at all bothered..

Good bye to Andal Mess.", 'I ordered the Dindugul Chicken Biryani and the Chicken Kothu Parota. The chicken biryani had really weird pieces and it tasted nothing like a biryani. I also found bones in the Kothu Parota. Never ordering again.', 'Biriyani is good but gets completed so early. Tried the non-veg meals, all the gravies are bad. Ayula fish is very bad. Chicken and mutton chettinad are very good. Parking is also a problem. Service is not good. When a dish is suggested as not good and asked for replacement they do the same mistake and bring an another one. Not the one to be recommended', 'taste was not that good', "The cleanliness and hygiene of the place is very poor. There was so much dust gathered there as if they didn't clean the area in months. Also being greeted by a couple cockroaches at your tables is no fun. The food in general was sub par. The biryani was okay and their chicken chukka was alright but their pepper chicken was literally just a boiled chicken with nothing but pepper. Not even salt. I'm giving 2 stars since some items were edible atleast. I'd honestly give it zero stars for the simple lack of hygiene.", "I didn't get my order", 'Biryani Rice, Chicken Chukka, Fried Fish is a staple here...ask for extra gravy with the Biryani...the kothu parotha is nice too ...
Pocket friendly and Delish!!

I wish they cleaned their wash basin like at least once a year...they never have :-(']

more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['This authentic Chittinad Briyani will boast your taste budsüçó served with raita and flavorful pickel is a great combo.
The briyani is full of Indian whole spices with smoked chicken pieces it in.
You should definitel try thisüëç', "Most Authentic Tamil Style Biriyaniüëåüèª
This is my recent favourite place. I keep ordering the Biriyani combos. Can‚Äôt really control repeating orders from here.
This is heavenly food for me. I was longing to get a place to eat Tamil style biriyani. After Thalappakatti, this would be my affordable choice. ü§ë
The authentic proportion of masala and meats they added are making it incomparable with any other restaurant's Chettinadu biriyani.\xa0
Ordered Chilli Chicken and Chicken Fry biriyanis, both are delicious as hell. üòΩ

I recommend this place for any group of Tamils who don‚Äôt want to wait in Thalappakatti and get disappointed. Go for biriyani without a second thought.ü§§
But other items, I am unaware of. ü§ê", 'Finally, a restaurant which serves authentic chettinad cuisine. I might have jumped the gun in giving 5 stars without tasting their non veg dishes but if the veg is so good I have no doubt their non veg dishes would be finger licking gooddd....

Just back from lunch at this place. I had their  meals and my wife had chapati , idiyapam with Mushroom varuval... the varuval was toooo good...the flavor was bang on...cannot wait to try their chicken dishes...idiyapam was soft and went perfectly well üëå with varuval 

Their meals had everything one could ask for... started with generous serving of ghee n paruppu(dal), followed by sambhar...
Vatha kozhambu was authentic n spicy as well...sambhar n rasam was decent however the brinjal Poriyal had the chettinad punch...payasam was ok...ended the meals with curd...']

address: Location Varies, 17, 5th Main Road, NAL Colony, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Seating Not Available,
reviews:
['Had ordered the meaty fries on my friends recommendation. Loved it to bits, simple flavours but very tasty.
Have order the wings and burger in the past as well and those were quiet flavourful as well.', 'One of my favourite place for burgers. If you are trying for the first time, go for All american cheese burger. Well cooked patties and fresh buns are their USP.', "Well, the fries was soggy. I don't know whether they have fried it and kept for long. Ice cream was melted too. Disappointed SWAT, not expected.", 'I have ordered here at least thrice. first time ordered i ordered\xa0 the wings and the burger. the burger was good but not too filling, the wings were well done too. the second time ordered two wings and the fried oreos , this time found the wings to be undercooked and had blood stains inside and some of the meat still half boiled . i would have written a review then but thought mistakes do happen at least the food is good.\xa0 third time ordered this week its the same case, so if you need more business, do increase your quantity and quality .\xa0 the bacon you your fries also hardly has any bacon even\xa0 when you charge us etc. rating you 3 hoping for you to realise your mistake.', "Good food. I generally order cheese and bacon fries. It's good but the portion of bacon should have been more.
A negative is they miss to add extra bacon even if you add-on extra bacon for Rs 50.", 'Must try becon cheese fries. A good place for late night hunger. Burgers are also nice. My favourite place to have becon cheese fries. A must have starter with Beer :)', 'good fast food options for burgers and pasta', "Would have given them 0 stars if possible.

I ordered some food late at night. They accepted my order and I waited for over an hour to get my food. The valet who was assigned even came to the place but they didn't bother sending me my food. I understand they it was late, however if that's the case then why did they accept my order and why didn't they have the courtesy to let me know beforehand?

Absolute waste of time. The sad part is that I was really looking forward to their food.", 'The wings are super great but the hotdog is not. If you order one hotdog, the filling is scattered everywhere within the box.... In fact the hotdog just contains a barbecue chicken with the cheese and pickels and all the fillings everywhere else. The presentation was also super bad. Also the size of hotdogs is very small. Not worth the price mentioned. 
Definitely a bad experience.', 'I had ordered the becon cheese hotdog. The food was really good. The becon was nicely cooked, caramelised onions were yummy and the sausage was tender. The delivery guy was polite and delivered it faster than expected. The only thing I didn‚Äôt like was the presentation. The food was totally displaced and looked really bad. Had I not tasted it, I would have rated it 2 bcoz it looked horrible. I understand that due to bike ride the food must have been displaced, but if possible try to make it look appealing at the time of delivery. Bcoz I do not like food served like in jail. Rest all was good and I would definitely order next time as well.']
