They serves hot and spicy.', 'Ordered chicken kabab biryani combo it was good coke was not cold it was warm but still need to improve best off luck serve me best biryani in my next order this time it was average üôÇ', "Ambur hot dum biryani
I place the order for home delivery
22 chicken biryani & 1 Veg biryani
That all biryani no test its wrist biryani
Hi put some red chilli powder in biryani
It's test less,
We never order again.", "This place is absolutely the worst ! Their chicken biriyani is possibly the worst tasting garbage that I've had in the name of biriyani, ever ! There are no spices whatsoever in the biriyani, unless of course you consider mounds of salt thrown in to flavor the otherwise insipid rice. The rice itself is of the lowest quality, with a coarse texture and a repulsive odor.
Coming to the chicken, its more a gnarled pile of half chewed bones. You feel so repulsed and nauseated by this unsightly mess, that you'll actually skip a few sessions of usually welcome meat fuelled debauchery after having laid your eyes on it.
To reiterate, it is utter and complete G-A-R-B-A-G-E disguised as food and unless you're the proud owner of a self-destructive streak or majorly intrigued by the concept of dumpster-diving.....KEEP AWAY ! No amount of discounts can justify sliding this steaming pile of crap down your gullet !", 'quantity is very less', 'value for money']

address: M9, 6th Main, LIC Colony, Sector 10, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Desserts and Bakes, Outdoor Seating,
reviews: ["Though it might seem a little small, the cute interiors add a good vibe to the place.\rDropped by in the afternoon for a quick peek. Was disappointed in seeing that there weren't a lot of varieties on display as I expected.\rPicked up a chocolate cupcake and a red velvet truffle cake (not sure about the name.\rAnd this is all I have to say - THE BEST CHOCOLATE CUPCAKE I'VE EATEN! :D\rIt was super moist and so chocolaty - just melts in your mouth! \rThe red velvet cake was yummy too but I didn't like the aftertaste of the white chocolate ( I think) that was on top.\rThe prices seemed are a bit on the higher side.\rBut I'm definitely going to come back for those killer cupcakes! :D", "Right from the moment i opened the door n stepped in, the warmth of the store and the owner engulfed me. The store is Sandhya's dream and the love she puts into each of those cakes n macaroons is evident from the taste. \nI would definitely come next time to taste their hot chocolate, which i missed last time.", 'The first thing that caught my attention at this store was the warm welcome I got by the owner. The store had many varieties of pastries and cupcakes and I couldnt decide what to taste..and finally i settled with "Melting Moments". They just melted away in my mouth and into my heart. I fell in love with the store and all its pastries. Do not miss out on "Nirvana" , an eggless pastry which according to me is the best pastry I\'ve ever had till date.', "Finally I reached here....  As I got there I was given a warm welcome by the owner.....  So I see what is there and I wanted to have everything..  I tried the melting moments- it's exactly what the name says. The macaroons were splendid. The chocolate cake (eggless) gave a kick of its own. The merengue was also amazing... \nIn all the experience was totally yummy-licious!!!"]

Which will cost about 70 rupees and nothing shown in the pictures. 
I ordered white rice and prawns chilly. It was tasteless and the prawns did not have the masala or salt in it.  The rice was overcooked. 
They said they have something called as non alcoholic beer however the staff even forgot about the order and we didnt bother to remind them either.
Overall the experience and the food was a disappointment. I would not go there again nor I would recommend it to anyone.']

address: 17/1 Cambridge Road, Opposite The Frank Antony School, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['good job!', 'This was a beautiful little find in my way home from a long evening walk. Since this place was new I did notice it before. Always love a great paratha. 

Ambience: (3/5)
This is not the ideal place to sit and leisurely eat. It‚Äôs most of a need based dinning. There are two tables/chairs where one can sit down. The place is kept relatively clean. 

Food: (5/5)
Absolutely loved the parathas. Firstly many of the Parathas here costs like 50 INR. These are the conventional ones. I got the aloo and the Palak paratha. Both were incredible. Loved first how big each of them were. The stuffing was also generous by the owner. Also loved how it was allowed to cook so well. The flavours were great 

Summary: (5/5)
Great place to grab a quick bite or ideally a great place to order some fantastic food home. Recommended.', 'Perfectly cooked and well stuffed paranthas. Order today! Properly balanced in spices and economical with the oil. Accompanying chutney is a welcome surprise :)', "Delivery was spot on. I had ordered 2 parathas, 1 aloo pyaj and 1 manchurian cheese.. Both the parathas tasted good and totally value for money if you're looking for quick bite which can be fulfilling as well!!"]

address: 314/1, 3rd Main, 7th Cross, Domlur Layout, Domlur
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["Food - 3.5
Ambiance - 3.0
Service - 4.0
Value for money - 4.0

The place is just a month old. They have 2 time slots from 12pm-3pm and 7pm-10pm. They have a stall outside where you can stand and eat and they also have a pretty good seating area that can hold about 20-30 people.
They have some good non veg options as well.

I ordered the dosa with chicken curry. They have this policy where they give you an extra does only if you sit inside.
The chicken curry was good. It was prepared in a Mangalorean style so it had some rich coconut taste to it. It went well with their dosas.

I can't say that the place is completely hygienic coz I found baby cockroaches on the table where I was sitting. Other than that, the service is good and they are quite courteous."]

Food. -2.5

Value for money. - 3
Overall. -3", 'Visited on a weekday evening. The place was mostly empty. Ordered romali roti and hyderabadi chicken.

Pros:
The place was decent and clean considering the price.
The waiter was really friendly.
Service was quick.
The dishes are quite cheap.

Cons:
The hyderabadi chicken was just average and was surprisingly a green gravy( not gongura though ).
The chicken was hard and rubbery.', "Food - 2.5
Ambiance - 2.5
Service - 3.5
Value for money - 3.5

Seating area is too narrow and suffocating. Wouldn't recommend to dine in when it's too crowded. You have to place an order downstairs and then enter the seating area upstairs. If you just want to grab a roll then they just make it right in front of you, downstairs and you can eat while standing out.

They've got quite a few items on their menu but after I ate one roll I decided not to try anything else. I had a chicken roll, the rumali roti didn't even feel like it was rumali. It looked pretty dead and tasted just okay. Nothing too great about the chicken inside it either.

The service was ok, nothing too great.", "So I recently visited this restaurant..it's newly opened I guess..we ordered chicken tikka biriyani, chilli chicken biriyani and lime juice..the quantity was sufficient enough and the chicken pieces were soft and juicy..overall a good experience!"]

address: 413, Ground Floor, 7th Cross, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', "Food - 3.5
Ambiance - 3.0
Service - 3.5
Value for money - 3.0

Heard a lot about this place from my colleagues so I decided to give it a try. It had another board out front called chickenation right next to it so I was a bit confused as to where in the building Sbarro was. Turns out they share the same space. Seating area is VERY limited, maybe to about 10-15 people or so and even that seems like a stretch. They have very few staff as well. I ordered the chicken pepperoni regular pizza with a side of garlic bread and cheesy jalapeno dip. The garlic bread along with the dip was a killer combo and I thoroughly enjoyed it. The chicken pepperoni pizza was also pretty good and cheesy, it's base was thick, juicy and soft. I felt like it could have been a bit bigger for 160 rupees which is a bit disappointing. The service was excellent. The staff, courteous. All in all a good experience, and a great place to try some pizza if you're bored of Domino's and Pizza hut.", 'Hi, I am extremely disappointed with kind of service provided. I ordered for pizza, garlic bread along with jalape√±o dip through Zomoto order(order no 1580747670). Order was delivered after 75 minutes. They haven‚Äôt delivered jalape√±os dip and soft drink. Delivery guy has no clue. Garlic bread was over fried and not in a state for human consumption. Pls see the attached snap of it.

I wonder how blatantly it was served? Zomato order has no clue of it and they do not have any customer service number', 'Ive had pizzas from NY and was excited to order this! Got a 6" pepperoni..Was Ok tasting but way over priced for the tiniest of pizza... Felt more like a glorified snack for over 450/- ... not worth it. There's far better options for pizzas these days so Sbarro would need better pricing and value for money to grab the Indian attention.', 'sss', "The pizza was good. It was served warm but they didn't have plates. The garlic bread was burnt and not cheesy enough. They didn't have hot sauce either.", "Wasn't a new york style pizza. It was just a normal pan pizza", 'Pasta was too spicy. The Sbarro Pizza we get in the mall is much better.', "The garlic bread was burnt and the pizza was extremely cold and the crust was bland and over cooked. I hope they improve over time but for now it's beyond help"]

reviews:
["Opened in March last year this joint is a small version of Mary Cafe that's on the Thippasandra main road near the Durga Temple. Their menu is almost similar serving South Indian fast food (Idly & Dosa items) and Chinese preparations. The quality is always maintained and their charges are very reasonable. I'm a regular to this place and have been eating their food since the day they opened up the shop. Inside, the place is setup neatly with few tables and they have done a good job with the interiors.

To give an idea, chili chicken and fried rice for one would cost between 110 to 150.

All in all, a nice place with good enough food with little pinch to pocket."]

address: Shop 5, Natasha Gulf View Apartment, Opposite Diamond District, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required,
reviews:
["*My rating is 3.5 but Zomato doesn't allow decimals* Today I ordered Pan Fried Chicken Momo and Pan Fried Chilli Fish from this shop through Swiggy. Both the dishes were good and was kind of impressed with them. But although 10 pieces of momo were supposed to be given, only 8 came and the Pan Fried Chilli Fish was a little salty but tasty none the less. I am thinking of trying other things from this store now.", 'Delivered after 2.5 hrs', "I can't imagine why this place has such low ratings. I'm giving it a 5 star not after ordering once or twice but 4 times. Each time the food has been pretty good for the price. The noodles are authentic and the rice is small just like it's supposed to be in chinese cuisine. 

The delivery has always been prompt and in time. They always call in case of any confusion e.g., dry or gravy. 

I have tried the hakka noodles, butter garlic noodles, Chicken hunan style, chilly chicken, Mix vegetables in gravy, momos and everything has been upto mark.

There are so many funny typos in the menu that you end up setting low expectations but if you just ignore that, the food will always please you.", "I had ordered chilli chicken and schezwan wings. Chilli chicken sucked harder than a black hole. It is supposed to be their popular attraction and yet the gravy falls flat on it's face. The gravy thickened after sometime leaving an impression as if flour had been mixed in it. Chicken was terrible and had blunt taste to begin and end with. Chinse food are always high on the distinct taste you get no matter what the dish is and yet this was a collosal disaster.Schezwan wings were still better compared to chilli flour chicken.

NOT RECOMMENDED.", "noodles and honey chicken great but pls don't order the chopsuey or spring rolls", 'terrible food .. soup had no taste, same for the Malay noodles .. dumplings were average', 'Very disappointing! The red and green curry tasted  like a colored water without any spices!', 'Placed an order thru Foodpanda, the order was accepted by the restaurant but it never arrived. After calling the restaurant almost after an hour, they simply said delivery issue and informed me to cancel the order. I should have checked the reviews on Zomato first, my bad.', 'quite happy with the noodles and the honey chicken 
oil was a tad much in the noodles but for the price they are good', "Very bad food if u don't know what is Thai curry then plz remove from your menu because u giving me spinach gravy instead of Thai curry

I am working in fnb service in Marriott ok. I know its not Thai curry becoz Thai means galangal pokchoi coconut milk kafir lime leaves n all thanks plz take care of your restaurant"]

address: 1, Jeevan Bhima Nagar Main Road, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Table reservation required, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["I've been waiting for almost 15 minutes no staff is bothering to come and ask what's your order. And staff are cheap scums and they don't respond to any questions. Waste of time and money", 'An alright option to spend your time, food is alright, servers are friendly. Did not find anything to complaint about. Food was not amazing but not bad either.', 'I usually have the chicken biryani at Bengaluru House with their chicken green curry, which is oh so yum! 
This time around I tried out the curd rice and mutton fry combination which was also fantastic! 
A simple place with some good food - A must try!', 'Has a homely ambience and an authentic local taste forms the base of their food, which is very simple and satisfying. Sticking to the basics, and perfecting it is just as good as coming up with innovative stuff. There are very few eateries in town that nail the former, and this happens to be one of them. The prices are very very very reasonable. You could visit this place when your pockets are near empty or you just want some great traditional South Indian home made food.

Visiting again soon', 'The food items here are good both quality and quantity wise. Only problem with this restaurant is that many times some of the items will not be available. I have not ordered here via Zomato but I had ordered few times via Food Panda and most of the times after ordering they would call up and tell the ordered food items are not available and would ask me to cancel and reorder the available items. After few times I got fed up and stopped ordering via Food Apps here.', 'it was amazing experience. this is the worst biriyani i had till now. gravy is bad ,hot water is better than rasam. pure waste of money, high cost very low taste.', 'Briyani served cold at 2PM, ask them to heat it again, lot of chipped bone and few stones on it. horrible. just coriander and mint flavored rice to me.\xa0
Mutton fry, cant see any meat, full of fat layer fried and served at medium heat.', "We tried a variety of dishes at Bengaluru house and absolutely loved it! 
The donne biryani and kebabs are my top picks!
The donne biryani was perctly flavoured and paired so well with the Mutton pepper! What I liked about it was that it was light on the tummy and din't leave you feeling stuffed the whole day. And omg the kebabs were out of the world! Undoubtedly one of the best kebabs I've eaten. Soo Crispy and well flavoured üòçüòçüòç 
Thank you so much for that amazing lunch swectha! Had a great time! 
How can I forget the oreo cheesecake!! It was the perfect end to our meal! Reminded me of the oreo cheesecake spiga used to serve! Loved loved it!", "I've been to this place many times and have always had a good experience.
Mostly I've ordered dosa/ egg dosa and chicken curry for dinner and it was always good and safe on the stomach.
I've tried their chapati, Donne biryani, meals and chicken dishes which have also been good. The service is quick and staff are also courteous. On one occasion I'd ordered fish fry and after I placed the order, they were genuine enough to cancel the order because it wasn't fresh. So not sure how the fish tastes here."]

address: Lido Mall, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Mall Parking, Desserts and Bakes, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Tried their kulfi and new york cheesecake flavors, not so great but in this hot summer it was satisfying. They should try introducing different flavours in this season.', 'Ordered Chocolate Silk Syrup. Taste was extremely good. Packing was Attractive. Quantity was good for the price. Would Recommend this place.', 'I had gone shopping to LIDO Mall and decided to try out this outlet. I ordered vanilla fudge brownie ice cream. The ice cream was okay and not that tasty.', 'This place is highly overpriced.
Ask the rates before you order because without asking they charge you for two scoops.
Taste wise it was good but the quantity was Very little.', 'Pathetic really pathetic. Gelato was once a very good place to have some good icecream (Gelato). It was really so bad, half of the gelato kept for sale looked like it was ancient icecream preserved for centuries.', 'I took a mix of Vanilla Choco and Swiss Chocolate..
The ice was so crunchy..which I felt weird..
The texture of Swiss chocolate was creamy and smooth..', 'Strawberry Cheesecake Gelato - I dream about this flavour at night! With a little tangy taste from the strawberries and the right mix of vanilla and sugar, this is my absolute fav flavour from Gelato Italiano. Given the outlet proximity to my work place, party packs are my frequent order. Well spoken and courteous staff, this outlet might be tiny - but it definitely has kept my addiction alive!', "Had icecream here with an offer from little app. The icrecream feels different with a gel like feel to it. The taste is not bad, and yet the combination offered didn't compliment each other. Maybe they can work on that", "My sister and I were craving some ice cream and this was the first place we saw in the vicinity and decided to try it out. We tried the Chocolate Brownie Fudge and the Madagascar Fine Chocolate, both were quite creamy and melted within minutes. The first one was pretty decent; milk chocolate with fudge and walnuts, the latter one was pure dark chocolate and was too sweet to actually finish. 

On a side note, I specifically asked if both had any peanuts/walnuts in it as my sister has a severe food allergy and we were told both did not contain any when the Chocolate Brownie Fudge one actually did. Luckily I noticed it and exchanged my ice cream with hers or it would've turned out in a fatal medical emergency. We had already left from the place by then or I would've surely given the server a piece of my mind. Hope they look into this and ensure something like this never happens again. Bad experience overall, wouldn't recommend at all.", 'I have presume this gelato has recently established a working module inside the Lido.I ordered two medium scoops of Madagascar chocolate and black current to be true I expected to have a bit more bitterness of the African coco seeds but it complemented the black current very well .The balance was maintained no one flavor overpowered the other. Well placed and marketed joint it will do exceedingly well']

reviews:
["Nice good food and service best friend stuff nice amber and service best friend and it's attachments fantastic food and service best friend and", 'We visit Bhaiyyaji food court for a heavy breakfast on a weekend from time to time. We had poori subzi, jalebis and aloo Paratha. The food is decent, fresh and pocket friendly.', 'Had been here last night to get some rotis I ordered for roti with rajma and roti with panner burji. Horrible experience rajma was almost spoiled and the panner burji was too oily and salty. And they charged too much for the food tat they server. Highly Not recommended', "A place for bachelors.... Don't have high hopes before reaching there. The parathas are good...and the puri sabji is awesome... But I was unfortunate to try my hands over pav bhaji...and it was pathetic... Overall a decent place...", "I personally don't recommend going over here!!
Found a cockroach in the Pav Bhaji served over there!!
Water served in bottles is also not good!!
I am not sure if its good now..but the experience dates back to September-14!
I never dared to go even near this restaurant.\xa0
Rating is given just to enable me to publish this review!", 'Have eaten from here a few times when I did not have a cook. This is one of the dhabas of bangalore which are ideal for bachelors or anyone who needs proper roti sabji food and does not cook at home.. Have never sat there and eaten. Ambience is not great and is cramped. Generally pack it for home. Takes a little time if you order for something apart from their set menu of lunch or dinner. But the taste is good. Food looks hygienic. The rotis are proper wheat ones and are soft and nice. Also they have some chaat options apart from normal food. They have some good sweets also. Do try their aloo and paneer paratha. Really good.
Worth a try if you do not cook at home and need some home cooked food !!', 'This review was due.. good place for evening north indian snacks.. pakore, pav bhaji, some nice sweets in east india style.. since they are very near to office, we are frequent visitors..', 'Good north Indian food. Need to improve on the hygiene part. Taste has always been a plus point and would love to go their again and again.', 'Good and cheap veg food. If you go for lunch then make sure you go at a time where office people don't come otherwise you won't get any place to seat. The price is very "Preiswert" and it's lovely to have a veg restaurant for quick bites which is so cheap. The food is really good and the restaurant can be visited daily.']

reviews:
["I have had cookies and cakes from Fudgy Love several times and they are awesome.
Recently, they started delivering breakfast in and around indiranagar.\xa0
I'm not a very big fan of pancakes, but I loved the combination of pancakes and blueberry coulis. It was damn tasty. Breakfast had Pancakes + Blueberry coulis + Fruits + Double chocolate cookies, all these for just Rs. 75/- which I felt was completely worth. Give it a try if you live in and around Indiranagar.", 'The cupcake bombs, plate licking tarts, assorted cookies and the star of the show is the artisan cakes everything is so fresh and items are top notch one of the best places to drop by and with the menu constantly changing, what more can be asked‚Ä¶ jus keeeeeeeeep bakingggggg. ;-) :-)', "I'd ordered a chocolate gooey cake for my bro's b'day,  after searching for every cake shop in b'lore I settled for this place, I ordered 2 days before n d cake was ready on time, it looked amazing n it was very yummy,  thanks to vinay, you r doing an amazing job n you were a delight to talk to...", 'Great place for desserts...... if you have a sweet tongue........ must try. Goodies at reasonable price.. \xa0:):)..yummilicious.. \xa0Try out people. Strongly recommended.', 'Cookies are to die for.
Never miss.. This was an awesome experience.. Loved the taste.  Definitely a place to visit if you love theme based cakes..', 'Well if u have a passion for cakes and pastries or if u want to take your celebration to next level with designer cakes
This is the one stop shop 
The owner Ms. Vidhya is a master of these kinds of cakes.
And whats more u can learn all this in the workshops conducted in this bakery.', "Not surprised that they make some of the finest drool worthy cakes in town as you will know that they are handmade with love if you've attended any of their workshops! They most friendly neighbourhood bakers you will find... A definite choice for anyone looking for custom made cakes & bakes for their loved ones.... All at a pocket friendly price that your wallet will love... Go fudgy love", 'The pastries at fudgy love were amazing and always left me craving for more.The chocolate tart is from another planet for sure.The cookies,cup cakes and chocolates were also incredible.I am definitely looking forward to some more amazing desserts to come my way.', 'Let  me tell you what I love here. The triple chocolate mousse cake. Woowww!! I have had it thrice already. All b-day cakes go thru fudgy love! Their cookies and cup cakes are to die for!', 'Awesome Cookies and lovely theme Cakes!!!
\xa0Loved the taste and definitely a place to visit often whenever you feel to have delicious deserts.']

reviews:
["This place serves various milk & dry fruits sweets, chaats & Paratha's.

Taste - ****
Value for money - ****
Ambience - *** (very less option for sitting)

Recommendation - Milk cake, chole bhature & thandi alu chaat.", 'We were just crossing jeevan bhima nagar so just thought to try some food items. Its a very ordinary place. Staff is very lazy and uninterested.

We ordered aaloo pyaz paratha, chole kachori and Puri sabzi. And I will say each item was up to the mark. We were surprised as place does not look like it will serve that good food. 

I will recommend the owner to make this place lively so that people could feel like coming here. But otherwise it is having good taste.

Ambiance - 2.5/5
Quality - 4/5
Staff - 3/5

EAT WELL STAY HEALTHY!! üòÉüòÉ', 'Food 3.5 / 5
Ambience 2.5 / 5
Staff 2.5 / 5

The taste of the food is good. Can eat a plenty of stuff at a reasonable cost. A good place for a quick healthy lunch or snacks.', "I have been to this place 3-4 times since it is very close to my home. And each and every time it has been a disappointing experience. I have tried some snacks (bhujias, mathris, samosas), and taste was always below average. Today I bought some besan ladoos and they tasted like sugar balls. Had to throw them. 100rs for 4 ladoos. The staff don't even acknowledge your presence when you ask them for some item. No one should go to this place.", "Irrespective of the n number of continental breakfast places that have opened, when you deeply crave something for breakfast, it's usually for some specific desi food. Today I was craving specifically for alu subzi and this is usually good in some of the small eateries or traditional sweets shops. So I went to Bhikaram and the items were just getting ready and they said puri subzi would be ready in 15mts but it was ready in 10mtsüòÅ. I had 3 hot puris with alu subzi. Since it was fresh, tasted good except for the frozen peas which had not cooked. Staff were courteous.", 'Bad shop.... Went to buy chole bhature , pav bhaji. Was highly disappointed to see they serving one day old food from fridge and warming it while serving . It was not fresh, check my pics. I would never recommend it to anyone. The taste was pathetic 

To me it was first and last visit to shop.', 'Fake sweets. Nothing much to say about this place. Please refrain from buying sweets from this place. This feedback is entirely for the outlet at jeevan bheema nagar.', 'Bad place to go to if you are craving vada pav... No taste n a very small vada..', 'Went with hope of having mouthwatering rajasthani food but food was not upto the mark.
Pavbhaji Anf Aloo paratha was good. 
Aloo tikki was not good. 
In Mini meal Chapathi was good but Veg Gravy was not good. 
Rasmalai was too bad.
Overall if you want to have amazing rajasthani food, this is not the place. 
Not Satisfied.', "Visited this place 3-4 months back and could not find a listing on zomato then. Keeping the review brief since its been a while since my visit. 

Ambience
Its a sweet shop doubling up as a eatery. They had a modest setup and nothing mention-worthy about ambience

Pricing
They are priced economically. 

Food
The parata's was quite good while all of the other orders were quite bad. This included chola poori, dahi paapdi chat and badam milk. 

On a summary note, a place I might revisit only for the paratas or sweets.
                                                bingingbanker.com"]

address: Shop 5, Natasha Gulf View Apartments, Opposite Diamond District, Domlur, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Visited this place to attend the Open Mic Event but that was a mistake. Not because of the event but because of the service and hygiene.
I literally saw the rats roaming around here and there in cafe üòû which is not a good sign for cafe.
Service is super slow.', 'Review is based on my experience for the Whitefield location .

Quite aloof of a location but equally safe and welcoming.We visited in the afternoon and there was no crowd so we could relax and enjoy the food and the ambience.

Food was delicious ,we tried mango milkshake,pasta, chicken crepe, coffee and masala fries. It was served hot and fresh.

Service was prompt as expected.

Food 4/5
Ambience 4/5
Service 4/5', 'Very disinterested team. They do not smile at all. The cups and glasses smell of the cupboards they have been stored in. Overpriced considering the tea is not even brewed but made from tea bags. If eating is not your main focus, it‚Äôs a good hangout if you want privacy or want some quiet. The restroom looks old and could do with some renovation.', 'Went to the place after long for breakfast and was disappointed on the staff not knowing much about the menu and the food also average. I used to recommend this place to others but their quality looks to have dropped significantly.', 'You can shop and eat, have a lovely conversation... No noise and slow music. Has a lovely aura in being a home and being served great food

Not pet friendly though.. üò£

Items ordered - Fresh juice and chicken & mushroom in brown sauce served with softest garlic bread ever had ‚ô•Ô∏è', "Honestly, I've been wanting to visit ants cafe since the longest time and when I did, it was a tad bit below my hyper excitement and expectation level. First of all, for some reason, the place looks SUPER SAD and gives out a very DULL vibe, not peaceful not the me-kind or definitely not a feel good vibe. It's probably the way it's built or managed or I don't know what. The breakfast menu genuinely looks nice and would love to try it someday but I just stuck to pancakes and hot chocolate this time. Both of them were pretty average. The only highlight of the place is the store, showcasing authentic Assamese culture. They need major improvements to life up the vibe of this place for sure!", "I've passed this location multiple times and never noticed a cafe there. It's hard to spot from the road and doesn't look very appealing from the outside.

But I was surprised by the ambience inside! There are some great spots to sit and enjoy your weekend brunch. Spent some time here and didn't notice it go by!

The food's great and the service wasn't as bas described in the other reviews. Maybe they improved on it?

I got the bacon breakfast, sausages, coffee and ice tea. The food was great but the coffee was a bit off. It lacked the aroma and flavour - old coffee beans perhaps?

The prices are reasonable! Would visit again", 'Little cozy and warm cafe. Has balcony and relaxed sitting arrangement. Ordered Maharaja and Spanish omlets, scrambled eggs. Food is tasty and affordable however service is super slow. We ordered chamomile tea and coffee which never came after asking for three times and they charged for it in the bill. Need to improve on service !', 'Terrible sandwiches. The ambience was really nice and the good thing is that they use pyramid bag teas but the sandwiches were tasteless and made with white bread. Big chunks of onion inside with an overdose of mayo and no spices at all.', 'Went to the ants cafe for some brunch after being hungover and it was exactly what I needed. The service was great and it was a very peaceful place to sit and read.']

address: Plot 208, 11th Cross, 8th Main, HAL 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Breakfast, Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Best home cooked and healthy food in Bangalore', '', 'Great food and great staff', "Aunty makes delicious food. It's hygienic and perfectly giving the feeling the homeü•∞
I had a North Indian thali including rice, roti, daal, chana masala, gobhi alloo, salad and custard üòã", 'Johny Kitchen, like any other food place you might think, but it's a place of our own taste, hygienic and pocket friendly. I have tasted few items like poha, sabudana poha, dosa, veg meal and it was good and freshly done, good for taste buds but then one day we got a new addition in his kitchen "Samosa". Believe you me, any North Indian can vouch for his samosa taste which takes each one of us back to our memory lane of our town, getting the same delicious samosa. The nostalgia I have got, it never happened in my 10+ years in Bangalore eating so many dishes across. The filling of Patato, the outer crisp layer and the masala of that filling, proper shaped samosa is a must try for each samosa lovers. I wish Johny kitchen to prosper so that we all can have a quality with authenticity of various dishes always.', 'Johnys Kitchen is a paradise for people who like hygenic, clean food. I have spent a lot of time searching for places like this and not being able to come here everyday will be my only regret if i shift in any other oart of Bangalore. The food is prepared fresh and with no compromise on quaility of ingredients (dont get fooled by simple ambience). Also its economical. I rely on this place for my daily meals and it is the closest that can come to home food outside of home.', "So basically I was looking for a quaint place to finish lunch on the Jeevan Bima Nagar vicinity. A search on Zomato took me here.
A small place nr. National Center for Excellence, Thippasandra, where you would initially struggle to locate the spot. Equipped with three 4-seater table, assuming this place rely mostly on online/ home delivery model.
Not that they got an exhaustive menu, but got impressive healthy breakfast options. However, settled down with a non-veg thali comprising two fresh-soft chapathis, (bet would not stop from ordering few more), rice, salad, a bowl of thick dal, egg curry, and chicken curry 3-pieces, and a dessert - custard.
I wasn't very keen on a homely lunch, but ended on having one, which was quite satisfying.
Overall a comforting experience that should get me here again to try out something else in some other time of the day.", 'Its a really small and warm place with friendly people around. We had been there around 10 PM on a cold windy night. The food we had filled our tummy as well as our hearts. Surely coming back fr some more Rajma Chaawal & Alooo Paraths.', "Homely food with great taste...
As a chef i suggest #JeevanBhimaNagar residents that Johnny's Kitchen is the best choice for healthy and homely food...", 'I saw this place while walking through the area and found it quite appealing. That afternoon I ordered a veg thali, which has been the best home food thali I have eaten in a while! The thali is nicely packed in a plastic plate which is easy to eat and easy to dispose as well. Every item in the Thali had that really nice homely taste. The quantity was just right for me.. not heavy and oily at all!. I hope the owner retains the taste and pricing and if so, I am a loyal customer!']

reviews: ["The Blue Tokai at Indiranagar is the newest Blue Tokai to open up in Bangalore. On 12th Main, the cafe is on the 1st floor and shares space with a boutique. The boutique has taken up so much space that there are only few tables being offered currently at Blue Tokai.The coffees are fab, no doubt. I had the chilli cinnamon mocha, which was good, but I wish the flavours of chilli and cinnamon were more pronounced. There was a chicken sandwich kind of dish (which I don't see on the Zomato menu now) which was really awesome, loved it!Hope they increase the seating arrangement and more people will flock to the Blue Tokai in Indiranagar."]

reviews: ['All is well', 'Paneer tikka birayani and mix veg birayani was so yummy and The aroma is very they long grain basmati rice which was giving most flavour in Biryani', 'A decent biryani! \nI ordered for a paneer tikka biryani. The biryani was hot & differently spiced from the other conventional types, the meat was cooked well, but the rice was a bit dry. A slight smokey flavour added a new dimension to the dish. Overall it's worth a try!!!"]

Thanks.", "I have ordered chicken biryani and it is fully burned smell rice and that too more salty.. not even worth for money... Didn't give any gravy ... Taste is worst... Overall simply waste of money", 'Waste and unhygienic full of synthetic color in chilli items.', "I ordered food from here on Zomato and the packing was so poor that all my food had mixed itself up before it reached me, and the bot on Zomato chat just kept repeating sentences like it was stoned. Imagine chicken fried rice mixed in gulab jamun syrup with lassi. I hope the restaurant realises it's packing food for humans and not cattle. And a Nandini milk packet put into a mixer with sugar and water is not lassi! Please take that off your menu as it is neither authentic Punjabi nor tastey but actually ended up giving me a stomach ache. The chilli chicken was good. The chicken fried rice had only scrambled eggs in it and no visible or relishable pieces of chicken.", 'Ordered most basic dish Dal khichadi. Only taste I could get was salt and garlic. How can somebod mess up such a simple dish. Quantity was fine,but quality was zero.', 'Food is good but packaging is not good i was ordered some bevarages were they packed on rice box which was not good instead of bevarges package', "I have ordered food for Shahri but they have delivered spoiled food both the Curry has spoiled and couldn't have food because of that and when I called to rise a concern they even didn't answer the call and Zomato also not responding to the Concern..", 'Quite an experience. Don‚Äôt go by the place but definitely try the menu. Vegetarian is very affordable. Ordered Aloo Poste and dahi baingan. Loved the Dahi Baingan with both Phulkas and jeera rice.', "I tried food via delivery or dine in from most places in Jeevan Bhima Nagar but due to the reviews and the way this place looked during my multiple walks in that area, I had avoided. But once again I learnt not to go by other reviews and try myself. During one of my acute hungry times (which is most of the time), I ordered a Chinese combo from here and loved it.  Freshly made and tasty. I was satiated.


The main reason I ordered was because I wanted tea along with the meal. This came in a plastic cover inside the thali but was pretty good taste wise.

I don't see this chinese combo in their delivery order anymore.\xa0 But they have an extensive menu with loads of bengali dishes as well so there are lot many options.", 'Ordered first time and had good experience , one of the best place to order food late night . well cooked food , with awesome taste and great flavour ..']

address: 2, Maruthi Towers, 9th B Main, Chairmans Layout, 100 Feet Road, Banaswadi, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
known_for: Goes beyond roti sabzi, with Italian & Mexican, and all vegetarian.
reviews:
["It's a great place for the veggies... The menu has a wide range of dishes to offer. We ordered for main course straightaway... Ordered malai kofta, paneer khurchan and tadka daal... we had requested for less spicy and less oil for our parents. the order was as requested... And tandoori rotis.... The food was really good, veggies had a taste of their own... Worth visiting again... Pure vegetarians will love this place.

However on the downside, the service was slow, the menu pages are coming off, restroom smell reaches the dining area.... Hence rating low

Lastest review- they have improved their services a lot and the above mentioned negatives have been fixed. Worth the visit."]

address: 225, Bhagyasri, 1st Main, HAL 2nd Stage, Service Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Table booking recommended, Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [4, 'Pho', 'Pad Thai', 'Momos', 'Spring Roll', 'Thai Green Curry', 'Steamed Chicken Momo', 'Clear Soup']
reviews:
['Food - 4
Staff - 4
Ambience -4
We went during the evening expecting that we will get Bahn Mi but unfortunately it was not available at that moment. So we went for Beef Pho.
It was served with condiments which was impressive cause rarely restaurant serves in this authentic way.
The broth was hot and flavourful mixed with meat and noodles made it fulfilling.
Overall a good experience.‚ò∫Ô∏è', 'Tried Vietnamese cuisine for the first time and loved it to the core. Must visit once..', 'I just loved it ..No words to explain how happy iam to see and taste all the delicious food and felt really nice when my colleague appreciated for choosing the perfect place for dining..Must visit place ,small area but quite maintained and polite staffs ..', 'To be honest I was skeptical about going in when I first saw this place, but I made a good choice of going in.
Momos were delicious!! Might have been a good choice after all!', "Ambience : pretty good . It's not a very big place and they have kept it simple and clean .

Food : along with the normal menu options they have these meal combos as well and that's what I tried out . I had spicy basil noodles with chicken and it turned out to be pretty good . I am not an expert on Vietnamese cuisine so can't say how close it was to true viet cuisine but I definitely felt the Indian touch ;) ..... Felt more of Indian than any other cuisine .

They have explicitly called out few Vietnamese dishes in the menu , maybe they could be tried out if you are not afraid of experimenting and want to experience true viet cuisine .

Service : I would rate it decent ."]

address: L1-08, Skywalk, 5/1, Near Body Craft, Assaye Road, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating, Table booking recommended,
reviews:
['Small place. Not a place for a meet-up. Food is okay and ambience is not good. Service is fast.
Ratings:
Taste: 3/5
quality: 4/5
ambience: 2/5', 'A small space, with a cozy ambience fir couples I guess. Food is average. Located with lots of restaurants, so little difficult to figure out the location. Good for a small, cozy dinner after a tiring office.', "It's a great place to grab some quick bites . The pasta in arabiata sauce was amazing. The chef Acharul Mondal was so welcoming and customised the food according to our needs. It was a simple but awesome experience", "It's an amazing place to visit.
Small but very peaceful.
Chef over here is really friendly and disciplined.
Had a great meal.
A memorable one!!", 'Very nice food and good service, Acharul, our chef gave us great advice. Steaks are recommended here. Worth trying and quite cosy once inside', "I went to grab a quick bite on New Year's Eve. It's a small and cute place. To be honest, was not expecting to much. 

The chef greeted us warmly, gave us a couple of suggestions on what we should try and I was extremely pleased that I listened to him.

Had the fish & chips, the mint watermelon cooler, the caramel pudding and the the parmigano chicken. I LOVED it.Would highly recommend trying this place out.", 'Chef Acharul Mondal is absolutely fantastic.The place is relatively small but he makes up for it with delicious steaks and impeccable service.', "Very good continental dishes at affordable prices. Chef Acharul was friendly and we had his recommendation and totally loved his recommendations. Had Grilled Cilantro Chicken and Panko Crusted Chicken. It is hard to find a decent continental food in this side of city, but I'm glad that we got the Souk here. Service is good and quick. Recommended.", 'Highly recommended. Triple decker chicken is a must along with BBQ wings. The food is much better than Smalleys which is right next door. Do visit this place and give it a try and I am sure you will not regret it. The chef Mondal is a great sport too.', 'We had a horrible experience here, definitely not coming back. They need to rework on the food majorly. The pizza we ordered was terrible and was overloaded with salt, so were the fries.']

reviews:
['All good quantity might be a concern and a bit messes packing. From my side I feel. It good to have
Thanks really for taste...', 'I have ordered twice from this place. The first time I ordered the paneer makhani thali which was good. So this time I was inspired to order the Maharaja thali. You can see in the pic the condition of the delivered product.
I am a Marwadi and I can tell your our Dal, bati, churma and gutta are not supposed to be like this, hard and tasteless.
Moreover, in the name of Mirchi ki sabzi they gave 2 boiled chillies. What cheating!!!
The only saving grace in the meal was the Amul mast dahi pack.', "Not the quantity or the quality was good, dal was watery and rest wasn't that tasteful", 'Great place to order lunch and dinner. I order regularly from here and feel satisfied for the taste and quality.
Food quality - 5üåü
Taste - 5 üåü
Packing - 5üåü
Quantity served - 5üåü

Highly recommendedüëç', 'Ordered a thali from Marwadi Kitchen. Was very filling and tasted delicious. Liked the gajjar halwa and paneer best. Would definetly order again', "We got 2 special Marwadi thalis- was very filling, almost couldn't finish it but everything tasted so delicious! The paneer curry was yummy and same for the dessert of the day.", 'Nice homely food. Healthy and tasty. I ordered special Marwadi meals and it is a very nice
experience having Meals from this place. My favourite Marwadi kitchen from now.', 'I ordered daal baati combo which came up to be very small in portion. The taste is avaerage. They should work on the quality and quantity of food. mirchi ki sbzi came out to be half piece of fried chilly. Disappointing!!', 'Taking More Money Food Giving In Very Small Portion, I Order Kadi Pakoda With Rice They Send That Much Food That Much Other Restaurants Give For Sampling.', 'Great food, ordered a veg premium thali and I m completely satisfied with the quality and quantity. This is very good north indian restaurant in bangalore.']

reviews:
['Down-to-earth low budget place with great food!', 'From having a budget friendly drink session with some amazing food, this bar ups the ante with family dining area to accommodate the non smokers but the rooftop is where you want to be.', 'Its a nice and pocket friendly place in indiranagar. Ambiance was good and food was tasty. Service need little improvement. Rest rooms are not clean.', 'old place, shady bar in indiranagar. amazing coastal seafood and cuisines (mangalore style). they play cricket matches on the big screen so works as a sports bar. place is quite shady and smoking is allowed. sea food used to very spicy and tasty but quality has reduced over the years though', "It's a local bar in a corner of Indiranagar.
The ambiance here, obviously isn't that good. But, even it comes to the price. It's the best place to go have some cheap booze, chill with your buddies.
The food here is amazing! Their Chicken Ghee Roast is to die for.", 'An old style typical bar. Ground floor is a/c & non smoking. Service is usually good. Food is ordinary, nothing exceptional. Reasonable pricing.', 'Drinks and food are pocket friendly...food is awesome which is mainly the mangalore cuisine.
Chicken ghee roast with neer dosa MUST TRY. 
Vegetarian side is not upto the mark.', 'Pocket friendly. Old school open bar feels. Dal khichdi, chilli chicken, masala papad , masala peanut are some of the must haves here. Roof top and few tv screens.', 'Good place. Cheap drinks, decent ambience and amazing food
Staff is ok and the place has a decent service. Will recommend sitting in the rooftop section', "Nice place for guys to have drinks and food with reasonable prices. Food is so spicy and I enjoyed it.   Especially the sea food like tawa fried fish and crab fry. As it is some kind of local restaurant, ambience is usual and I didn't bother about it."]

address: 59, 1st Floor, Devikalaya, 100 Feet Road, HAL 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Indoor Seating,
most_liked_Food: [3, 'Sea Food', 'Neer Dosa', 'Murgh Ghee Roast', 'Fish', 'Chicken Sukha', 'Beer', 'Butter Chicken']
reviews: ['New place we just walked into as we were crossing.\nBeautiful setting with good ambience. Food was awesome! We had the chicken soup with ghee roasted tacos- which was a nan and tandoori jhinga.\nService is quick and professional. Had a nice time!', 'This is a new north Indian cuisine restaurant located on Indiranagar 100 ft road. We visited this place on a rainy evening. The taste and ambience were equally good. So was the quality of food served. The service was a bit slow since the restaurant was new and full of customers at the time of our visit. We had Murg Yakhni Shorba, Trio of Tandoori Broccoli, Charcoal Stuffed Mushroom, Paneer Triology, Tandoori Jhinga, Pomfret Banana Leaf Mahi and Murg Gilafi Sheek. All the items were very delicious and flavourful.', 'This newly opened place serves delicious food, perfect colour combination of interior decor and courteous staff. We have tried their most of the items believe me food quality is very good and good portions of quantity. Overall good experience with yummy mouth watering food you should definitely try.']

cuisines: South Indian, Chettinad, Kerala, Sri Lankan
address: 276, 1st Floor, Defence Colony, 6th Main, Binnamangala Layout, 100 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, Valet Parking Available, Table booking recommended, Buffet, Indoor Seating, Private Dining Area Available,
known_for: Pure vegetarian food from all Southern States.
reviews:
["Pros- service
Cons - Poor Housekeeping.
How's Food- Average
Bottom Line - Not so impressive.", 'Great place to have a good south Indian spread.
They have many items in the buffet. 
All the items were absolutely fresh and tasty.
The sweets were really good.
Service is very prompt.
The ambience is not that great and can be improved.', 'To a awesome south Indian buffet. We went for lunch and even after having more food we felt light. We got 50% off even in easydine so it was cost worthy

The food was too good. They had a veg soup, and started with the starters: Paddu, cheese kurkure, vada, pazhampori, podi idly, sweet vada , Pineapple provided with a chutney and sambar and we have sprouts, groundnut and salad In buffet.

After some huge starters round we went for main course and the maincourse was awesome having steamed rice, sambar podi ghee, curd rice and varieties of gravies for roti, appam, dosa.

In the desert section we had ladoo , tender coconut payasam and 2 other sweets and everything was tasty.

And at the end you have a fantastic filter coffee to be served.

Food 4.5/5
Ambience 4/5
Service 5/5']

address: 1154, 12th Main, Hal 2nd Stage, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating, All Day Breakfast,
reviews: ["The Blue Tokai at Indiranagar is the newest Blue Tokai to open up in Bangalore. On 12th Main, the cafe is on the 1st floor and shares space with a boutique. The boutique has taken up so much space that there are only few tables being offered currently at Blue Tokai.The coffees are fab, no doubt. I had the chilli cinnamon mocha, which was good, but I wish the flavours of chilli and cinnamon were more pronounced. There was a chicken sandwich kind of dish (which I don't see on the Zomato menu now) which was really awesome, loved it!Hope they increase the seating arrangement and more people will flock to the Blue Tokai in Indiranagar."]

reviews:
['All good quantity might be a concern and a bit messes packing. From my side I feel. It good to have
Thanks really for taste...', 'I have ordered twice from this place. The first time I ordered the paneer makhani thali which was good. So this time I was inspired to order the Maharaja thali. You can see in the pic the condition of the delivered product.
I am a Marwadi and I can tell your our Dal, bati, churma and gutta are not supposed to be like this, hard and tasteless.
Moreover, in the name of Mirchi ki sabzi they gave 2 boiled chillies. What cheating!!!
The only saving grace in the meal was the Amul mast dahi pack.', "Not the quantity or the quality was good, dal was watery and rest wasn't that tasteful", 'Great place to order lunch and dinner. I order regularly from here and feel satisfied for the taste and quality.
Food quality - 5üåü
Taste - 5 üåü
Packing - 5üåü
Quantity served - 5üåü

Highly recommendedüëç', 'Ordered a thali from Marwadi Kitchen. Was very filling and tasted delicious. Liked the gajjar halwa and paneer best. Would definetly order again', "We got 2 special Marwadi thalis- was very filling, almost couldn't finish it but everything tasted so delicious! The paneer curry was yummy and same for the dessert of the day.", 'Nice homely food. Healthy and tasty. I ordered special Marwadi meals and it is a very nice
experience having Meals from this place. My favourite Marwadi kitchen from now.', 'I ordered daal baati combo which came up to be very small in portion. The taste is avaerage. They should work on the quality and quantity of food. mirchi ki sbzi came out to be half piece of fried chilly. Disappointing!!', 'Taking More Money Food Giving In Very Small Portion, I Order Kadi Pakoda With Rice They Send That Much Food That Much Other Restaurants Give For Sampling.', 'Great food, ordered a veg premium thali and I m completely satisfied with the quality and quantity. This is very good north indian restaurant in bangalore.']

reviews:
['Down-to-earth low budget place with great food!', 'From having a budget friendly drink session with some amazing food, this bar ups the ante with family dining area to accommodate the non smokers but the rooftop is where you want to be.', 'Its a nice and pocket friendly place in indiranagar. Ambiance was good and food was tasty. Service need little improvement. Rest rooms are not clean.', 'old place, shady bar in indiranagar. amazing coastal seafood and cuisines (mangalore style). they play cricket matches on the big screen so works as a sports bar. place is quite shady and smoking is allowed. sea food used to very spicy and tasty but quality has reduced over the years though', "It's a local bar in a corner of Indiranagar.
The ambiance here, obviously isn't that good. But, even it comes to the price. It's the best place to go have some cheap booze, chill with your buddies.
The food here is amazing! Their Chicken Ghee Roast is to die for.", 'An old style typical bar. Ground floor is a/c & non smoking. Service is usually good. Food is ordinary, nothing exceptional. Reasonable pricing.', 'Drinks and food are pocket friendly...food is awesome which is mainly the mangalore cuisine.
Chicken ghee roast with neer dosa MUST TRY. 
Vegetarian side is not upto the mark.', 'Pocket friendly. Old school open bar feels. Dal khichdi, chilli chicken, masala papad , masala peanut are some of the must haves here. Roof top and few tv screens.', 'Good place. Cheap drinks, decent ambience and amazing food
Staff is ok and the place has a decent service. Will recommend sitting in the rooftop section', "Nice place for guys to have drinks and food with reasonable prices. Food is so spicy and I enjoyed it.   Especially the sea food like tawa fried fish and crab fry. As it is some kind of local restaurant, ambience is usual and I didn't bother about it."]

reviews: ['New place we just walked into as we were crossing.\nBeautiful setting with good ambience. Food was awesome! Had a nice time!', 'This is a new north Indian cuisine restaurant located on Indiranagar 100 ft road. We visited this place on a rainy evening. The taste and ambience were equally good. We had Murg Yakhni Shorba, Trio of Tandoori Broccoli, Charcoal Stuffed Mushroom, Paneer Triology, Tandoori Jhinga, Pomfret Banana Leaf Mahi and Murg Gilafi Sheek. All the items were very delicious and flavourful.', 'This newly opened place serves delicious food, perfect colour combination of interior decor and courteous staff. We have tried their most of the items believe me food quality is very good and good portions of quantity. Overall good experience with yummy mouth watering food you should definitely try.']

address: 483, Hal, 3rd Stage, Jeevan Bhima Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['', 'Well the Review is not so good on zomato but still the place have different menu , thanks for the creativity they have added here . 
To discover food this is a good place I have some new item here like . 

Sukku Malli coffee ‚òïÔ∏è,  idli Manchurian, Kanchipuram idli . 

Don‚Äôt go by the review  explore the menu and you will see the difference', "Really cozy n trendy place. I love eating here as it is has a quite ambience. It is a tiny place but the services are good and quick. Also, they have a variety of idli styles. They cater to both vegetarians and non-vegetarians. Really a cool place to hang out with just a few friends. I enjoy having quick bites here. Fun thing they sell healthy ready to make chutneys also. I bought the flax seed chutney.... it's good! üòçüòçüòç", 'Worst place ever. Never try anything at this place. Unhygienic and dirty. Food not worth the money. Waiting time is very long. Place very small and connected. Complete unhappy.', 'Bad in all ways. The idli were not tasty, and they were misshapen. There was a layer formed on the idli that I had to remove before eating. The coconut chutney was tasteless. God knows what they put into it. The tomato chutney was extremely spicy, despite me requesting non-spicy food. The dosa was half-cooked and had extra salt, despite me asking for no salt. The dosa was also cold. Even after re-heating, it was tasteless.', "For a place called Cafe idly they ironically don't make good idlys. Saltless, tasteless and soggy idlys to be specific. However the puddu was decent.", 'Like the food but please pack your food properly especially beverages. I ordered tea in the morning and it was leaking from all over the place. Try packing it properly', 'The name of this place has "Idly" in it but the sad truth is that they don't even know how to steam idlis. The quality was good earlier but nowadays everytime I order, the Idlis will be mashed and are not steamed properly. They will break down into pieces with a slight touch. Earlier this was my go-to place for ordering big soft idlis and I even came to the conclusion that this place serves one of the best idlis in the neighbourhood. But they have failed to maintain the consistency and quality. The paddus and dosas are hard and not good enough. The only thing that's good here is the combo of red and white chutneys.', 'Ordered extra gun powder with all idli‚Äôs, but got only for one...paid extra for the powders', 'Not like regular south indian joint and you will get too see more varieties like these spicy Kanchipuram idli, which is good but I felt turmeric flavour a lil strong which subdue other spices but really liked their red chutney and puddu..
Would like to try parrots with egg curry and gunpowder with dosa next time']

address: 17/4, Cambridge Layout, Ulsoor, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Vegetarian Only, No Alcohol Available, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["Tried this place as it's near to my office. Ordered Chana Bhatura's continuously for 3 days. Taste was commendable, however the pricing needs to be checked.Overall a decent place for eating.", 'Pricing is too high compared to nearby shops. All dishes come with extra oil. Juices are made with icecreams and over priced. Not the one recommended.', 'Had a yummy south Indian Meals. Ambiance was very good. Friendly self service... Overall very nice experience for Veggie food. NO waiting issues.', 'The breakfast is really good .I guess they need to improve on the chat section,which is really not worth the prize and the taste isnt that commendable', 'Kadai paneer is wrost
Dosa is fine
Biryani quantity is less
Mashroom is good
Gajar halwa is good
Noddle is a avarage
No home delivery
Less space to sit', "It feels a but strange to review a small place such as this one.
It just happened that we were in a great hurry on Sunday afternoon and since it was gettign late decided to grab a bite, Happened to see this place with parking available and quickly went there.

Though crowded we managed to get a seat and ate a Dosa.

Impressions:
Standard south Indian fast food with largely North Indian veg menu
Cash counter is chaotic and enforcing a queue would help
Self service
Dosas (One plate paper masala and one plate set dosas) were great.
The paper masala was absolutely crisp and the set dosas were strangely fluffy but good.
Place is very neat and clean
Staff were polite in spite of the pressure and the cook was rolling out Dosa's assembly line style.

Overall a place I would go agaun if I am in the area.", "The cleanliness is good . Rice varieties are good . But shezwan noodles is bad and they don't give ghee for rava idly. The quantity and taste for gobi Manchurian is good,price is reasonable.", "Good vegetarian dishes, pocket friendly prices and lots of varieties of food available here. Starters are good here and Veg Biryani are good as well.

Don't order online as prices are different from actual menu", "Very very rude staff!!! Hopeless service.. No queue system.. Food below average! Disgrace to the kadamba line... Don't waste ur time coming here", 'Lovely South Indian food. Throughly enjoyed the idly‚Äôs and vada‚Äôs. Good clean sitting space and quick service. Watch my detailed review on my vlog on YouTube on my channel suniT vlogs or use the link below https://youtu.be/FdI_mO13In0']

address: Inside Bagamane Tech Park,  CV Raman Nagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['Very delicious!!', 'excellent taste', 'In the newly opened Food Court at Bagmane Tech Park in CV Raman Nagar, Biriyani Options are aplenty.  Owing back to back meetings I requested my colleague to bring me back a pack of the Food Courts best Biriyani offering for me, & his pick was from Waah Chef, which I enjoyed.

The flavour was mild but bang on, not too spicy & priced & portioned right.  With more competitive outlets as neighbours, these guys are doing things right for the Biriyani, kudos.

Overall, a great Biriyani at a cool price, must try for Biriyani lovers.', "The food taste is pathetic, quality of food is really bad. The people serving don't even have the patience to explain the items to the customers.", "Worst hospitality, they do not even have minimum courtesy to listen to the customers and take orders. They think they are doing a big favor to the customers by serving. They even don't know how to speak with the customers. Even the food is very stale often."]

["Love the concept. Love the chutneys! Hats off for getting the tamarind chutney recipe just right. Waiting to try more. üòÄ Few suggestions:

1. The eco-friendly packaging is nice, but not very practical for storage. It's not possible to finish 100 gms of chutney at one go! Please switch to small glass containers. Wouldn't mind paying for it.

2. Nutritional information on the chutneys would be nice. I love the tamarind chutney but pretty sure I should balance out the sugar with healthier options! ü§¶üèª‍‚ôÄÔ∏è

3. Where is the groundnut chutney? Where? Where?? üôÉ", 'Too Much Chutney is EXACTLY the sort of place I was looking for when I wanted to order just some chutney to go with the rest of my food (tired of places not giving enough options). It also helps that the team behind TMC\xa0 are the nicest people who go above and beyond with the quality of their service.\xa0P.s. Delivery Time - Reasonable 

It is a descent late night restaurant.', 'Had a celebration lunch with family with three going for seafood and fourth opting for non vegetarian thali. Great food accompanied by superb unobtrusive service in an ambience that made it a truly memorable experience. address: 22, 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
["Worst Biryani. We had asked for Biryani parcel..They gave us stale biryani...When we called them...they are apologising and asked next time when we go they will give us discount. It means they knew that the food was not good..
It's not about refund..But they are cheaters and provide stale food.
The restaurant guy is a cheater...pls dont take anything parcel...after going home we cant even ask for refund...
Please read the reviews. Many people have complained that they provide stale food.
Request Zomato to remove this restaurant, so that we dont get cheated when we place an order.", 'Another Andhra eatery in Indiranagar, one that has been around for a while but has relocated to 80ft road. Expect the usual staples from Andhra restaurants here. 

What I liked was the service. Courteous staff ensure that your meal experience is made more special. And among the things on the veg Thali, the Rasam was superb, so was the chutney. The rice could have been cooked better though. The spice levels aren‚Äôt overpowering, but it remains to be seen if this is consistent during another visit. I love spicy food, but sometimes, it can get to you. 

Parking is an issue here, with the roads being dug up on both sides.', 'I have ordered one butter chicken, one chilly mushroom and three butter naan on 27/4/19.but no butter chicken was delivered. When i asked zomato all the three items were delivered. I have clicked the pictures and sent to zomato. But the response was that they have delivered. Now question who is the culprit.?', "This is like my to-do place after work. After a long day at work we just come here to enjoy Thur andhra veg meals which is one of the bests I've tried so far. There are so many varieties and like every other veg meals this is also served on banana leaf to retain the authenticity. The good has always been my favorite and their nonveg is good too. Must visit place for some authentic South Indian food.", 'My love for andhra  meal ends here only at Sreedevi...their veg and non-veg both have Amazing spreads to offer..and the service is super quick..unlimited thali is something you can‚Äôt get over it... have tried both their non veg and veg meals and I keep licking my finger..my fav Andhra meal place !!totally recommended', 'Tasty and yummy food üòç if you wana have spicy andhra food then you should try this place.. polite staff üëçüèªoverall great place to visit.. family restuarent', "Worst meal ever, they don't serve normal food, they serve insect food. We found one black insect in white steamed rice, after that they didn't care about and simply changed the rice without any apology. However, we found one cockroach in rice again after changing it. And after all this, the manager didn't give a shit about it, he was so arrogant rude. Please don't even try this restaurant unless you like to eat insects.", '#nice food love the ambiance üòä would recommend to have nice Andhra cusine üòä
Food could be made of more varieties in non vegüòä over all nice experience üëç', 'Nice place for the Andhra Meals thali. The rice and subzi are unlimited. Quality and taste is good. We also tried out couple of starters the Chicken Sixer and Chicken Pepper Fry, tasty with the latter being better. All in all a satisfactory meal.', 'Best and fresh meal. Neat & tidy place. This is my to go to place for meals. Tastes great! I have not tried variety here yet, but also I have not found such good meal anywhere else as well. (I can literally recall the taste in my mouth as I write this)

Sometimes each place has its own unique thing according to oneself. So I have this list of ‚Äòforever‚Äô places to go to. Shreedevi is sure shot in the list.']

address: Shop 48, Opposite 5th Avenue, Brigade Garden, Brigade Road, Bangalore
more_info: Home Delivery, Indoor Seating,
reviews:
['A noisy place with a terrible ambience. It is poorly lit. The manager is high headed on top of it. The food was ordinary. I ordered chicken biryani and it was a pretty normal biryani nothing special.', "Worst restaurant ever. Honest review. I ordered for a veg combo and veg biryani. But what i got was veg biryani with some non veg pieces and chicken combo instead of veg combo. Vegetarians strictly avoid this place because they don't know the difference between veg and non veg. No food also and no money also. Such a big disaster and had to throw entire food because even non vegetarians didn't like the taste.", 'Excellent Appam and Stew!
Highly recommend the Appam and chicken stew. \xa0Fresh and fluffy appams and authentic stew.\xa0

Will order the fish dishes next.', 'Excellent Prawn Biryani. Really enjoyed the subtle flavours of the biryani masala. Will order again for sure .. We also enjoyed the flavours of veg stew which was amazing with Appam. The veg stew is a must try and similar to what we had in Kochi last month. Great portion sizes & very good value for money.', 'Sea Food was excellent. I was trying Neer Dosa for the first time and absolutely loved it. The crab preparation in Mangalorean style is a true delicacy. Big fan of coconut based of gravy. Very affordable pricing too.', 'combo of Biryani and Kabab is nice . Very tasty and good quantity also. Yummy Biryani rice too. Very good quantity for 200 bucks ... worth it!', "Awesome Appam & Stew. Highly reccomend. Loved the Anjal tawa fry too. It was super yum and healthy too. I loved the Neer Dosa and it was authentic like my grandma's Sunday brunch üòç", "The fish curry and pompret is a must try!!! Many won't know about it's location.its right next to McDonald's.. Carrot halwa was amazing

Ambience -2/5
Food taste - 4/5
Service - 4/5
Food quality -4/5", 'The non veg thali had a bitter gourd fry! The chicken curry was tasteless. Fried kebab (Bangalore style) was okay. No customer was around even at 1 pm on a Saturday. Would avoid next time.']

address: 2906/2907, HAL 2nd Stage, 80 Feet Road, Indiranagar, Bangalore
more_info: No Alcohol Available, Outdoor Seating, Table Reservation Not Required, Indoor Seating, Desserts and Bakes,
reviews:
['', 'The place is very soothing and spacious,i had been here with my friend for one of his poetry event by anjuman family,I had an amazing experience there,the ambience,people everything was good but the food i found it a lil expensive', "This place has the greatest ambience. It is a creative space where you have meetups, jam sessions, pottery classes and more. The place makes you feel at peace. There are very few options on the menu. I had an egg roll which was way too oily and didn't taste nice. I had an iced tea as well which was very bland. The food isn't good at this place but do go here for the ambience. It's the perfect place to unwind and relax .
You can go read a book, take a book back with you and replace it with one of yours, have music jam sessions or just sit and do nothing. It's away from all the hustle and bustle and makes you feel at peace.", 'It is a splendid place to meet new and fun people and enjoy a plethora of board games on Thursday nights..... Every day they have a different set of activity for you it is very very cool. And the food is also decent and fairly ranged. I will definitely be visiting this place again and again.', "It's a good place to hangout and chill
Good ambience and fine food
Went here for a poetry reading and it was on total a great and nice experience", 'Location is off road not really very feasible, no parking.. 

Ambience an everyday place to go hang out with both ground  level and chair sitting.. homely feeling

Food is good sandwiches and cupcakes are nice.', 'Been to this place with regular chatting group of German learning friends.
This place was filled with groups indulging in group talks and meetings. You have many options there to indulge yourself in some activities.

It also serves you the best quality food. Chilly cheese toast, Sabudana vada are the must try.
Have a look at well maintained articrafts and stuff.

Overall I was glad to be there and absolutely without a doubt spent the whole day.', "Been here twice for their Thursday board game night. They charge a nominal amount for entry and food and the overall experience is fabulous. Whether you are in group or alone, it doesn't matter, you are going to have a bomb of time here. Highly recommended. Added bonus-the food tastes really well too.", 'I had to go out with a friend and suggested this place just because they had butter beer. But sadly it was not available. Momos were also not available. The ambience was ok. Normal. Food was also normal..but if not for the butter beer I would have chosen a better cafe with good food options. We had sandwiches, omlet and tea.', "I'm becoming a regular for the board game nights at this place on Thursday evenings! While the food is not that great, the ambiance and the board game nights surely make up for it. It has a lovely homely feel with a non-threatening environment, allowing you to feel as comfortable as possible. Definitely a recommend!"]
